Ko taua hōnore i tau ki tō tātou hoa ki a Āpirana Ngata. Kua puta noa atu tēnei taitara hōnore ki a ia, engari kāore a Apirana i whakaae
Kua rongo atu i te toa nui whakaharahara o koutou ki te whawhai i te hoariri, ā, i te whiwhinga hoki o tēnā o koutou, o Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, ki te hōnore tino nui rawa atu, arā, i te Rīpeka Wikitōria
Haere koe i tai aronui, haere au i tai timu
Ka ngau te toki ki te tumu o te rākau, ka hīoioi te kāuru.
Kua haere rāua ki Tūroa ki te reti hukapapa.
Ahakoa haere ia ki hea, kei konā anō tana papa wīra, e pai ai tana reti haere.
Kua rārangi kē mai ngā wīra o ngā hū reti o ēnei rā, ko tētahi i muri i tētahi.
Mā te maka tika i ngā rāpihi e makatika tonu ai a Aotearoa.
Ka kitea he tangata, ka wawe te kūtia iho e Hinenuitepō
Ko te nui o Niu Tīreni e 66,000,000 eka
Ko te nui o te iwi Māori kei raro i te 45,000
Ko te nui o tēnei tāpapa, kia kotahi putu te hōhonu, kia ono te roa, ā, kia toru putu te whānui
Kua rewharewha noa aku whakaaro, kua kore au e mōhio he aha he mahi māku.
Kia mārō te tū, kaua e tū whakahinga, kaua e tū koromeke, kia pērā tō tū me te tū a Māui-tikitiki-o-Taranga i hīia ake nei e ia tēnei ika whenua ki runga, kāore anō i tītaha, kāore anō i totohu
Ko wai tēnā e tūpaoe haere nei i te huarahi?
Ko wai te tohunga i tāpenatia e koe ki ngā kai nā?
Ko te mate kē, he nui ake te warawara ki te tupeka i te pore kia mutu te kai tupeka.
Ka kiha ia i te kitenga atu i tana koroua, tērā e pōhēhētia kua mate!
Ka kotī mai te toto i te meketanga atu o te ihu.
E kōrūrū ana te whare i te haurokuroku.
Ahakoa te pukuaroha o te kōmihana ki te kerēme a Ngāi Tahu, porowhiua mai ana e te kāwanatanga
E pukuaroha ana mātou ki te wahine i tūkinotia rā.
Kua kūnāwiri katoa au, ahakoa te mahana o aku kākahu. Tērā pea he mate tōku.
E takoto ana ngā moenga o te tangata whenua i te mata kopa o te whare.
Mēnā kei a koe te ngao, māu e mahi - kua hiamoe kē au.
Ka tākina te karakia hiki tapu, ka wātea i ngā tapu, ka āuriuri.
Ko tā te waka pakupaku rā he arataki i ngā kaipuke kia tae pai atu ki tua o te pūkawa.
Kia whakatepe te tū o te kai; ko tō mua kai hei mua, ko tō muri mai hei muri mai; kaua e tīpaopao te kai. I ngā kainga nunui, arā i ngā tina, ko tēnei te rārangi o ngā kai: he hupa, he ika, he mīti, he purini, he huarākau
E whētuki ana tana tārāuma, koirā au i mōhio ai e ora tonu ana ia.
He tapu ngā rua kōiwi, he tapu ngā taumatua, he tapu ngā tūhinapō
He huanui haere ki te taumatua karakia
He kawhe māu, he tī rānei?
Ka raua atu te kawhe ki tana kapu, ka ringihia atu te wai wera, kātahi ka kōroria.
Nā te takaawhe o te haere i takamuri ai ērā rā.
I te rā i muri iho o te putanga o te āwhiowhio, heoi anō te mea i kitea ko ngā tūnga whare me ngā rākau e takoto haere ana, me ngā tāngata kua hemo
Ka pā he mate ki ngā kūao, ka iti te tipu, ka pohe, ka ngoikore hoki te tinana
Ko te whanake a Paoa, e kore e mahue
Ka mahue te taiaha, ka mau ki te meremere
Tēnā! Mahuetia ngā kākahu!
Mahuetia ōna hoa ki tō rātou waka
Kia ahiahi, kua nganangana katoa te tahatū o te rangi.
Kua waipapa te waerenga
Ka tūngutu a Mahuika i tana ahi
Kia āta ore, e taku hua aroha, taku kukune i tōu āhuru mōwai.
Nō muri ka whānau ngā tāina o Te Huhuti, ka tapaina ko Hinehore, ko Hineteko
Ka haere a Āperahama ki Te Tī, i Waitangi, i te Māehe o 1881 ki te whakatuwheratanga o te whare rūnanga i tapaina ko Te Tiriti o Waitangi
Nō te tīmatanga anō hoki o Te Māori ki Aotearoa nei, ka whakatapua te kōhatu nei, ka tapaina ko Te Māori
Ahakoa tana inonoti, me pupuri tō riri.
Haruru ana te papa tākaro i te hāumere a te hunga mātakitaki i te kēmu.
Kāore i whakairotia te tungaroa o taua whare, he mea tōtōkau.
Nā te marangai i kawe tō rātou waka ki waho, ki te aumoana.
Mauria mai ko te rongo ā-whare, ko te rongo taketake, ki mua ki te atua . . . ka whakaoti te riri
He roroa, he pango, he kapu ngā makawe.
I te whānautanga mai ka āhua pīngohe te pārihirihi o te pēpē.
Ka pāraharaha te one i Kukuriki
Ina kore ēnā āhuatanga i roto i te kaiwhakaako, ka tau pāraharaha te kaupapa
E rotua ana e Rua te waka rā kia moe tonu
Kei te whakatakoto kara mō Te Horo kia patua
Ka ao pōtango, ka ao whētuma, ka ao whēkere
Koia rangi whētuma
Me hume tō panekoti i a koe ka whakawhiti i te awa kia kore ai e mākū.
Ki te rite tonu te miere o te tīma, kua iwingohe, kua kore e whakapono ki a rātou anō.
He puhi koe nāku, he ipo ki te moenga
Kei te whakapau kurī noa iho ia i āna moni ki tana whakaeanga, tē aro mai te wahine rā ki a ia.
Ka ngau te aroha mō te hau kāinga i ngā wā e taka ai he mate i te whārua.
Te pane, ngā peke, te hiku, ngā unahi, te peha, ngā tuatara, i āhua ngarara katoa ēnei
Ko te karakotāira he ngārara rite ki te tuatara tōna āhua. He unahi mātotoru rawa kei tōna tuarā katoa, ā, e kore e taea i te mata o te pū
Ko ēnei ā koutou e kai ai o ngā mea katoa o roto o ngā wai: ko ngā mea katoa o ngā wai, o ngā moana, o ngā awa, he tara ō rātou, he unahi, ko ēnā ā koutou e kai ai
Hei Kaiapoi te ōwhanga o tēnei manu
Kātahi ka werohia te tokotoko o Kahu ki te whenua, ka oia e ia, me te karakia; tōna putanga ake, he wai ka pupū ake
E rima tau a Kereopa e noho ana i konei, e kauhau ana i te Pai Mārire, me te taka anō hoki o Tūhoe ki tēnei tikanga
He tokai i mau ki ngā kīato, ko te kauhua i mau ki te tokai; kei runga i te kauhua te raho e whata ana
He tokomaha ngā tāngata e pai ana ki te pēkana me te hēki hei parakuīhi.
Kua haere ngā taitamariki ki te one ki te kohi tuangi, ki te kaukau.
Ka tiro whakarunga a Matua Eru me te kī, 'Tangaroa, he aha rā taku hara?'
Heoi, mā Te Atua e muru ōku hara
Ka mau rāua e whiuwhiu paramu ana ki te whare o te kiritata, whakaritea ana ko te horoi i ana matapihi te utu mō tō rāua hara.
Tukua kia whakapāngia te whiu ki a ia, arā, tā te Ture whiu i whakarite ai mō tōna hara
Ka tūria te haka, ka puta a Matatini, moruki kau ngā ringaringa, ānō hoki te ringa wahine
Ko te 9.30 i te ata te hāora e wehe atu ai taku waka rererangi.
Hai te kore, iwa rau hāora, ka haere mātau ki tō mātau whare kura
Na, puritia te kawau o te kāheru, ka pou atu ai ki te oneone.
E tō, e te rā, rere whakauru ana ki te rua
Ki te purere he poikurukuru i a koe ka hahau i tō pōro, whakahokia te poikurukuru ki te wāhi i hāua atu rā e koe.
I kite koe i te tuahuru o te tangata rā? E kore e makariri i ngā pō takurua!
Ko ngā mahi e mahia ana e ngā kirimangu nei, kāore i te tino pīrangitia e ngā Pākehā i te kaha iti o te utu, nā reira kua riro i ngā kirimangu nei
Kua kuha noa atu te kaka nei
E apu paru ana ngā pārera ki te tātari wenewene hei kai mā rātou.
Tō te rangatira tōna tū, ka wehi ki te whakapā i te ringa ki te wahine
Piki ake Tāwhaki i te rangi tuatahi, i te rangi tuarua
Ko Te Toi-o-ngā-rangi te rangi ngahuru mā rua, koia te rangi tino tapu rawa atu, te kāinga o Io.
Ka hinga, ka takawhetawheta ngā waewae
Haere mai kōrua - e rua ngā tūru e wātea ana i taku taha.
Tau kē hoki kōrua ko tō kaka hou.
I hea kē kōrua ko tō kurī e ngaro ana?
E tuawiri ana te tinana i te makariri.
Ka mutu te hui, ka hokihoki ngā tāngata, hāhā ana tērā te marae.
Kia noho rawa ake ai i te taha o te ahi e nui ana te tarauma hei riri mo te tau waiika, mo te tau tukuroa
E noho kotahi nei tōna motu, ko ia anake
Ka whakatauria e te kōti mā te Kōti Matua tēnei take e whakawā
Ko tā mātou e tino mea nei, kia waiho mā te Māori anō e whakawā ngā mea e tino mōhiotia ana e te Māori
Tokorua ngā tāngata e whakawā ana i te waiata ā-ringa.
He tokomaha ngā wāhine ka heu i ngā huruhuru i ō rātou kēkē.
Ina puta koe i te kaukau, me pani ō kēkē kia kore ai koe e mōrūruru.
Ka whati he tuarā i te karinga tuatara, he oneone mārō i te raumati, he taumaha i te takurua.
Kaupokina te hāngī ki te pēke mākū i mua i tō tāpuke ki te oneone.
Me harangotengote taku utu i taku waka, i te mea kāore i a au ngā moni katoa hei hoko iāia tonu nei.
I tū tana ringa i ngā tarakina o te kina.
Kia kaua e pā tō ringa ki tēnā tipu, he tarakina hoki kei te toi o ngā rau.
Kua nanamu aku whatu i te pawa o te rorerore.
Ka pākikitia e te kaipaoke he parāoa māna.
E whakamahia ana te pūnaha ngahuru puta noa i te ao, arā, ko te mita te waeine taketake mō te roa, ko te karamu mō te papatipu, ko te rita mō te rōrahi.
E ono ngā waewae o te wētā.
Me pukumahara i te tōnuitanga, kia whai tahua ai i te tau nihoroa.
He uaua te wāwāhi i te rākau pūioio ki te toki noa.
Hei te 25 o ngā rā o Hakihea te Kirihimete.
Ka roa ia e pokepoke ana i te parāoa, kātahi ka whakanōhia ki te taha o te ahi, ki reira piki ai.
Kāore hoki he kai kē atu, nō reira ka kainga te pāwhera haunga rā
Ka rongo te whānau kua mate a ia, ka tahuri ki te hora i ngā moenga i te wharenui.
Haere mahana atu i te poupoutanga o te rā, hoki pūanu mai i te ahiahipō.
I hikina ake te taupoki o te kōhua kia pai ai tana pihongi i ngā kai.
E ngaweki ana te mano o te tangata i ōna tiriti, te kiri mā, te kiri kaunenehu, me te kiri mangu
Nō te ringihanga i ngā kai ki waho o te hīnaki, ngaweki ana te tuatara, ka oma ngā tamariki i te mataku i te ngārara
He mea tino mīharo tēnā, arā, te kite i ngā taitamariki e mahi ana i ngā mahi a ngā pakeke
O ngā ngāngara ngokingoki katoa, ko te whakapapa o te tuatara te tino tawhito rawa
I tino whakanuia ia, i tino manaakitia i tōna taenga ki reira
Na ka tāwhiri rātou ki ō rātou hoa i tērā o ngā kaipuke kia hoe mai hei hoa mō rātou
E whakarite puku ana ngā tamariki i tētahi hākari weherua pō mā rātou.
Ko au ki te Ārapi: 'E kare, kei te tito koe. He tāhae koe.' Ko te Ārapi ki a au: 'Kāpara iti, kāore au i te kōrero tito. Ehara au i te whānako'
Koia mātou ka mea nei, he tito noa ēnei kōrero, kaua e whakarongo
Kei te hangaia he whare tīwai ki tērā o ngā pito whenua - kua hōhā au i te hari tēneti atu.
Kua tūngarangara au i te nui o aku mahi.
Hīkaikai ana ngā waewae, takaoreore ana ngā ringaringa
E koukou mai ana te ruru i te kāhekoheko o te rākau.
Pau ake ngā tahā, tango atu ki ngā papa pātua
Ko tōna koroua tētahi ka korikori i a ia e tū marae ana.
I ngā rā o mua ka riro mā te waewae tonu e takatakahi ngā wāina kia māhungahunga.
E hoa, me kōhumuhumu tāua kia kore ai ngā taringa o te hoariri e rongo mai.
Muia ana te Pirimia e te mahi a te kaipūrongo, riro ana mā ngā kaitautiaki rātou e pupare.
Ora katoa te iwi i te korita o te tūtei.
Kia whaikōrero a Tame, he korokoro tūī, engari kia puoro, e tama, kua reo poraka tonu atu!
Hei ritenga mō te kura, i tangohia mai i te kēkē o te kākā, i rākaia ki runga i te taiaha, arā, i te māipi kura
Ngā kai o tērā maunga, he kiwi, he weka, he kiore, he kūkū, he tūī, he maunga huahua tērā maunga
He huahua anake anō te kai pai mā te tangata
Ka eke ōna tau ki te 16, ka mahue i a Pātariki te kāinga mōriroriro nei o Pungaere ki te haere ki Tīpene
Kia tūpato tātau i te hunga e tāwai nei i a tātau kia taka ki te hē.
Me āta inu koe, kia kore ai e mate i te tokohana.
Waiho mā te karetai o te moana te rimurimu e ā mai ki uta.
He mōhio te tīrairaka me mahi kōhanga ia i ngā peka kaurera rawa o te rākau.
Me akiaki ngā tamariki kia uru ki ngā hākinakina.
I meinga ko ia hei kaiārahi i tētahi ope rapu mōhio he hūhunu nei tā rātau mahi i te hoariri
Kia pēnei te hāpai i tō rākau ki te kakaro, kei paoa tō māhunga.
Ka tirikohu atu ia ki te wai kōpua.
Ka mene mai me te kī mai, 'Koinā tō pai, e Wī.'
E māue ana te rimurapa i ngā wai hūkerikeri.
Te ringaringa motomoto tuatara o te kāinga o Te Wahineiti
Māharo ana i te kaha o tā rātou tautoko mai. Pēnei ia he tokoiti noa ka pai mai ki tana whakaaro.
Kei te tauwhirowhiro te marama
Kua tauwhirowhiro, kua tata te kōhiti.
Tīhore kau ana te whenua i te ahi.
Ehara ko ngā tākuta anake kia mataara. Me mataara anō te iwi ka tika
Ka haere a Hotumanea ki tahaki kōtutu wai ai mō te whāereere i roto i te rua one
Kāre e pai te mātakitaki i a ia e oma ana, kei hinga hoki i te rapa o ana waewae.
Kua paoitia hoki he aruhe hei kīnaki
Kāore i tua atu i te pīkara hei kīnaki mō te parāoa me te tīhi.
Ka tū ki te aroaro o Ruru, paru rawa ki te inohi o Ngārarahuarau
Potapota noa te waka i te tai
Māperea atu te pūngāwerewere.
Ki te kikī a reira i tō utanga; makā atu ki raro o ngā kaiwae o tō waka, nā uwhia iho ki ngā whāriki, kei kitea kei whiua ki te wai
Ko te whakapono hei tuara mō rātau i ngā wā o te pōuri nui.
Me kohikohi moni hei tuara mō ngā hiahia o te komiti marae.
Ka aroha te mātoetoe o ana ringa raupā.
E pati kai ana tō tamaiti i te kura, i te korenga ōu e mahi kai māna.
Te putanga ake o taua tawhiti nei, ānō he ahi e toro ana ki te whenua. (E kōrero ana mō te rā.)
Ko te pā tahuri ko Tokaanu, ko te puta taua ko Te Hikutawatawa, i te rā kotahi
He whānau tama ki te wahine, he awatai, he puta taua ki te tane
Ka whewhera ngā tamariki i ā rātou pukapuka.
Ka kohuki rā te mātārae ki ngā wai riporipo o te roto.
Kei te kaha te māngai, engari e hauwarea ana te tinana.
Kāore pea e tino mākū ngā kaka i te tararere rangitahi nei.
Me kore ake te tiu i kore ai e toro te ahi ki te raki.
Inā te kawa o tēnei roto
Inā te kino o te haka a tēnei iwi nā
Inā kē te nui o tēnā ika.
Inā kē te wera o reira
I hoki mai au inakuarā. Kāore anō au kia whai wā ki te whakarongo ki ngā karere i te waea.
E uruwehi ana au kei puta te kōhuru rā i te whare herehere, ka haere mai ki te patu i taku tamāhine.
Kia ngangahu tonu ō whao - mā reira rawa e oti pai ai te whakairo.
I taku kitenga i tō māhanga, pākirakira ana au ko koe kē!
Ka nui te ingo o te koroua ki ngā kai o tana itinga.
Me taha kau rawa pea e mākona ai te tangata pukukai nā.
Ka kōrero mai a Hotunui ki te kino o tōna iwi e noho nei ia
He pēhea ōu nā whakaaro ki tāku e kōkiri nei?
Kei reira anō te autaia nei a te neke. Pēnei me te upoko teretere nei te upoko me te kakī. Erangi ko te roa o taua autaia nei, ehara i te hanga
Ka mate te kātua ka kārangi kau ngā kūao
Me peita a waho o tō whare ki ngā tae kōrae, kia kore ai e tere pahore.
Ka māuiui tonu te tangata ka werohia e te katipō.
'Hei konei, kia atawhai ki te iwi i muri i a au nei.' He ōhākī tēnei kōrero ki ngā tāngata o te ao nei
Nā te kurī tō hū i tango, arā ia e oma atu rā, e mau tonu ana te hū ki te waha.
Ko 1910 pea te tau i tonoa atu a Te Puea e tōna matua kēkē, e Mahuta - ko ia te whakakapi o Tāwhiao hei kīngi - kia hoki mai
He anga ora tēnei, e kore e roa ka tupu te kai
He anga whakateraki tō te whare, nā reira i mahana ai.
Kei te pīrangi ētehi tāngata kia mau pōngahangaha katoa ngā kurī ngau.
Kua pingohe te ure, kua tārewa noa iho.
Kāore hoki ia e mōhio ki te tunu kai - ko tana tūmau kē kei te taka kai māna.
Ka nohopuku tonu a ia ahakoa te nui o te kōrero a ētehi atu.
Ka pikoni tonu ki tāna mahi, ahakoa e whakapono ana te tokomaha he moumou tāima.
Kua eke te hāora me wehe atu te pahi.
Kua eke ki te wā e haere ai tātou.
Ka huna te wahine rā ki te wāhi hahao i te takahi o te rākau.
Ka hoki mai ki te whakataki i te kaha o Houmaitawhiti, tae noa ki ōna uri
I kite atu au i a rāua e tūrehu ana tētahi ki tētahi.
Ko tana kaha umere te pūnga o tōna reo whango.
Tau ki te papa, ki' whakaparure; taku parure, ko au nei anake te kurī pōrangi
Mehemea ka moe te kurī, ka pahu, he takiari, he waimarie
Ao ake ka hiki mai ia i Heretaunga.
Tērā tētahi otaota . . . ki te pā noa atu te ringaringa tangata, ka ngingio, arā, ka tīmata te maroke
E tohu ana ngā putanga o te rangahau ki te wāhi nui o te tuku a te pakeke i te reo Māori ki te tamaiti
I roa tonu a Hotunui e noho ana i te whenua i whānau ai ia, ā, kua pakeke noa atu ka tae mai ki Kāwhia ka moe i tāna wahine
Whakamaua he pōtae kia kore ai tō toihau e werohia e te mātao.
Tāhurihuri kau ana a Tūhourangi rātou ko tōna iwi
He toa a Tiki ki te tākaro nei, ahakoa tōna wheto.
Nā ō rāua mātua te tokorua rā i tāmou, kia puta mai he uri rangatira
He uaua te tū i te rahoraho ka tukoki ana te waka.
Ka karakia a Rātā i tōna waka kia angi ai tōna haere
Ka taparengatia ngā tipu kūmara ki te io harakeke.
Ka tae a Kae ki ngā pāua, ka whakapiria ki ngā kanohi, kia kī atu ai ngā wāhine rā kei te oho ia
E kīia ana ka tere ngā inanga ki te takiwā o Tonga rā anō, ki reira whakaputa uri ai.
I te ata tonu ka piki te 'tiu' ki te pūwhara, ka karanga ka whakaoho i te puni katoa
Kei roto i te awa wheuri
Tēnei te iwi ka tiemi, ka tiemi
Ahakoa ka roa e kōhuatia ana te mīti nei, e mārō tonu ana ngā uaua.
Puta kē ki mua, kei te kōhamo te puhi, he tokotoko te rākau, noho iho; puta kē ki tētahi wāhi kōrero ai, e rua puhi kei te rae
Hau ana tōna rongo ki te motu hei toa kōue takitahi mō te mahi hoe waka
Kaua e tatari kia pūwhewhero rawa tō kiri - pania i mua i te puta ki waho, hāereere haere ai i ngā rangi paki.
Ka ui atu anō taua nauhea nei ki ōna tuākana, 'Kei whea te wāhi i tō tātou matua tāne, matua wahine?'
I ia Paraire te tangata haramai ai ki te tapahi i te karāhe i tōna kāinga.
Me rapa noa te kanohi ki te nūpepa e kitea ai te wāhi nui ki te hākinakina i Aotearoa.
He uri koutou nā Tamatea, kua huaina ki tō koutou rohe te ingoa o tō koutou tipuna
Ko te uri a Ūoko, ko Mokohikuwaru, ko ia te tupuna o ngā ngāngara
Ko tō rātou Atua te rā e whiti iho nei, ki tā rātou kī ko ō rātou kīngi he uri nōna, nō te Rā
Kua okotahi ngā pea hurumā, e kī ana ngā mōhio taihoa ka korehāhā.
Tērā e pōhēhētia e nohoia ana ngā makawe pūihiihi e te manu.
Ka hoki mai ia ki te kāinga i ētahi ahiahi rawa, ka riro mai te mahi a te āporo, a te pītiti, a te paramu, a te aperekoti, a te rēmana hoki. He roa kātahi anō mātau ka kite i ēnei huarākau
Ka takaia te taura o te kōtaha ki te pere kua titia rā ki te whenua, ka tākirihia, kātahi ka rere te pere rā ki tawhiti noa atu.
Tīkina ai te kiripōhatu i te mea he pai hei kōhatu mahi rori.
Kāore i ārikarika te pupuhi mai o te tuku uta.
Whakaritea mai rā ngā taputapu katoa mō tā tātou  puninga i te takutai moana.
Ko te hama, te kani, te kōwiri, te tūwiri me te whao, he taputapu mō te hanga whare.
Ko te rorohiko anake te taputapu o taku tari i nui te utu.
Māna e arataki te kauri i te wao
Ko te awa tonu te kati i waenganui i ngā iwi e rua.
Hemahema atu, hemahema mai - kīhai i taro, kua mahimahi.
Kei konā ia e hemahema ana, he aha te aha. Kāore hoki a Tame i paku hiahia ki a ia.
Me whakapīhangaiti ngā rīwai ki te taha o te kuia rā. Ko ia kei te wehewehe i ngā purapura.
E tāngarangara ana i te kore e waia ki ana rekereke teitei.
Mā pango, mā whero ka oti
Ka karanga ki tētahi atu tangata kia haere mai hei whakamahiri ake, arā hei whakamāmā ake, hei whakarewa ake
Ka ngoia te māhunga
E ono hāora ia e kato rōpere ana i ia rā, koirā i kirirua ai ana matimati.
Ko te arawhiti, kei kō tata atu i te wāhi e pūtahi ai ngā kōawa.
Ina pūtahi ngā ara e rua, me hohoko te kuhu atu o ngā waka.
He wai haranu ngā wai o konei, he wai purata ngā wai o te kāinga.
He pō makariri, he pō whakahemo hiko.
Kua tīehutia e Hōne te wai, koia i paru ai.
He haunga ake  te  parakaingaki kurī i te parakaingaki manu.
He whakahorohoro taratahi
Hine: Kei hea a Tū? Pare: Aua. Kei waho pea.
E kore pea ia e pai mai ki ahau
E mōhio ana mātou tērā pea ētahi o ā mātou whakatikatika e whakahētia e te taha Pākehā
E kauhimu ana rāua mō Hine rāua ko Tama - e ai ki ngā kōrero taihoa rāua ka wehe.
E rapihia ana tōu ringa e te ngārara
Paranokenoke ana te whare o Mea - te hia kore kē nei e whakamā!
E kore pea a ia e puta mai, kua koari hoki i ana mahi nanakia kua pāhotia ki te ao.
Ka noho a Tū i a Hine, ka puta ā rāua tamariki tokowhā.
Kotahi koropū taewa
Ka whakangārahu rātou kia hinga te kaihautū o taua rōpū tōrangapū.
Koia ka hautū, 'Tōkihi, tōkihi, tōkihi'.
Māku e horoi ngā wharepaku - māu e tahitahi ngā papa.
Mā Pita koe e whakahoki.
Waiho mā te whakamā a ia e patu.
Ka tīkape te kaumātua i ngā taonga tākaro e marara noa ana ki te papa ki tana tokotoko.
Tīkapea ana e rātou ngā kupu i tīkina atu i te reo Pākehā, hāpaitia ana ko ngā kupu hou i takea mai i te reo Māori tonu.
Ka āta momi a Rau i te ārani kia riro katoa mai te wai o roto.
He momo ia nō ngā iwi e rua, he kākano whakauru.
Nō Tonga tana hei wheo, he mā te tae.
He pūkawa wheo kei te kaupare atu i te akiaki mai a te ngaru.
Kei te kai whēnako te ngākau ki ngā mahinga o taku itinga
Ka ngaro te kai, e mimiti tā tūwaewae
I whai wāhi mai anō hoki te kapa haka o te Kura o Tītahi . . . hei whakangahau i ngā tūwaewae i te wā o te kai
E mana tonu ana te whakaaetanga tiaki i te awa, i waenga i ngā kaiwhakahaere o te whare hiko me te iwi kāinga.
He whakaaetanga tēnei i waenganui i a Kuīni Wikitōria me ētahi rangatira Māori
Ko te take o ēnei whakawā, he whakaaetanga nā tētahi ki tētahi, taka ana tā tētahi, nā reira i mea ai ki te whakawā
Ka roa tonu e nakunakua ana ētahi kai pērā i te mīti, engari ko te panana me te miraka, he māmā noa ki te nakunaku.
Me tiriwā tēnā tokorua. Ki te kore, ka kaha kē atu tā rāua haututū.
Kāore i waiho ana hae, ana tautohetohe ake, hei tiriwā i a rātou
Kua tū mai te tima hei tari i ngā herehere Hauhau ki Wharekauri
Ko tēnei mea ko te hōuto, he hua pōporo he mea āta kimi ki ngā mea papai, pai o te maoa, o te āhua hoki
Kua tīkākā katoa te wāhi hewa o te koroheke rā.
He tangata ahunui taku taokete - mō te mahi, kāore he tangata i tua atu.
Taupokina te waka kia taea ai te tirotiro te takere.
Taupokina te kumete, kia kore ai e kī i te wai.
E Reta, e kaitu ake nei, me pēhea rā e kite ake ai au i a koe?
Ānō te kō e pā ana ki tētahi pari, nā ka whakahokia mai
Kīia atu te tamaiti rā kia mutu te ngote i tana takonui.
E kai waiū ana te tamaiti
Me mutu te kai waipiro.
He tamaiti rawe, kotahi noa iho te pānuitanga, kua mau i a ia te matū o te kōrero.
Tukua atu au kia rere ā-manu tū
Me kore ake te pakihoro i kore ai e tino kino te taotū.
I runga waka rererangi, kāore e whakakīia tō kapu kia pangoro rawa, kei maringi.
Ka tōkenekenetia tana kakī ki te rau pātītī kia rekareka ai.
Nā wai te pōtiki e auē rā te waha?
Tērā Kaiwaka ka marewa i te rua
Ko te umu tūākaha mā te tohunga, ko te umu pōtaka mā ngā arero whero, ko te umu tukupara mā te katoa.
Waiho ana mā te uriuri e taka i waenga i ngā hapū e rua, e whakawhitiwhiti kōrero mai i tētahi taha ki tētahi.
E kī ana te Pākehā, ahakoa te kino o te kōrero ka kawea mai e ia, kaua e pūhia te uriuri!
He aroha te mea nui i tae mai ai ahau ki waenganui i a koutou
Ko taku tuakana tēnā i te taha mauī, ko taku tungāne kei te taha katau, ko au kei waenganui.
Kua rite katoa ngā mea mō te whawhai, ko waenganui o te matua nei, ko ngā tāngata haere waewae, i ngā pito ko ngā pūrepo me ngā tāngata haere hōiho
Ko te Tahi o Pipiri te marama tuatahi o tā te Māori tau, ko waenganui tonu o te makariri
E tupuria ana taua mānia e te huru rākau
I mauru te ngākau o tana whanaunga i ngā mātaitai i haria atu ai e ia.
He kōmāmā ake te pōro tēnehi i te pōro kirikiti.
He kōmāmā ngā pēke e kī ana i te pepa whēru, he taumaha ngā pēke e kī ana i te kēna me te pātara.
Ka haere tētahi o rātou, ka tūtei, ka haere ki te whakatewhatewha i ngā ahi i whakapopōria nei e Ngā Rauru
Me mau pūkoro ure ka hika ana koe i te tauhou.
Tērā e hoki mai te Māori, ā tōna wā, ki te kimi i aua mea i whiua atu e ia ki wīwī, ki wāwā. Ko te Pākehā anake i tahuri ki te pupuri i ngā kura huna, i ngā reo a ngā kaumātua
Ka maranga a Tama, ka kuhu i ana kaka, ka haere ki te parakuihi.
Ka tae ki waho ki te moana, kātahi a Māui ka maranga ake i roto i te riu o te waka
Puehu katoa i a ia e ūkui ana i ngā mahi i te papatuhi, i tuhia ki te tioka.
Ka mate te hue nei, te ihi ora
Whakahipa ki tahaki kei mau koe
E whakahipa ana ahau i te kōrero a Tamihana Tikitere i roto i Te Toa Takitini e kī nei, ko Te Ngae te whenua tuatahi i noho ai a Te Hapimana, i tīmata ai te whakapono ki waenganui i a Te Arawa. E kī ana ahau kāore, ko Te Koutu kē te whenua tuatahi
Homai koa te naihi nā.
Ko hea te wāhi e kōrero nā kōrua?
He rawe kē te mea nā.
He kaha rawa te hamuti heihei horomata mō te ruirui ki te māra - me ranu ki te pātītī maroke, ki te maramara rākau, ka waiho mō tētahi wā.
Ko te taimana tētahi o ngā āhua horomata o te waro.
Ko ngā āhuatanga ka pā ki te tamaiti i te whanaketanga, koirā anō pea ka tukuna ki āna ake ā tōna wā.
Ka peke i te tahataha, ka tau atu ki te āria.
He pō haitutu, he pō e hēmanawa ai te tangata.
Arā te rongoā mō te maninohea, ko te haere ki te hararei.
Na, ka whakawhiti a Kupe i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, ā, ka whiti
Nā te mangungu i mōhio ai ia he tino kākahu rangatira ēnei.
Ka kōwiria te kōhao mō te patui ki te pūrori, ki raro paku iho rānei i te pūrori o te mere.
Tīkina he tarutaru hei uwhiuwhi mō ngā kete
He kiwitea te auahi e puta ake ana i te timera.
He paketai i kawea mai e tai teka.
Kia kaua rawa taku tamaiti e kai hēki, e kai pīnati rānei - koirā te takenga mai o tana mate pāwera.
Kua mate pāwera au i te hae - koinei au e tihetihe nei, e ngāngā nei.
E hūtoi tonu ana ngā rākau nei, ahakoa te nui o te wairākau kua hoatu - he aha rā te mate?
He mahi kino tēnā, te whakarōriki i te hunga hauā.
He ripanga parāoa ki Kauaeranga
Kua haere rātou ki te āta tirotiro i te wheketere whakanao peita.
E whakanaoa mai ana aua kākahu i tāwāhi, i ngā whenua e utua ai ngā kaimahi ki te kongakonga noa iho.
Me ū koe ki ngā ture hīrawerawe a te kaunihera, kei whainahia koe.
E taurapirapi ana ngā tamariki pēnei i te ngeru nei.
Haere ana i te mahanatanga o te rā ki te whare o Ihipohete, i a ia e okioki ana i te poutūmārōtanga
Ka mahia ngā whakamātau ki ngā pītauira kia kitea ko wai o rāua te pāpara o te pēpi.
Me aro te kaikōrero ki te hunga turi, kia kite ai rātou i tōna waha e kōrero ana.
Rā te puke te whakanamunamu mai rā i te pae.
Ka hauhauaitu ahau, he pōuri nō roto i a au
Kīhai ki tāna, nā tōna pāpā i hanga te whare rā.
E mōhiotia ana kei te raruraru koe, me pēhea tā mātou āwhina atu?
Kātahi aua kāho wehikē ka papā, ka mura hoki ngā kāho nei me te whare tonu atu
Ka oriori i tana ngāoriori hei whakamoe i tana pēpi.
Rongo hīrea ake ahau ki te tangata e karanga mai nei
I mau te rare ki tōku pikiarero.
Me tanu ngā whēkau o te hipi, ka whakatō rākau ki runga - mā reira e matomato ai te tipu.
Ka puta te rū ki aua moutere, ka pakaru i konei taua maunga i te puia, tanumia iho te tāone nui o aua moutere ki raro i te whenua
Ko te toroa uta nāku i tautara ki te akerautangi
Me tautara he pīhuka ki te pakitara hei iringa mō te whakaahua nei.
Koi hikaia koe ki te ahi o te ruhi, ki te ahi o te ngenge, ki te ahi o te whakamatiti
Ka titiro korotaha te hōiho ki te ngaru
Nō te whakatatanga mai o te hoariri, ka oma ngā tautauā.
Kua paruheti katoa ō kākahu i tō aihikirīmi.
He tangata paruheti.
Ko te mākoi anake tēnei, kua kore he kai o roto.
Kārekau he mea kotahi o te ao, e kore e whakatakotoria he tikanga mōna
Ka moe tahurangi au mō māua ko tētahi o aku hoa kei tāwāhi e haere ana.
Oho ake ki te ao, he moe tahurangi noa, e haere tonu ana koe.
He tongi noa te waka rererangi e whakangaro ana ki te huapae.
Kia kahikātoa koe e tama ki te hāpai rākau.
He kainga i te kai, e kore a Paeko e herea; he karanga riri, a Paeko ka herea
Ka here i tana atua kia kore ai e kino mai.
Kia tika ngā kai, kia rahi te moe, kia kaha anō te korikori, mā reira e hinga ai a Tūhauwiri i a Tūhauora.
Koia i rōnaki atu ai ngā ngākau mōwai noa ki a koe
Ko tō koutou mana ehara i te mea whānako, he mea hou ki runga ki ō koutou tīpuna
Kei te tawhātanga i runga ake nei tētahi puna tāoruoru, he puna takaoriori nō ngā poaka.
Ahakoa hanga iti taku māra, kia oti te pūkeri kua amuamu te tuarā.
Nō nakua tonu nei i tau mai ai, kua haere kē ki te whakatōmene i te tāone.
He tangata pākehakeha tērā ki te haka, he rite ki te heihei!
Ko te reo Māori tūturu ake nō tēnei whenua, me te reo haramai nō waho, arā te reo Ingarihi
Nā te noho o te reo Ingarihi hei reo kura i hōrapa ai te whakaaro ko te kōrero Ingarihi te huarahi ki te whai rawa, ki te whakamana i te tangata
Ka waipuke ana te awa ka kī tonu te wai i te kenepuru.
Tīnohitia te ika
Ka rautaongia ngā kai, kātahi ka tīnohitia.
I pēnei ngā tāngata o Motueka me te poaka whāereere e arumia ana e ngā kūao
Aru haere atu au i te awa nei, ā, tino roa, ka rongo au i ngā kurī nei e tautau ana
E aru ana i tō te Pākehā mahi ngaki, he nui ngā wāhi whenua kua taiepatia e rātou
Me tiri ki te iwi katoa, kia rongo ai tēnā me tēnā i ngā painga.
Kainga ana ngā pirau o te tāpoa o Uenuku e te kurī a Tamatekapua
Te āhua nei i mahia ngā kōwhao i te taonga nei ki te hōrete.
E kōrangaranga ana te pāpā ki tana tama, he kore nō te tama e whai i ngā tohutohu, he whakaputa mōhio hoki.
Moea te tangata ringa raupā.
He miro te rongoā. Me tapahi te rākau, ka rere mai te hāpiapia ka pani i te motu, i te ringa i te waewae raupā rānei, ka takai ki te harakeke
E kemokemo mai ana ki te tohu mai kia nohopuku au.
He maha noa atu ngā awaawa me ngā kokorutanga puta noa ki tētahi taha ki tētahi taha, ā, kei ngā tahataha o aua awaawa me aua kokorutanga ngā kāinga tangata e tū ana
Kua ngawaki atu ngā turi ki raro
Ka keho te mōkai rā, ka onga i te kāhui.
Kaua e waiho te paraikete nā ki waho, kei manoku i te tōmaiwhenua.
Ki te tū tō waewae i te whao waikura, me haere kia werohia ki te rongoā kia kore ai koe e pāngia e te kauae timu.
Arā anō tētahi ingoa Pākehā mō te kauae timu, ko te 'kauae raka'.
Kei konā ngā pā uruhanga hei pupuri i ngā wīwī me ngā raupō ka horahia hei moenga.
Ka ngaro rā ē, taku whakakai marihi
Ko tōku reo, tōku ohooho, tōku māpihi maurea, tōku whakakai marihi
E whāoko ana i te ngaunga a te puruhi.
Ānō he pounamu kei ngā karupango e titiwha ana
Nō reira e takoto noa a Tuna i te horehoretua, kāhore he wai
I meatia atu ōna mea tapu ki roto ki te hāngi kai, hei tāiro i a ia; kia hoki mai ai ōna atua ki te kai i a ia
He ngoru tana mōunu hei hī kōkopu.
He mea mohani te hiako o te rākau e te nanenane, arā, ki ana pihi.
Na, kua mahiti te kōwhitiwhiti i tōna aroaro; titiro rawa atu ia e tū mai ana i waho i te moana, kua whakakōhatu kē
Ka ngapu ngā tāngata ki te oma
Rekareka ana te kōtiro ki tana kaka māwhero hou.
Ka aroha te hunga pōhara e noho rā ki ngā wharau karukaru i te taha tonu o te rua para.
Pūmau tonu ia ki te pupuri i ngā whenua mō te iwi, kei riro i te kāwanatanga ka noho pōhara te iwi, ka waiho hei pononga mā te Pākehā
Anei te ruri ka haere tahi ki te tara koekoeā. 'Ka haere, ka haere a Pāora, ki te wero kūkū, ki te wero kākā, ka tangi te tara koekoeā.'
Ka wehi taua iwi ki ōna kanohi, ānō i tāia ki te tākou te whero
Kua rite ngā peita me ngā paraihe mō te tā pikitia.
He rangi paihuarere, he oranga wairua.
Nā te paihuarere i puta atu mātou ki te moana uriuri hī ika ai.
Ngā pouhihiri ki te mau hau
Nō te ngaromanga o aku tamariki, ka pā te āwangawanga ki a au.
Kōmai ana te whānau kua hoki tū mai tā rātou tamaiti i te pakanga.
Ka mate te tangata tāroaroa ki te ngunu kia kore ai tana rae e tuki ki te pare o te kūaha.
Ko Tāwhao te hākoro o Tūrongo, ko Pūnui-a-te-kore tana whaea.
Māmā noa te tātā i te tōtara, i te mea ka hahae noa.
Ko te tumu herenga waka
Ko te mahi a te koroua rā he hīkoi i te ngahere, he noho i runga tumu ki te kohi whakaaro, ki te mōteatea.
E tuapa ana ngā kūao i te taiapa.
He whare haumākū a roto, he pōuri, kāore he putanga hau kia ngaro ai te pūmāhu me te mōrūruru
E 458 ngā eka o te ngāherehere kua oti te tope, me te rui ki te karaihe
Nō te 11 o Māehe te haerenga atu o Hōne Heke ki te tope anō i te pou kara
Ka kōutu mātau i te wai ki roto i ngā pākete, ka kī, kua maumau ki runga ake ki te whare kaukau, kua riringi
Engari i mea i a ia anō kia pōaha, ka mau ki te āhua o te pononga, ka meinga kia rite ki te tangata
Ka whakaritea he mahi mā te kaiparo, mea ake, kua whakangaro i a ia.
E mākū ana a konei, me tapanihi atu mā korā.
E umere ana te iwi i te taenga ake o te kōrero kua mutu te pakanga.
Me ohu te rauwiri i te whenua nei kia awe te mutu.
E whakakāti ana i tana matua kia mutu tana patupatu i tō rātou whaea.
Ka rangatahitia e ia te whenua roa
Mā te rangatahi rawa i ngā konga e kore ai e wera ngā raparapa.
He nui te toto i maringi i te kuratōpuni.
Te ingoa o tōna pā ko Whakarewa, he pā nui hoki, he maioro nunui hoki ngā maioro
Kore rawa he rerenga, ka titiro kau iho ngā tāngata o roto i te pā ki ērā o rātou e patua ana ki te moana
Ko te kūmara ka horo haere tonu i te huarahi
E kore e roko hāpainga ka horo anō ngā ngohi ki raro
I te hui o te rā whakanui i tana ekenga ki te iwa tekau tau i te marae o Ōmāhu, e hia rau kē ngā tāngata i puta ake
Kei te Tāite, te ono o Pēpuere, te rā whakanui i Te Tiriti o Waitangi
I whakatauhia anō hoki me waiho ko te tau 1995 hei tau whakanui i te reo Māori - tōna ora, tōna mau, tōna kōrerotia tonutia
Kua kōnakinaki haere ngā ao o ngā rōhi, taihoa ka puāwai.
Kua rīraparapa noa iho ngā makawe, kāore e matara ki te heru
Ka waiho te kākahu tōpuni hai tāpui nō aua manu
Ka iri te ingoa o Te Pēhi puta noa i Te Urewera.
Ka werohia atu te kī ki te raka, ka hurihia, ka tuwhera mai te tatau.
Ka wareware i a ia ngā tau o te raka o tana pahikara.
Ka tuku ētahi o mātau, ka haere atu ki te kēti. Aue! Kei te raka
Raka rawa te kūaha o te whare ki te tīni
Rakaina te kūaha ka haere ana koe.
Ka whakatūria he mahau hei whakaruru mō te waka.
Kāore i huna te kaka tino tangata
Kaua tāua e haere i te ara kōpikopiko, kei mate taku puku.
Me te huruhuru manu ka rere i te hau
He mea puhi te māhunga ki te huru kererū, me ngā huruhuru huia anō
Mā te tūāraki e kawe te aroha ki te tau kua wehe nei ki te tonga.
Mārama ana te kite atu i te kauika tohorā e pupuha mai ana i waho.
Kei te marae te ika takoto a Tiki e tīraha mai rā.
Ānō he pounamu kei ngā karu pango e titiwha ana
Mā koutou te waka e waha i a au e whakamau atu ana i te wīra pai.
Kua kaurerehu, ākuanei te ua ai.
E whātero mai ana te pakoko i te ihu o te waka.
Nā te kaiako tēnei kaupapa nui i whakatakoto hei matapaki mā ngā tauira.
I te tau 1854 ka whānau anō he tamaiti tāne kīhai i ora
Arā te tamaiti tāne e tū mai rā ko ia kei te wero i a mātau, i te manuhiri tūārangi
I a Āpirana e kimi kaiārahi ā-takiwā nei hei pou tokomanawa mō tana kaupapa ahu i ngā whenua Māori, i heipū tonu tana kite i te pai o Whina mō te mahi nei
Te waka i a Te Mana, hei hoe ki runga rā, ki te tonga
Ki te whakaponohia e te tangata ngā kōrero hangahanga noa nei, he aha tōna huanga? He maumau whakarongo kau, kāhore kau hoki he pai e puta ake
He aha te huanga o te mahi whakatū komiti?
Taihoa! Kauaka hei kaiwhiti! Ki te āta haere, ka nui te ika ki a tāua.
Ka tata rāoa te kurī, he kaiwhiti nōna kia whakatata atu ia ki te kurī kei mua atu i a ia e haere ana.
Nāna ērā kai te rama, me te wehikē, engari nō te rarurarutanga i te pāparakāuta i Manaia i te tau 1879, mutu tonu atu tana kai waipiro
Ko te tangata e kore ana e kite ngahau i tōna kāinga ake ka haere ki te pāparakāuta rapu ngahau ai māna, haurangi ai, whakapau ai i āna moni hei whakangahau i ērā atu tāngata
Ka pānui ia i te tuhinga a tana mokopuna me te kata i ana kōrero.
Whakarākeitia ai te māhunga o te tangata whai mana ki ngā hikumaro o te huia.
He kāroti, he rētihi, te tame a te rāpeti.
I ngā wā o nehe i kī ngā matatuhi, kōrero anō ai te whaitiri ki a rātou, arā, ko tā ngā matatuhi he whakarongo ki te whaitiri ka whakamārama atu ai ki te iwi
I tino mōhio ia ki ō rātou punanga i Ruahine, i ngā hikuawa o Ngaruroro
Taku kōmata, taku kahurangi pīataata
Kakea ana e ia ngā pātū o te whare herehere, ka rere
I te kaha pōhara kua mate ia ki te whakakuene kai hei whāngai i ana tamariki.
He whakakuene tā mātou ki a koe, arā he kākahu mō mātou
Ka hopī a Wī i tana kitenga i te kēhua, ka oma.
E whakapaetia ana nā tētahi tipu i pukupuku ai te kiri.
Moemiti ana te iwi ki a Rāwiri, otiia hae ana a Haora ki a ia, ā rapua ana kia patua
Kua peto te hinu o te waka, kua mate tāua ki te haere mā raro ki te tiki hinu anō.
I tana poroporoaki ka mea atu me whakamutu tā rātau mahi whakahoahoa ki te Hauhau
E ai ki te hōtaka, e toru ngā kapa ka tū i mua i a tātou.
Me ū tātou katoa ki te hōtaka, ki te kore, ka takahē ngā wāhanga o te kaupapa.
Kotahi noa te matapihi iti, koirā i pōuri ai te rūma.
Me papani ngā mokotawhā kia kore ai ngā kiore e urutomo mai.
Kua waiwai noa iho taku waha i te kakara o te tītī totetote me te pūhā e tunu mai ana.
Mehemea kua rahi ake te puku o te tangata, mā te tātua tonu e whakaatu mai.
Whakahīhī atu a ia i te otinga o te tātua tāniko mō Hōne, me te tīpare tāniko mō Hēni
He pū hurihuri ā māua, e tautau ana i ō māua tātua
Māna e rangaranga ngā mate o ngā iwi nei
I tū ia hei takawaenga i ngā tautohetohe ki ngā kairūri i te rohe o Tauranga
Ko te hiahia o Wī Tako, kia noho ia hei takawaenga i roto i ēnei tū āhua. Kāore ia i whakaae kia haere he ope taua o Te Āti Awa ki Taranaki
I mua atu i a koe ko te kaipuke iti a Kāpene Kuku, ōna hoe he kōmaru, i whiti mai ai i te moana tuauriuri, tau ana ki ngā wai o Hauraki
I taua pō tonu, ka kauhoe atu te wheke, ā, puta noa ki te moana tuauriuri
Kia mārinorino te wai, kua haere tāua ki te hī.
He ngongo i ngā ringaringa, he mea mahi ki te tūpākihi, he mea ore te uho o roto kia kore
Ko te ngongo e tango ana i ngā hūare kia kore ai te tangata e rāoa i te wā e mahia ana ōna niho.
Ka haere pūnui te rāngai tohorā, kāore e haere wehewehe.
Kua ngaro i a au aku kī ki tō tāua whare.
He tino pai te mahi a tama ki te ahu i tana kūao hipi.
He tangata whakatarapī ia, he tangata whakapehapeha
He māmā ake te whakamahi i te tītaha hei tua rākau.
Kīhai hoki i hamumu te waha, he whakamā nōna.
Ka hamumu atu te māngai o tuawahine ki te kuia raka, ka mea atu ia, 'Kei whea koia te kāinga o Te Whatuiāpiti?'
Me kore ake te kaiwhakaaweawe i pūmau tonu ai te aroha i waenga i te tokorua i mawehe.
He aha ngā ngeni kei roto i te wai nei?
He taitama tāroaroa ia i taua wā, he tangata ātaahua, he tangata ngahau tonu, ā, i ētehi wā tē taea e ia te pēhi te mahi hīanga
He tamaiti hūngoingoi a Toarangatira i te wā e iti rawa ana ia
Ka kapea e ia te reta, ka kuhuna atu te tauira ki te kōnae.
Kua kitea mai tētahi wahine tino ātaahua nei te reo, koi nei te hinengaro, me ōna āhuatanga katoa e tutuki ai i a ia ngā mahi, ā, koinā māua ko taku wairua e uruhau nei, e ora nei
I ngā rā o mua, ka haea te mata ki te toroa, ināianei, kua tahuri ētahi tohunga tā ki te ngira hiko.
Puritia tō kauri hei ō matenga mōu
Kua kaumātua a Murakareke, e tata ana ia te mate, ka patua te kurī hei ō matenga mōna
Ehara i te waka tōkau, he whakarei anō
He kanohi tōkau, kāore ōna whakanikoniko.
Ka haria te hui ki Pārua i te putanga tonu o Rotorua.
Mā te karu whārahi ka kitea ngā āhuatanga mōkitokito o te pūtau kararehe me te pūtau tipu.
E rongo ana au i te ami o te hāngi.
I te ngārara nei e kari ana i tōna huarahi ki roto i te kiri, ka māeneene te kiri, ka tīmata te raraku a te tamaiti
He tangata pūhihi noa te hanga o Pōkiha, he tangata tū takotako, tau kē nei hoki ki te mau kaka
Ka mihi mai ki a au, 'Tēnā koe, e Hēmi'
Kua haere mai ki te rūrū ki a au, ki te mihi mai
Me āta haere i te huarahi pāhiwihiwi, kei porowhiua koe e tō pahikara.
Ka rongo ia i te motupaika e haruru mai ana, ka oma ki te whakatuwhera i te kēti.
Kāore au i whiwhi i te 50 ōrau i te whakamātautau, nā reira, ka hē pea.
Ka muna rāua mō ngā āhuatanga o te wā, nāwai rā, kua whakawā i ngā mahi a tō rāua kaiwhakahaere.
Ka noho rātau hei reo mō ngā hapū 16 ki te 18 rānei, e hia nei ngā rau tāngata o aua hapū nei, e whai take katoa ana ki te whenua
I a rātou e kai ana i te umu kōtore, ka tū mai te matua o te mea wahine ki te kōrero ki te iwi.
Hei rānaki i te matenga o Te Pūoho, ka tukuna e Taiaroa a Miriama hei wahine mā Paremata, me ngā mere pounamu e rua
E toru ka whakaraua ki te toru, ka noho ko te iwa.
He nui te wharawhara o te pūkaea.
E pakepakē ana ngā papa o te whare nei i te kaha o te hau.
Ka tāraia he rākau hei ripi pāua
I kōrero mai anō tētahi o aku tāina ki a au, i kōrerotia atu anō e tō mātou pāpā ki a ia, kua kōhurutia e ia tō mātou whaea whakaangi
Pērā ai koe me te mōkai kākā e noho rā i tana pae, ā ka puta te pōkai kākā
Ka tengatenga taku tuketuke
Ka pā te pōniti ki a au ina eke au i ngā waka rere moari.
Kei konā rātou katoa e inoi ana kia whāmutu a tama uaua i tana mahi, he aha te aha.
E tama. Te waha pakaru rā. Ka mahue te waiho mai ki ngā mea mōhio. Ana — kua pakaru ngā hamuti
Ka hē te raranga ki te pungata te harakeke.
Ka pungata te toetoe o te whare
E whātare mai rā te tāwhana i tua o te hiwi.
Pō iho ai, ka whiti mai a Hinemoa ki Mokoia
Ka ārautia te kararehe ki te kupenga kia kore ai e oma.
Nā ngā pirita me ngā akaaka au i ārau, ānō he ringaringa e mātua pupuri ana i a au.
He tino hōhonu te moana, he roa, he whānui hoki, e kaha ai te huna o ngā momo ika katoa
He pai ngā moenga whānui o ēnei rā - kāore e kōpā te takoto tahi ki tō hoa.
Whāia te mea e koroutia ana e te ngākau, me kore rā e ea tō wawata.
Kei te hui te karu o Rangi, ānō nei kei te kimokimo mai ia ki a au.
He iti kē iho te tokonui o taku waewae mauī i tō te mea matau.
Haere ngaro atu a Hine ki te kite i tana whakaaweawe i waenganui pō.
Ka hokona ngarotia taua moana ki te Pākehā e ētahi anō o ngā Māori, ko te utu £800
Nā te mea he tūpuhi tōna hanga i rawe ia hai tioke
Rite tonu te kōwhaiwhai puhoro rā ki ngā ngaru nunui o Whāingaroa moana i mua i te whatinga.
I te ohonga ake he rangi takō, ahiahi rawa kua kōmaru.
Kia mōhio koe, e te tangata pūremu, e whakamana ana i te hiahia a tōu kīngi, a Hātana, kia oti tētahi mekameka hei here i a koe
Ko te pito whakamutunga o te taura punga o te kaipuke, he mekameka toru inihi te mātotoru.
E whewhera mai ana te hāte o tama whakameremere, he mekameka koura pīataata kei tana kakī.
Kua tū i te tao a Hatupatu
Ka tū ia i te pū, waimarie kāore i mate.
Kotahi tētahi wahine i tū te māhunga i te pine, ā mate tonu atu
Kāore noa iho he kiko o ō tātau tātai rangatira, kua mārama kohekohe te tū mai a te tipuna nei a waha paraikete i te rori, me te tangi kau o te mapu i te rā o te waru
Ki konei tātou kōkewa noa ai i te rā o te waru
Ka rongo te kurī rā i te haunga whenua
He nui tonu ngā momo kurī, he mohoao ētahi.
Ka pai te kīnaki kikini pērā i te pīkara hei hoa mō ngā kai kōwhau.
Ka āhua tāheha tonu pea tō kete tuatahi, engari kāore e roa ka pai haere.
He tohu tana kiri tāingoingo i mahi ia i waho, i raro i te rā, mō ngā tau maha.
E topaki ana te wakatopa i te rangi me te whai o tana ramaroa i te tangata kino.
Me hanga e tāua he rīanga ki kō, kia kore ai e kitea atu te whare heihei rā.
Te kai i pura ai te kanohi o Tahuaroa
Heoi anō te kai e pahure i ō tātau nei huinga maha, i ō te iwi Māori, he pūhaehae, he tautohetohe mātauranga
Ka maringi te inu, ka huarapa kia kapi katoa te tēpu.
He mea whakarākei te kanohi ki te kōkōmuka, he tuhi kōnekeneke.
Kia maha ngā tau hāwere, kia iti ngā tau nihoroa.
'E kai rā e hoa.' 'E tama, he mōtī nōku, kāore au e kaha ki te kai'
I kī rā au, ka pau i a au ngā mea e toru, ko tētahi wāhi noa iho o te mea kotahi; mōtī tonu atu au
Aua hoki mātou e kawea kia whakawaia; engari whakaorangia mātou i te kino
He mea tuku mai rātou e te Pākehā hei whakawai i te iwi Māori, kia mahue ai ā rātou mahi Māori
Kua riakaria taku kakī, koinei e uaua nei te huri i taku māhunga.
He kī kau tāku e kore hoki e piri te uku ki te rino
Piri katoa mai ngā korakora rino o roto i te kirikiri ki te aukume.
Pērā anō ngā hui nunui, te whakatuwhera wharenui, wharekai rānei
Ko wai e tika ana hei whakatuwhera i te pukapuka, hei wāwāhi i ōna hiri?
Ai, e hoa mā, me hoki tātou. Hurihia mai te poti. Kia horo
Ka tō te rā, ka pōuriuri, taihoa ka pō.
E hika mā, kei te raumati a konei, hei te whitu ka tō te rā
Kua momohe katoa ngā pāpāringa, kua rua kē ngā kauae.
I te whatinga o te ringa ka momohe tonu mō ētahi marama.
He maha ngā puninga o te iwi Koori o Ahitereiria, he motuhake anō ō rātou reo.
He kuru tongarerewa
E tā, kawea atu tētahi wai mōku
Kua more noa ngā kutikuti i te nui o te onepū e mau ana ki te wūru o ngā hipi.
Ka pakoiretia te weka
Ka tauhou koe ki tētahi tāone nui, ka whirinaki rawa atu koe ki te mahere whenua o taua tāone.
Kua whenumi ngā rare kia kore ai ngā tamariki e kite.
Anō te hūmārie, te marutuna o te wahine nei
Kātahi ka tahuri mai ka kōwhetewhete noa mai ki a mātou ki tōna reo pai nei, reo Pākehā (arā, reo marutuna)
Waerea te marutuna, waerea te maruwehi
Ka hū te wai ka pupū ake ngā mirumiru.
Kei te pupuhi mirumiru ngā tamariki i waho.
Kua kī katoa tana tāpu kaukau i te mirumiru.
Ka tae te wharaunga ki te kōawa, ka whakangā, kātahi ka haere anō i tā rātou haere.
Ka porowhiua te rākau, ka oma te kurī ki te tiki.
Me uaua ka kitea te pepe tī kōuka nā te rite o ngā parirau ki ngā rau mate o taua rākau.
He kōpēpē tonu te waea konukura.
Ka kitea te kuia e raumaewa noa ana, ka whakahokia ki tō tana tamāhine.
Kua whakatinana mai te kune, te kākano i ruia mai i Rangiātea.
E rere kūpapapapa ana te kāhū ki te kimi kai māna.
Tōwhiriwhiri mai te ngotungotu nā kia mārama ai
He mea whakakī te papangarua ki te hune kia mahana ai.
He pai āhua, he tangata ringa kino, kāore i tua atu i tērā.
He ringa kino, ka reia e te tini wāhine.
Ka kōpuketia te wāhi o te māra e whakatipuria ana ngā kamokamo, ngā paukena me ngā mereni.
Haere i ngā rūrūanga a Rangiwhenua
Kei te rakuraku i tana māhunga me te horo mai anō o te māihiihi.
Kāti, kāore e mutu te rakuraku, kei raro kē hoki i te kiri te ngārara nei e huke ana
E auē ana te waha i te mea kua rakurakuhia te kanohi e te ngeru.
Ko ngā wāhine me ngā tamariki e haere noa ana i roto i ngā mahinga kai tawhito rakuraku haere ai, me kore e kitea he taewa, he aha rānei i mahue ki te whenua
Mao ana te mimihau, ka haere anō te tēnehi.
Ka taka atu te niu, ka tau atu ki tana mātenga, ka ngaro te ao mārama i a ia.
Ka taka i a ia te oko, pakaru rikiriki ana.
Engari ngā tāngata hoe poti e wehi ana i taua kurī, mehemea ka riri ia, ka whāia tō poti, ā, ka mau, wāhia iho e ōna niho
Kātahi ka tae mai te whakaeke a Karopiti, nō Kāwhia, hei haumi i a rātou
Koirā te moumouranga i a māua e tamariki ana, kia moe tahi māua hei te pakeketanga.
He anga tōrino tō te ngata me te pūtātara.
He whakairo tōrino te pītau.
He arawhata tōrino kei waenganui tonu o te rūma.
Ko te tikanga me tiaki koe i tō hoahoa i roto i ngā māuiuitanga, ngā pōharatanga, me ērā atu tūmomo uauatanga katoa.
I te tuohutanga o te manu ki te inu, ka ngaro atu te upoko ki te pōtari, ka mau.
He hōiho ngā kaitō o taua parau. E toru awaawa e puare ana i taua parau nei i te mahinga kotahi
Kīhai rawa a tama tunutunu i uru ki te wai, kei ngaua tana kōnui e te pāpaka.
Kotokoto mai ana te wai, whio mai ana te hau i te tēneti ruwha.
Te puna e hū ake rā i raro i te whenua
I ia marama ka tuku kano ngā wharekano o te wahine, ki te hono ki te tātea, kua hapū te wahine.
Arā te wāhi tika mō te uwha pakoro, ko te kōhua!
Ka kākarauri, ka tae mātou ki te kāinga
He ringa houhere, he pātaka kī.
He kōtiro kōpipiri, he nguengue anō hoki.
Kia tākiri te ata, kua korihi ngā manu.
Me noho tonu mai taua whāinga rā hei whakamaunga atu mā tātou kia taea hoki te whenua taurikura ā tōna wā, kia kore ai e noho noa iho mai hei kupu kau ki te ngutu
Kāhore i te kūraruraru ki te moni
Ehara i te mea he aha, heoi anō he whakamōhio noa atu ko te pūtea i pau ki ngā mahi whakarākei whare
I hūnuku a Maru ko tana hapori ki tērā taha o te awa, e noho mai nā ana uri.
Kotahi tētahi wahine i tū te māhunga i te pine, ū mate tonu atu, ko taua wahine i haere ki te hāereere i runga paki i tētahi rangi
He rawe ki taku mokopuna te kai parāoa me te mīere.
Kei tai e kokoti kino ana, i te ngaru tua manomano
Kua kapi katoa tana tinana i te tongi manomano.
Nō ngā manomano tau ki muri tēnei mea, te moko tuauri.
Inā kē te rahi o ngā pīni kākāriki a taku koroua.
I ngā rā o mua i whakahōtaetaetia te tomo atu a te kirimangu ki ngā wāhi i whakaritea mō te kiritea.
Kia maroke te tīreki aruhe, kua tangohia mai i te tītara, kua pūpūhia.
Katoa o konei he moana kōparu, he kore moutere hoki hei ārai atu i te tai.
Ka miti ia i tana kōroa, ka huri i te whārangi.
Kei ngā whārangi 30 ki te 42 ētahi kōrero hei āwhina i a koe ki te whakautu i ngā pātai.
Me noho koe i konei - kaua e onoi ki wāhi kē.
I kohia ngā rau o te raupō hei ato i te tuanui o te whare.
He rākau whana, mea ake whati.
Kua whana te matira a tērā rā - he ika rānei, he rimurimu noa rānei kua mau i a ia?
Kei te rēhia; e teka ana, e kū ana, e whai ana
Kia riki rawa ka haere ai ki te rama kōura.
Nō te tuakitanga o te puku o te taniwha, ka horo mai ngā pounamu a te hunga kua kainga e ia.
Ka tiaina he titi ki tahi pito, ki tahi pito, kātahi ka herea he tuaina ki waenganui hei tohu i te wāhi e whakatūria ai te taiapa.
Me kuhu tō kenakena ina haere tāua ki te karakia ā te Rātapu.
Ka hinga ki raro rā, ki te pōuriuri ki te pō oti atu ki a Ruaimako
Kua taupiripiri te aroākapa o te hunga mautohe, i tā rātou hīkoi atu ki te whare pāremata.
He rawe ki a ia kia kapi katoa ana hēki i ngā kora pepa.
E rima putu, tekau mā tahi īnihi te tāroa o Hēmi i tēnei wā
Haria ēnei reta ki te poutāpeta.
Mā te poutāpeta e ine te taumaha o te pouaka, me te whakapiri atu i ngā pane kuīni e tika ana.
Ka ponoa atu e ngā wāhine, 'Kāhore ia tōu tāne e haere ki te mahi kai'
He tangata hūmārie, ngākau aroha a Pine, manawanui hoki ki āna tauira
Ka waiho mā ngā rehe e peita ngā kōwaiwai ki ngā heke o te wharenui hou.
E tautūtakitaki ana te manuhiri i mua o te whakaeke ki runga i te marae.
Kaua e haria a Hine ki te hī ika - ka hiaruaki ia i te tai tāwakawaka noa.
He rawe te whenua tāwakawaka nei hei whakatū whare - kāore e hiwihiwi rawa, kāore e papatairite rawa.
Mutu rawa ake, na kua whakapuke te onepū, kua tāwakawaka
I tārehu kau te waka, pēnei me te waka wairua nei.
Ka whakatūria he tīramaroa ki waho atu o te more hei whakatūpato i ngā waka e hipa atu ana i te pō.
Tērā ētahi kaipatapatai tino koi nei ngā pātai, he mōhio ki te kutētē mai i ngā kōrero whai kiko.
Me kaipatapatai mōhio ki te uiui i te hunga kaumātua.
Tuke kau nei te roa o te ara
Tuke kau nei te toa - me haere tāua mā raro.
He ioio te oneone o te whenua nei
Kua ngongohe ngā pikopiko i te wera o te rā.
Ka pahure te iwi rā, ka riro, ka hoki ora atu ki tōna kāinga
Ka teatea katoa au ka haere ana au ki te rata niho, he mōhio nōku he mamae kei te haere.
Ka rarā te waha o te wai kai roto i te kopia, ka ngunguru te wai
Kāti te moki! Ka kī ō pūkahukahu i te paihana!
Kātahi ka huhura te iwi rā ki waho o te whare, ki te mātakitaki i te toa
He mea wehe anō te māra tapu, ko te matakā tērā, arā, tērā ingoa te matakā he mātāmua
Ko te hunga e whāia nuitia ana i roto i ngā mahi whakatairanga i te reo Māori, ko te iwi Māori tonu ka tahi, ko te whānuitanga atu o Aotearoa, ka rua
Inā hoki he nui rawa tō whakatairanga i a koe kia rangona e te motu katoa, kia kī ai ko koe te tino tangata mōhio o te motu nei mō te Paremete
Kīhai ia i kimi ki te whakatairanga i a ia anō, i te kaupapa rānei o tana whāinga
Oho ake ki te ao, mapu kau au ki taku moenga
Anea kau ana te whenua mō te whakapono te take.
Ka noho ngā tamariki ki te whakarōpū i ngā tipu, i ngā ngārara i kohia e rātou i te taiao awa.
E noho mai ana te rua tekau tāngata i te tēpu tāroaroa.
Kāore he korokoro ngenengene atu i tō te korukoru.
Kua haere atu ngā tūtei tiaki kararehe ki te whakatūpato i te tangata e tūkarikari rā i ana hōiho. Ki te kore e pai ake, ka haria ia ki te ture.
Ko te mate o te hoko waka tawhito, kāore koe e tino mōhio mēnā kua tūkarikarihia e ōna rangatira o mua, pēhea kē rānei.
Whakakōrerohia ngā mea nguengue, kia mōhiotia ai ngā whakaaro o te katoa.
Ko te toharite o te 4, te 7 me te 7, ko te 6, inā hoki, ko te 18 te tapeke ina tāpiria, ina wehea ki te 3 (i te mea e toru aua tau), ka puta ko te 6.
Q. He aha te tau toharite o tēnei huinga raraunga: {2,2,3,3,4,4,6,8}? A. Ko te 4.
Ko te pāmahana toharite i Tāmaki i te marama kua taha, ko te 11.4°.
Ko ngā poapoa i te tuanui e tohu ana i ngā wāhi i pipī mai ai te ua ki roto i te whare.
Kua nekeneke te ngutu o te kōawa ki te tonga.
Ko taku maunga, ko Hikurangi, ehara i te maunga nekeneke
Kia tūpato i a koe e nekeneke ana i te tangata kua whara, kei hē kē atu tana mate.
Mai i te matenga o tana hoa, kua koroukore, kua kore i hiahia whai wāhi atu ki ngā kaupapa kua roa e tautokona ana e ia.
Ka kitea ngā tāngata torutoru i muri rawa o te mātua, ka tīpaoa ērā, ka huna anō.
Mate i te tamaiti, he aurukōwhao; mate i te wahine, takerehāia
He takerehāia nō te mate, he mate nui whakaharahara
Ka mea te tangata ki te patu ki tana hani, ka tuia e te hoariri, ka mau.
He mea puhi te waka ki te rau kererū.
E hine rānei, e puhi ki te kakara
Ka huakina te kūaha ka pākia mai e tētahi haunga, ka mōhio iho kua rua rā tana ngeru e hamarurutia ana ki rō whare.
E manawapā ana ahau ki te kōrero, kāhore hoki he mea hei hoatutanga māku ki a ia
Nā te uaua pea hoki o te kitea o te moni ka manawapā tātou ki te moumou noa iho i ā tātou hereni
He kore tangata hei whakahirihiri te riro ai te pēke parāoa
Ka tino pōuri mai ana ngā ipu o te rangi he marangai pea kei te haere.
Kauwhautia mai te kauwhau o te kino i pū ai te riri
Karekau aku kākahu papai pēnā i ōu nā.
Ā, me pēnā anō ko mātou.
He aha i pēnā ai tō kōrero?
Ki te whawhakina pēnātia, ka marū - me pēnei kē.
Kei te matarukuruku au ki a koe, he kore nōu e āwhina, e whai whakaaro ki tētahi atu i tua atu i a koe!
Ka whiua atu ngā mānuka ki te taha o te rāihe, ka rite ki ngā wāwā o te pā te teitei
Ka arumia atu, ka ngāwari te puhipuhi i ngā kaiaru nō te mea i hangā he rāihe kaha ki muri o Ruapekapeka hei waonga i a rātou ngā hōia
Ko te whakautu a Mihi ki tērā ko te tātai mai i tōna whakapapa i a Tamatekapua o Te Arawa waka, ka kī, ka teina kē a Mita ki a ia. Ko tana huringa atu tēnā i tana tuarā, kātahi ka whakapohane atu me te kī atu kia kaua a ia e whakaiti i te wahine, i te mea, i puta mai ia i ngā kūwhā o te wahine
I tētehi o ngā hui, ka whakawhiua rāua ki te haka ngutu momoho, me te mutunga mai o te whakamanioro i te tangata, arā, ka whakapohane mai ngā wāhine ki a rāua
Ka whānau mai tā rāua ariki, he kōtiro, nā wai ā, ka wahine, ka rongonui mō te mau patu, mō te tito kaioraora.
He kupu mārama rawa aua kupu a Te Tamihana, ā he tangata tika a ia ki te whakaatu kōrero
Ki te tukua mai ā koutou pukapuka tono whakawā mō ō koutou whenua ki tēnei Tari, kia mārama te tuhituhi mai
Kaku - he kuka nō te harakeke kua tākirihia te whītau, te muka
Ka kākarawera te pā harakeke ki te whiua ngā kaku ki te ahi.
E toru ngā āhua o te matū - ko te totoka, ko te wē, me te haurehu.
He matū taumaha tonu te nuinga o ngā toka.
Ina māhinahina katoa ngā kapua, he tohu ua.
Ka houhia te rongo, ka tukuna ngā pononga kua rua tau e mauheretia ana kia hoki ki ō rātou whenua ake.
Ko te mahi a te tia nei he tukituki i te tangata nei, kātahi ka hopukia e ia ngā pihi o te tia nei, ko ōna hoa he nui atu te mataku
Ka mau ngā pihi o te nanenane ki te taiapa, he mahi nui ki te wewete mai.
Ka hapū anō, ka materoto, whakatahe tonu
Tērā tētehi nehenehe i runga o Maungaroa, i Hawaiki, i tanumia tētehi tamaiti whakatahe ki reira
E whatā ake ana e te ngako o taua ngārara nei
Kotahi te Atua o te Kawenata Tawhito, ā tae mai ki te Kawenata Hou kotahi hoki te Atua o ngā mea katoa, i runga i te Rangi i te Whenua
Ka kino ōna moko, tapā tōna ingoa ko Moko Hikuwaru
He hanga hikuwaru - kāore i ōrite tētahi taha ki tētahi.
Kātahi anō ka ruku, ka mahi te tangata rā, ā, ka kī te hao
Ka hia te roa o te kapu hekaheka nei ki tō rūma?
He tohunga anō taku pāpā ki te pepe manu ki te rau karamū.
Kua kawea te ahi e te uru-mā-raki ki te tonga-mā-rāwhiti.
He tuatahi kē tēnei mōna ki te hiki i te pēpē, koirā i rorirori ai. Taihoa ka taunga.
Kāore au e mahira ki te tangata kua tae ki ngā tōpito katoa o te ao - kāore hoki au i te paku hiahia haere ki tāwāhi.
He taewa pūkeko ēnei - nō tērā tau kē i hauhakea ai.
I a rāua tahi e rere mai ana i runga i tō rāua hōiho, hūpekea ana e Te Reiwhati te pātatara
Kua tekau hāora ia e āta tuhi ana i ngā kōrero i mau ki te rīpene - nā whai anō ia i whakakuru ai.
E tū toipoto ana ngā hōia, ka puta te whakahau a te rangatira kia ukupara rātou.
Ātaahua ana ngā huruhuru hina o te kōkako.
He mea tapa te awakari rā ko 'Te Awa-kari-a-Ngātoroirangi' nā te mea nāna anō i kari ake.
Kia pāorooro te pūrere pūoru ka pai kē ki ngā rangatahi, engari me puta atu au, kua pōtuki tōku māhunga.
Ka hoe ki waho ki te moana, ā, unuhia te kāremu
He mākūkū nō ngā oneone i te uanga o te ua, koia i tupu ai ana kai
Kia mākūkū te purapura, ka pai ai te tipu
Kua mākūkū tonu ki ngā roimata o ngā kōkā, o ngā pouaru, o ngā pani
Kua mākūkū ngā kākahu i waiho ki waho i te pō rā.
I rīria a Kaho, koirā ia i haumaruru ai, me te tāperu anō o ngā ngutu.
Ka tukia te tekoteko o tō tātou waka e te waka o te hoariri.
E kore a Tama e raru i ngā mahi whēkiki a aua wāhine.
Kātahi ka naomia ake te weu o tōna māhunga, ka pangā ki te moana
Hoki atu, hoki atu ko aua kōrero koretake anō rā, takeo katoa nei au.
Takeo noa ia i ngā hēhē o ngā whakatureture a te kāwanatanga me te kāwanatanga ā-rohe
Kātahi ka tuhi te ringa o taua tamaiti ki te taha tonga
Ki tā ētahi, ka kuhu ana te tīwaiwaka i tō whare, he tohu aituā tērā.
Nō te hurahanga i ngā hāngī ka kitea e mata tonu ana - he tohu aituā
Ka rere whaka-te-moana ngā manu o te moana i te atatū, he tohu pai, e kore e nui te hau, te ua rānei
Ko te tangi a te pīpīwharauroa tētahi o ngā tohu o te raumati.
Ka kakukakua te tiko o te ngeru, ka porowhiua ki tua o te taiapa.
E hoki tuarā haere ana ka tuki atu ki te pou, nā, kopenu ana te tou o te waka.
I whakapiria ētahi mōtete anga pāua, koia hei unahi mō tana mokomoko.
Mā wai e auraki tā rātou mahi kia tere oti ai?
Kia maoa te kānga kua kōwhai ngā pata.
Nā reira ka tū tonu ngā wai ua i roto i ngā wāhi hāpua
Nāna i ārai kei Paritua au, kei rangitawhiti koe
Oho ake ki te ao; kei rangitawhiti koe, nā te kamo i rehu mai
Ko ngā poupou o te whare i tāia ki te maukoroa.
I pēnei te āhua o taua ngārara rā me te kurī e mau nei i te pōtete
I te ruarua te ngākau i te kore ōna i mōhio me whakapono ki a wai.
Ko te Tūmā te marama whakamutunga o te ngahuru.
Me tāruperupe ō kākahu puehu nā ki waho.
He mōkai pai te tori, ka noho noa iho, ka tiaki hoki i a ia anō.
Kua tāmarutia te rangi e te pōkēao, kātahi ka rangona te hau whatitiri e papā ana i te rangi.
Te mahi tuatahi a te waipiro, he whakangoikore i ngā whakaaro
Kua mau taku iro. Kore rawa au e kai waipiro me te whakatete ki te taraiwa i taku waka ā muri ake nei
He hau makariri te hau pupuhi mai i te tonga.
E whakapaetia ana nā te kai whiore i roto i taua whānau i raru ai ngā tamariki.
He ara hunahuna e kore nei e kitea
Kei te māhiti i ngā rīwai motu, ko ērā hoki ka kainga tuatahitia.
Ko taku hoa tēnei - ko māua māua i te whare wānanga.
Kua ruaki taku kurī, he kaikai pātītī nōna.
Nā te mea tokowhitu noa mātou te hunga whakaako, i hiki te kura i muri mai o te hākari i te tūhoetanga o te rā i te Tāite
Nuku mai, e hika, kia pātata mai
Kāti i konā te tupere mai o ō ngutu ki a au!
Kāore e mutu te tangi mai a te poraka i te mātā.
Ko te hauwai anake te ngota kāore he iramoe i te karihi.
He henuwiti, he huarākau taku tina i ngā rā katoa - paki mai, āwhā mai.
Tina ai mātou i te haurua mai i te tekau mā rua o ngā hāora i te ahiahi.
He pai ērā hū, he kirikau hoki.
Ki te mau mātau e takahi ana i tēnei ture a rātau, ka whiua mātau ki te kirikau, ki te pirita rānei, mamae rawa
I utaina ngā rau māota ki runga i te ahi kia puta ai te kauruki.
Kāore kē te tamariki e rongo i te pitawai.
Ka pai kē te kōreko o ngā uwhi tēpu nei - nāu i horoi ki te aha kia pēnei rawa te mā?
Ka haria te waka kia ārohitia, ko te kōrero a te kaimātai, kua tāmore tētahi o ngā wīra o muri.
Kia hiwa, ē, kia hiwa, ē, whakahiwaia te ngākau o tēnei pā
Kia hiwa rā! Kia hiwa rā! He taua! Kei mākū koutou i te toto o te taonga kōhuru
Ahakoa te huatau o Hare ki te tā whakaahua, he kore ngākau whakawiri nōna, i kore ai ia i eke ki te taumata hei tino tohunga pakiwaituhi
Pai noa atu ki a ia ngā pakiwaituhi kua tāngia mai mō Māui, tēnā i ngā mea mō Miki Kiore mā.
Mā tō ringa ngāwari e ārahi te iwi, mā tō ringa kaha e ārai kei tapatu ki te hē
Ka whati te ringa o Taia, ā ka haria ki te hōhipere kia whakatikangia.
Kia hāmā, kia tangatanga ngā pūweru i te raumati.
I ohaina pea ki te kupu karakia kia muna i roto rā, ka nui au te aroha
Haere ana tēnei tangata ki te kimi i tana ariki, whanatu atu whanatu mai, haere ana ki tēnei kāinga ki tērā kāinga, roa noa tōna haerenga, na, ka tae ki tētahi pā
E kī ana koe tērā anō ia tētahi hēki i te ao nei kāhore kau i whanatu mai i roto i te manu
Kia mate te moana, ka rere anō ngā waka whakawhiti i Te Moana-o-Raukawa.
I whakatūria tō rāua whare i Te Tahatū, i te whakarua paku o Te Rāhui
Kia puta ai he kōrero mā ngā iwi kua tautini nei, e noho kē atu ana i te wāhi e nohoia ana e te Pākehā
I whakahokia mai ētehi mōkaikai i ngā whare taonga o rāwāhi.
I hoki mai au i te pākihi
Kei te tāwaha rātou e pākihi ana.
Ka mau te waka i te whenua kūwai, ka riro mā te tarakihana e tō mai.
I te kūwai o te papa tākaro, ka reti atu te kaihari i te pōro ki te pae piro.
Ka moe a Tūtānekai i tana whaiāipo, i a Hinemoa
Ka kau ia, ā, ka ū ki te kāinga o Te Whatuiāpiti
Tēnā rā kauria mai te moana e takoto nei
Ko Hinemoa, nāna i kau te roto o Rotorua
Titiro atu ki ngā koringo o ō rātou karu.
Kei te taitonga a Rakiura.
Kua takatakahia te māra e ngā kau, kua ngatu katoa ngā kai.
Kāti te karioi i te tāone, taki hoki ki ō koutou kāinga.
Ka hoe i roto o Taupō, ka tae ki te puahatanga o te awa
Haere mai, e Te Wananga, whakaarahia te ua o te kakī o ō tūpuna, o tō whenua hoki o Aotearoa
Hei te Tahiwehewehe mātou haere ai ki Hawai'i.
Me whakaikeike ngā nohoanga o muri kia kitea atu ai te atamira.
Heoi anō taku kupu, me haere ngā tinana wherū ki te ōhipera kia tiakina ai koutou ki ngā tikanga e tika ana mō ō koutou tinana wherū
Koi hautea te huruhuru, koi katea haere i te ngāherehere
He tōpuku te pito whakarunga o taku tokotoko kia pai ai te pupuri.
He pai ki a au ngā harore tōpuku, ngā mea kāore anō kia tino pakari.
Huaina ana e ngā Kura Kaupapa Māori ko Te Aho Matua hei kaupapa whakamaru mō rātou.
E kore e taea te rākau te wāwāhi ki te toki noa - me mataora rawa.
Ko ngā kākahu o ēnei kuia, he panekoti roroa, tae rawa ki ō rātou rekereke
Kua rarapa ki te hoariri, taka tonu atu i a ia te pōro.
Kua rua wiki ana nūpepa e whakapū noa ana ki te tēpu - ka mahue te porowhiu.
Ka haere ia i runga i te tuara o te taniwha, ka whiti mai ki te motutere i waho o Māngere
I te whatinga o tana kakī, ka whakawhiwhia ki te penihana mō ngā ngongo.
I a au e tane ana ka kata aku hoa.
Ka whakakinokino i a ia, na kua pēnei me te koroheke nei te āhua
Ko te mate korere me te ruaruaki ngā tohumate, engari kāore ia i mōhio he aha tana mate.
I te taenga mai o te waea kua mate tō rātou rangatira ka tangi tonu i ngā tiriti, ko ētahi i tupehu ka rapu utu rātou i ngā anakihi
Kei reira au e tūranga ana i te mea kua riro taku waka.
Ka kuhuna atu e ngā kaitākaro poikiri he pare ki ō rātou tōkena, hei tiaki i ō rātou tā.
Ko wai e pai ki tēnā kāinga hōrakerake? He nui te makariri
Ka pātaitai rawa ia i tēnā, i tēnā, kia mōhio pai rawa ki ō rātau ingoa, nō hea rātau, he aha te mahi a ō rātau mātua
Kai te pōuri ināianei kāore i tohetohe ki te pātaitai ki aku kuia mō ō rātou moko. Kua riro katoa rātou ki Paerau
Kei te piki ngā tamariki i te pūreirei me te ruku atu ki te wai.
Tē kaha ia te whai i taua tangata, kātahi ka karangatia ki tana wahine, ki a Rongotiki, hei hoa i ōna tapuwae
Kua mahu te hiako o tōku waewae
Kua tīmata hoki te mahu haere o tōna taotū
Te putanga o taua mate ka korotiwhatiwha te kiri, whero ana, kā ana me te ahi. Ka mahu, kātahi ka ngaro te kōtiwhatiwhatanga
I rongo i te takahanga o te maero, anō he whatitiri, ā, ka rere te iwi ki te huna i taua taniwha.
Kua auwahi te whānau, kua tōtara wāhi rua.
Kī tonu ō makawe i te maihi, e hoa! Ānō i ruia ki te huka!
E whā ngā wai o te kupenga
Ka wehe atu tātou i te tekau meneti, nō reira kaua e haere ki tawhiti.
He kaikairau te mahi a te wahine me te tuakana o Rangi, i roto tonu i tō rāua moenga ko Rangi!
Kotahi kete renga, kotahi kete pārara
Nā te waipuke te roma nei i kari kia rua ai ngā pūaha.
Haria he rongoā kia kore ai tātou e kainga e te ongaonga.
Kātahi te kurī anuanu i te kaha kowhana o te kanohi.
I te wā e taitamariki ana a Te Rangihaeata he whawhai tonu te mahi a te iwi o Kāwhia me ērā atu o ngā iwi o Waikato mō ngā whenua mōmona o Whāingaroa
Kia tika tō mahi, e hoa.
Kia tūpato, kei ngaua koe.
Kia mōhio noa mai koe, ehara i a au.
A, ko taua tangata me whiu ki te moni, kia kaua e iti iho i te rima hereni, kia kaua e neke atu i te kotahi pāuna mō te hara tuatahi
Kia hia ngā hēki?
E hoihoi mai ana te pākiki rā i a au - ka mahue te noho, ka whakarongo.
E rīria mai ana, e whetē mai ana ngā karu ki ngā rangatira
Kātahi ngā kōrero harehare nāu: whakarērea atu
Whakamā katoa au i taku karu korohiti.
Nā ko taku taokete, me patu ia hei ika paremo mō tō tātou waka
Otirā ka puke ake anō te wai, ka pakaru te tūtaki, ka whakangaromia ngā mea katoa e ārai ana i te rerenga nui o te wai
Koia i puke ake ai te ngākau, me tuku atu mā tā tātou manu e hari atu te rongo o te matenga o Aata Kanara
Ko te Rāhoroi āpōpō, ko te Rātapu ātahirā
Hei ātahirā te hui, engari kei te taraiwa atu au āpōpō.
Kei te haere māua ātahirā. Kua riro katoa ngā tīkiti mō āpōpō.
E noho mai ana ngā putiputi porotea i waenga i ngā mea poroporo.
Ki te nātia roatia te pūkorokoro, ka mate te tangata i te kore hāora.
Me whītiki anō rātou e koe, a Ārona rātou ko ana tama, ka pōtae anō hoki i ngā pōtae ki a rātou
Ko Te Kawenata Hou te wāhi o te Paipera e mau ana te oranga me ngā whakaakoranga a Te Karaiti
He tere nō te rere o te awa, me te nui o te paru i kīia ai te awa nei he awa kauehu.
Ka hūkari me te keretao te āhua i a ia e kōrero ana.
Tautekangia ngā here nā kia kore ai e tangatanga.
Me here ki te harakeke āhua pirau, ngāwari nei, kaua e ū rawa te here, engari kia tangatanga kia pai ai te tupu haere o ngā pihi
Ka kōkiritia e te tangata whenua, ka āpititia e te taua rā
Piki ake ki te tihi o te taipū kia pai ai te titiro ki te moana.
He tangata ahurei i roto i te ao Māori me te ao Pākehā ngātahi
Ko te tūmanako ka pāhohia te katoa o te hui ahurei nei ki runga reo irirangi, ā, ka whakaatahia mai hoki ki runga pouaka whakaata
He mea īnakinaki ngā kākaho ki te tuanui o te whare puni.
Ka nui te āhua pai o taua whare, he kākaho a roto
Ka huaia te ihu o te waka ki uta.
Kua komeme te kiri i te roa e kaukau ana i te puia.
Ko ngā pīhopa ngā tino rangatira o tērā hāhi.
Me kimi he rākau hāmoremore mō ngā whakataetae mau toki.
Kei te tokomaha haere te rāngai e whawhai ana kia roa ake ngā kōhuru ki te whare herehere.
He tino wera ngā whenua e tata ana ki te weheruatanga o te ao.
Kua whakapūhana kei hē i a ia te mahi.
Koia ka whāia te kawa, hei tauwehe i te tapu kia noa ai
E huke ana te wahine i te hāngī
Ko ngā kai i tōmuri te whakatō, arā te kānga, te paukena, ākuanei mau ai i ngā huka
I rīria au e taku māhita, he tae tōmuri nōku ki te kura
I ngā tau tōmuri o te tekau tau mai i 1830, ka huri a Ngā Rauru ki te whakapono Karaitiana
E hia ngā kararehe hei whakamōkā?
Ko tana whakaaro e mau tonu a ia hei tautoko mō tana iwi i te Māori, ā, ko te whakamōkā a Te Kāwanatanga e kore rawa e mau i te māngai o taua mema
Ka nui tana pōuri i te matenga o tana hoa piripono.
I hiahia te tamaiti kia haere katoa mai ana hoa ki tana rā huritau.
Ko te kōawa te kotinga i waenga i a tātou me ngā hapū ki te raki.
E hia kē ngā kī taurangi a tēnā tangata, he ngutu kau, koinei au e whakatito nei i ana kōrero.
Anei rāua e haere kōtui mai nei.
Kia kaha ake te haere kōtui o ngā whakahaere me ngā kaupapa whakaora ake i te reo Māori
Aua e tāmia te rahurahu, kei pirau te kāpura
Tāmia te taupoki kia kopi rawa te paepae.
I kōrerohia mai ki a au, i a au e oma rā, ko aku turi tata kē ki taku kauwae
He mate nō roto i tētahi o ōna turi, mamae rawa ana
Kitea ana he kupu kāore i te mōhiotia, whakapaetia ana he kupu nō te ao hou nei. Engari nō mua rā anō, nō tuauri te nuinga o ngā kupu e whakaarahia ake ana e mātou
He pai noa atu te huawhenua kua whakatupuria ki te wairākau māori, tēnā i te kai kua whāngaihia ki te tini matū i mahia ki te wheketere.
E kī ana ia he rangatira tērā. Kāore au i pai ki tōna kanohi, he whakahīhī nō te āhua
Ka whakahīhī tēnei hanga te Māori kai tangata ko ia te iwi nui, ko ia te iwi kaha, ko ia te iwi toa!
Kore rawa atu mātou e whakaae ki tā koutou mahi whakahīhī; me mutu tā koutou poka ki ō mātou nei whenua
Kei reira ngā kātipa e tohutohu ana ki hea whakatūtūria ai ngā waka.
I riro nā ngā kātipa Māori i wehewehe te hunga mautohe me ngā tāngata rongonui i tae ake ki Waitangi i taua tau.
He uaua te kati i te kūaha katote.
Ka kuku te tamaiti i tana manawa kia puta rawa ia i te arapoka.
Ka haere atu te hāpai, ko te kātua o te ope taua ka turuki atu i muri.
He tara kei te hiku o te rau karamea.
Ko te roto i te pae maunga rā te kāuru o te awa e rere nei.
I te kaha haututū o ngā tamariki, ka poroa te wā tākaro, ka meatia rātou kia hoki wawe ki rō akomanga.
E whakatuanui ana, me te kī anō ka haria tana nawe ki te kōti.
Ka hui ngā pākeke ki te whiriwhiri me aha ngā whenua i whakahokia mai e te kāwanatanga.
Ka mahi taueki māna ki te harakeke.
Ka hangā he tari, ka hoatu, ka pōtaria ki tōna upoko, ā, ka whiu te kakī, kīhai rawa i mau
Kua rerekē ngā uara - he tangata te mea nui i mua, ināianei, ko te moni.
Koirā tō rātou pai - ko ngā uara hāpai i te whānau kei te ārahi i a rātou i ngā wā katoa.
Kia rongo atu au i te rongo putakari, i te rongo parekura, i te rongo pā taka a Te Whatanui
Pakē mai ana te manga, korowhiti tonu atu te kuia.
Me whakahoki ngā ika puwheto ki te moana, kei mau tāua i te ture.
Pīngongo ana ngā pāpāringa i te kainga ōna e te mate pukupuku.
Kīhai rātou i orotau ki tō mātou reo
He mea patu te whāereere, ka whakaorangia ana punua hei mōkai.
Ka nui tēnei tokomaha, kei ruku noa iho tō tātou waka.
Me haere kē kōrua ki te pito hōhonu ruku ai, kaua e ruku i te pito pāpaku.
Ka ruku te ika, ā, ka ea ake anō
Mōhinuhinu ana te huarahi mākū i te aho o te rā.
Kātahi ka kōia te māra, ko tōna whakahauhau tēnei, 'Ngaere te whakatupua, ngaere te whakatawhito ..'
Whero ana te ruru
Koirā kē te wāhi mahana, ko te kokonga e whitikina ana e te rā.
E $32 te utu o taua kōpae puoro i tētahi toa, e $28 te utu i tētahi.
Ko te whakatau tata ko $180 miriona te utu kia tū ai te whare wānanga hōu.
Kua māhī te kānga wai, kua pai hei kai.
E kī e kī, ka haere mai te pōkokohua rā ki konei piopio ai i a tātou!
E rongo ana te taringa i tōna toa ki te haere i roto i ngā kōkiri; ki te amo mai i ngā taotū i roto i te mura o te ahi ki te wāhi i te ora; ki te pīkau mai i ngā tāngata kua mate kē ki tētahi wāhi tika hei tāpukenga mō rātou
Ko tā rātau mahi he pīkau harakeke mai ki te mira harakeke
Kua whakaaro te kāwanatanga kia mahia tētahi tima hei pīkau tāngata atu i Tokaanu me Taupō
Mā te nūpepa ēnei kōrero e pīkau ki ngā wāhi mokemoke o ngā tākiwā
Inā te pūkōnohinohi aroha i a au ki aku tamariki
Ānō ka maea ngā motu nei, ā ka pūrero ake i te moana
He mea whakangawhi a Tunaroa e Māui.
Kaua e horomia ō kai, kei kīia koe he tou areare.
Ka roherohea e ia ana tīkiti ki ana hoa kāore nei rātou i whiwhi.
Ka ruriruri te tangata nāna i kai te puapua a Autahi
He oho pō, he moe ao te paihamu.
Ko ngā wāhine kei mua, ko mātau, ko ngā tāne, kei muri. Ka tū, ka tangi. Ka mutu, ka nohonoho mātau katoa
I te kaha o te pakūtanga, ka wāhia he puare nui rawa atu ki raro, na ka uru te waitai, na totohu tonu atu ngā manuao nei
Ko te kupu a Pōtatau ahakoa miro whero, pango, mā rānei, kotahi anō te puare o te ngira e kuhua ai
Ka huri atu ia, ka hinga i tētahi puare, ka tū atu, ka haere anō
Kāti te tangiweto. Ka hoki mai a Māmā ākuanei.
Ka pai anō pea ki te whakarērea ngā tamariki kaha te whakakuene, te tangiweto, te haututū rānei ki te kāinga
Wakuwakuhia mai te kakaru o te hue, ka tangotango ake i ngā kākano, ka whakamaroke.
He kūkū tangai nui
I tētehi kāinga i peka ai rātou ka whakatakotoria ki te aroaro o Paoa he ika paruparu
Ka whakatakotoria e Rēweti ōna whakaaro i te hui i Ahuriri
Ka whakatakotoria ki ō koutou aroaro ngā pukapuka whakapaupau moni
He tino rerekē te oranga o ngā kararehe kōwao i ērā kua whakapoporetia hei mōkai.
Kua āwheo te marama - he tūrama te rite.
Ka rūpeke atu nei rātou ki te pō, ki te pō uriuri, ki te pō tangotango ki te pō i oti atu, ki te wāhi e kore nei a muri nei e hokia mai
Ka mahia he māhauhau hei whakaruru mōna mō te wā e noho ana ia ki te ngahere.
Māhauhautia he whare mō tātou mō te pō nei, ka ao te rā ka haere
Ko te pūkoro e kauawhi ana i te marama, he tohu nō te mate.
Ko taua tarau, kāore i poto, kāore i roa - kei te ateate e haere ana.
Ka ātahungia te iwi rā kia huri mai ki te whai i a rātou.
Kua riro aromea a Taritū i te ope taua o Te Rangi, hei taurekareka māna.
Ka oho ake ia i tana moe nā te ngau o te tokopaha ki a ia.
Māu kē e mahi - ehara hoki au i tō kaitonotono!
Ki konā a Te Kehu māpuna ai ki te ata o te tau
Kotahi au i kite i taupurupurutia ai e ōna hoa
Ka hūrangi haere i te roa kāore e rongo kōrero ana i tana tama.
Engari, kāhore ahau i whakapuaki i ōku whakaaro; ko te arero hangahanga te hoariri hoki o te wahine
E kore e pai kia kitea te kope e te katoa, he pakiwaitara
I whakamahia nuitia te matā i mua hei hanga kōrere wai, i whakaurua anō ki te peita me te penehīni.
Kia pēhea te ikeike o te whare?
E toru hāora a Tame e rāwekeweke ana i te pūkaha o tana waka, kāore tonu e haruru i a ia.
Kia parauri te piki, kua ngakungaku, kua pai hei kai.
Kātahi au ka whakaemi haere i ngā minita. He minita Rātana, Ringatū, Metoriti, Mihingare, Perehipitiriana, Katorika
Atu i te tau 1936 ki 1960, e minita ana a Kapa i ngā pārihi o Waikato, o Ahipara me Waitara
Te tangi mai a te ika nei a te poraka - ā kūkēkē ē! Kū kēkēkēkē a Tūhoe ki Te Whāiti - ā kūkēkē ē!
I te kaha o te kai pūhā, ka āhua kākāriki ngā tūtae.
Ka hiki taku ringa ki te patu i te waeroa, engari ka paki kē au i taku kanohi!
I ngā rā o mua he mea paki te tou o te pēpē kātahi anō ka whānau mai, kia tangi ai ia, kia uru ai te hau ki ana pukapuka.
He pai te tuna pāwhara hei parai kia pakapaka tonu nei te kiri
E anganui ana te ngira o te kāpehu ki te raki.
Koinei te pai o te noho anganui atu ki te marae - ka kitea ngā ope katoa e taetae mai ana, e whakaeke ana.
Kia anganui mai tō kōrero
Ka murimuri aroha ki a Te Ruruanga
Kua pupuhi katoa ngā turi o te kuia i te rūmātiki, ka aroha kē.
Kia roa au e rāwekeweke ana i te kiore o taku rorohiko, ka mamae taku pākau matau.
He kōpūngahuru ana kōrero. Kāore kē e pērā ana whakaaro tūturu.
Koinā te whare i noho ai mātou ko taku whānau mō tētahi wā roa.
Koinā ngā mahi mā te tiamana
Koinā koe i tapaina ai ko Kaiwetiweti
Homai aku hau, ngā tītaha, ngā kōhua, ngā herehere o tōku pakanga
Ko te tā o te huruhuru manu te wāhi i titia atu ki ngā makawe.
Kore rawa a Te Wera e koemi i ērā kōrero, heoi anō tāna, he tū, he titiro
E kōmingo haere ana te wai i te kōhao o te tāpu.
I reira mātou e tatari ana kia whakatata mai te kaipuke pāhihi nui ki te wāpu.
Ka whakatata mai te ope whakaeke, ka tū, ka tangi.
Taka kau i te rākau, mate rawa, e kore e ora i te pakarara
Ka titiro ia ki tana kura ka pūhoto te uma i ngā tini mahara mō ngā hoa o tau kē.
He roto nui a Taupō-nui-a-Tia.
Ka haere ia ki Waingaro, he roto e tata ana ki Wāhi
Nā taua rangatira i kōrero ki a ia i ētahi tikanga katoa e tika ai tana haere i te koraha, tohutohungia ana hoki e ia te kaweka o ētahi maunga teitei
Ko te kai a tērā wahine he ota tonu
I taiaroatia ia ki ētahi kōrero horihori he mea tuku ki te nūpepa.
He huarākau katoa te āporo, te ārani, te panana me te pea.
Kua mau ngā whakaahua me ngā kōrero o te wharenui tawhito ki te ataata, hei mātakitaki mā ngā uri whakaheke.
Whakahokia te rīpene ataata ki te tīmatanga i mua i te whakahokinga ki te toa.
Ka mamae ō karu ki te roa rawa koe e mātakitaki ana i te pouaka whakaata.
Ka haere ake ngā tīma. Ka pakipaki te iwi mātakitaki
Te taenga o ngā tokotoru nei ki a Te Wherowhero i Māngere ka hoatu te kupu, 'E Whero, kua oti te kupu o te motu ko koe hei Kīngi.' Kātahi ka pōtaea atu Te Pōtae o te Kīngitanga. Ka puta te kupu a Te Wherowhero, 'Kāore ahau e pai'
Kia mau ki te kupu a tōu matua
He haka anō tā te ware, he pōrahu noa iho ngā ringa
Ūkui ō niho, oroi ō niho
Kīhai i hātepe te haere o tana kōrero, i hikohiko
Me whakamihi te apārangi nāna i kōkiri kia tū mai ngā kōhanga reo.
Horia te taringa o te poaka
Māku ngā tamariki e hari kia kore ai e whātītipatia e te tangata kē.
Kia paroro te rangi, ka ngū te kihikihi.
Kua waiho noa ngā āporo ki te rākau, ki konā kongene mai ai.
I tīkākā taku kiri i a au e kaukau ana i te moana.
Ko ō rātou whare he kino noa iho, he mea hanga ki te kiri rākau
Na, i mua ake rā he oranga nui e puta ana mai ki te tangata i te kiri rāpeti
Tuatahi, pīhoretia te kiri, kātahi ka kōtē i te wai ki waho
Nā te kaha wera mātou i waikauere ai ki te mahi.
Ki te kore e ū, kua whakawhenua ki te kōpū hōpara o Hinemoana
Kāore i te mōhiotia ko hea te ara tika e ū pai ai tō tātou waka reo ki te whenua houkura, tē whakawhenua noa ki te kōpū o Hinemoana
Ka tāpuia iho taua mea māna
Tāpuitia ana e ia he papanga kāinga mō Eruera
Kua rite noa ake i a au te kākahu
E āwangawanga ana i te mea kāhore anō kia rite tana nama.
Kua rite katoa i a Ihu, kua utua katoatia ana hara
Kua oti te whare te whakamahine, me peita iāianā.
Kāore anō i oti taku tuhinga roa - e tuhia tonutia ana te wāhanga whakamutunga.
Me pani te kou whāiti o te rākau piriota ki te tioka, kia tika ai te pā atu ki te pōro.
Ka mārama ahoaho te rangi i te uira, kātahi ka papā mai ko te whatitiri.
Ngare noa, kīhai hoki i rongo, ka hoi a Te Kahureremoa
He wā anō ka tautohetohe rāua mō ō rāua take ki te whenua. Heoi i pūmau tonu tā rāua noho me ā rāua whānau
Ka mekemeke ngā tokorua nei i a rāua, ka tautohetohe. 'Ko māua e haere ana.' 'Kāre, ko māua kē!'
Taku tino kupu tēnei, me mutu ā koutou pānui tautohetohe, ka moumou noa iho ngā whārangi o Te Puke Ki Hikurangi rāua ko Te Tiupiri
E whakapāeko kau ana, he noho tou noa iho te mahi.
Ko te mea mārōrō ka haere mai, ko te mea tāngenge ka waiho atu
Ko te wiwini i roto i a au, kei pau te whare i te ahi i te wā e moe ana ngā tamariki.
E hāmaremare noa iho ana, arā, kāre e tino māuiui ana.
Ngahau ana te rere a te kōpapa ki te take o te puke, ko te tō anō ki runga kē te mahi hōhā.
Kua newha ngā karu i te hiamoe, nā wai ā, kua rotua e te moe.
Ā kōnohi noa te aroha o Hine ki a Tinirau
I pōhēhē au he whiore hume a Hōri, engari i ēnei marama nei kua tino kitea tōna māia.
Tata pea ki te kotahi mano tau te iwi Māori i Aotearoa.
Nō te tau kotahi mano, waru rau, whā tekau i hainatia ai te Tiriti o Waitangi.
Kua whakakorehia te hui, nā te tokoiti o te hunga i hiahia whakauru mai.
Whakakorehia atu ēnā whakaaro kino.
Kei te whakakorengia tana tūranga. Koinā ia e kimi mahi nei i konei.
Me mōhio anō ki ngā pātene hei pēhi i te rorohiko hei whakakore i tētahi mahi, kia hoki pai mai ō kōrero o mua.
Ka aho mai te māramatanga o te rā
He mahi pai te tiaki tīramaroa i ngā rā o mua, mēnā e pai ana koe ki te noho hokehoke.
Kātahi au ka panaia mai e ngā mea i muri i a au, tukia atu e au te Meiha
He mōtoi taringa nō roto i te kopa
I ēnei tau tata nei kua nui ake ngā rauemi reo Māori e taetae atu ana ki ngā kura.
E mau mai ana ki te kete rauemi nei te pukapuka aratohu, te kōpae rorohiko, tae atu ki te atamira me ngā whakapaipai e tū ai he whakaari karetao.
E noho tūhea ana, pēnei i te kāinga kēhua.
Ka tūāhae te tuakana, ka mea, 'Riro rawa te wahine pai nei i taku teina'
He kāinga mārama tīahoaho, me ōna tāngata he tāngata papai anake
Otirā i hōhā te wāhine nei ki tana tāne, ka pūremu. I whakakorea te mārena, ka mārama tīahoaho, ehara i te mea mā te moni e mau ai te aroha
Ehara, me te huruhuru manu ka rere i te hau
He puanga kākaho ka rere i te waru
Kāore he kiko o ana kōrero, he korakora rere nā Mahuika.
Ko te rimu mau toka . . . e whakapaea ana ki te one i Rangatira
He mea apoapo ahau e te rimu, takai atu, takai mai
He rawe a Kurawhā mehemea ka tū ki te para whakawai
Te mahi o konei he riri tākaro, he para whakawai
Kia huruhuru rā anō ngā raho, kātahi anō ka whakaaetia kia uru ki ngā mahi para whakawai.
E whakaapaapa ana a Ruahine i ngā wahia ki te taha tonu o te wharau.
Ko aua kōhatu te āhua, he rehu tētahi, he hukātai tētahi
He kererū kē tērā, ehara i te tūī.
Kāore au i te haere āpōpō. Kei te haere kē au ātahirā.
He aha koe i nohopuku ai, tē kōrero kē ai i ō māharahara?
Whakahinuhinu ana te kekeno i te pueatanga ake i te wai.
Ka tāia ngā waitohu o ngā tari kāwanatanga ki ā rātou pepa tuhi reta, ki ā rātou pukapuka, me ētahi atu wāhi.
He 'M' noa iho te waitohu a taua kamupene hoko ō rangaranga rongonui.
He hōhonu tonu te pūtake o te toetoe, koirā i uaua ai te huhuti ake.
I te hipanga atu o te ope, ka whakaekea e te tipa i noho huna rā ki te ururua.
