Ko te pewa te hanga tuatahi, iti katoa, e kitea, nāwai ā, ka hua - ko Ōturu tēnā.
Tangohia ngā kongakonga, ngā pungarehu, me te pūnehu hoki kei kino ngā kai o te hāngi nei.
Ka mutu te hōhā, ko te tou tīrairaka i te whare pukapuka.
Ka atawhai taua iwi rā ki a Paoa hei rangatira mō rātou
Ka pakepake a Hine me kore e arohia mai tana take e te kaunihera.
I kīia ai tērā pea he 'kurī pāka' nā te āhua o ō rātou kiri, he pākākā, he whero
Kia paku noa nei te hinu ki te rīhi, ka tunu ai i te heihei kia māoa, kia āhua pakapaka nei te kiri.
Ka kitea ngā kuia o te tangata whenua e pōhiri ana i ā rātou rau ponga.
Kei te kitea atu te upoko o te pēpē e puta ana i te taiawa o te wahine.
Kōtea tonu te moko; kīhai i mangu
Inaoakenui ka puta te kōrero ki te ao. Kua toru rā e kawea ana e ngā ngutu o te manotini.
He tikanga tēnei te whakarekereke i te pā, kia riro mai ngā kai me ngā mea katoa a te hoariri.
Tohe tonu te tangata rā; tē ngehe, tē aha
Ko te āhua o taua mate, tīmata ai ki te tūnāwiri, ka mamae te māhunga, ka ngehe katoa te tinana me ngā turi, ka mamae hoki ngā konohi
Kua pōhiritia te whānau nui tonu kia haere mai ki te mārena - e rima rau pea ngā tāngata ka tae ake.
He mea rangahau e Poutapu, e Kereama Waka me Īnia Te Wīata ngā momo tauira whakairo o Waikato, hei whakairo i te haumi, i te pākurukuru, i te taurapa me ngā taha o Te Winika
Ko te whatitiri tērā e keu rā i tawhiti. Taihoa ake nei pea ka ua.
Ko te tūmanako ka kaha te ua kia kī anō ai te kōpapa i te ngongi.
He aha i hīrautia nei e koe tōku waewae?
Ka hīrautia a Kiri e tana tungāne, kei raro e putu ana, me te auē anō o te waha.
Kāore e roa kua rite pea i a koe ngā mea e iwa, kua riro mai i a koe te tohu BA
Kua hoki mai te Kāwana rātou ko ngā rangatira Māori, ōna hoa haere tahi, ki te hohou rongo ki a Ngāti Awa. E kī ana, kua rite, kua mau te rongo
Whāia ka matemate ana tamariki e rua, ka whai kia puta he uri mōna. Kāore i rite tana hiahia, ka mahue a Kahutaha
Nā tō aku i te kāinga kua mahue tāua i te pahi!
Ko te kiri pīataata o runga i aua taonga uku, i mahia ki te takawai.
Nā te takawai, ko ngā 'maramara takawai' mō roto i ngā rorohiko me ērā atu taonga hiko whakahirahira o te ao hou.
E patō mai rā ngā wahia e mura ana i te ahi.
Kua tekau tau au e noho ana ki taku punua kāuta i te taha o te moana.
Kātahi ka nōhia taua wāhi
Ko te au rā i nohoia e te tākupu
Taki haere ai rātau ki roto i ngā hōtēra e nōhia ana e ngā tūruhi e tata tonu ana ki ō rātau kāinga i Ōhinemutu
He ākau roa anō tērā, he tukutata tēnei
I te kitenga atu o ngā koroua, o ngā kuia i te kaipuke o Kāpene Kuki, ka karanga, 'He motu, he motu rere mai nō tawhiti inā e tere mai nei nā'
Ko Tana Umaga te kāpene o te Kapa o Pango i tērā wā.
E toru ana murimanu nā te mea ko ia te tākupu o te iwi.
Kotia te pū, waiho i konā, kotia te kāuru, waiho i konā
Kia kaua e tata rawa tō kāheru ki te kakau, kei kotia te pū.
Ka hangā e Tūtānekai tōna pourewa ki reira, ki Kaiweka
Kua kewha noa a Rewa - kua kore e mōhio me hoko rānei he whare mōna, me rīhi rānei.
I wāhia e mātau te kēti maitai me tētahi wāhi rahi tonu o te taiapa maitai
Ka tono atu kia hōmai he wai mōna, ka mauria atu te tahā, ka wāhia e ia. Ka riri ngā wāhine nei
I te heitiki ētahi, i te kuru pounamu ētahi, ko te ingoa o taua kuru ko Kaukaumatua
He kuru tongarerewa
Kei muri au ka tapatapa ai, 'Tōia te waka,' etc
He tamaiti ngāwari - kotahi te kupu a tana whaea, kua tahuri ia ki te whakatutuki.
He tinana pāuaua, he tinana ora!
He pekerangi tana mahi ki te hopu i ngā manu e tātata ana ki te wai
E houwere ana au i ngā rīpene nei hei whakapaipai i te takoha.
I ngā rā o mua whakamahia ai te tuaka hei pene.
Whakapukorutia mai te taura kia taea ai tēnei pito te tango.
Ka haere tika atu te kaiako ki te hurihuri i ngā pepa whakamātautau kia anga whakararo.
Whakatakotoria ana ki tana pononga, ki a Ponarua, kia karia te pokere ki te roro o te whare
Kia kao ngā utauta me ngā kai katoa e hiahiatia, hei reira koe ka tahuri ki te tunu i tō keke.
Me matawai ngā kanohi e kitea ai te puruhi i ngā huruhuru o te kurī.
Hei muri nei au whakaoma atu ai ki te hoa rā
Te kumukumu, te mokopārae
Kua pere rātou ki tātahi ki te kaukau.
Ākuanei e korokē tonu ana a Rauru ka tae mai ki ēnei tainga, ka moe i tāna wahine, arā te whaene o Rākaumāui, ka puta ā rāua uri
Kua pau katoa ngā kūmara, he rīwai anahe e toe ana ki te rua.
Kua pau taku hau, kua hoki au ki te moe.
He kōtiro tīhohe i mua, engari ināianei, me uaua ka menemene.
Ngā mahi a te tīhohe!
E piki ana i ngā toka pāhekeheke, ka karengo.
Ko te pōwhiri tēnei ki te Piriniha o Weira i Rotorua, i te tau 1920. I tū ia hei Kīngi, ko Eruera VIII
Ka hoatu te kupu, 'E Whero, kua oti te kupu o te motu ko koe hei Kīngi.' Kātahi ka pōtaea atu Te Pōtae o te Kīngitanga
Ko te māharahara nui, kei tae te mate urutā nei ki ngā tōpito katoa o te ao.
Haere koutou ki a Tūmatauenga, i mate mai nei koutou ki te pae o te pakanga ki te Tiamana, i mea nei kia riro i a rātau te ao katoa, ka mea ai i ngā iwi hai pononga takatakahi mā rātau
Ehara au i raro nei, nō runga rawa au nō te maunga tiketike e rere nei te pūroro
Ka raru pai kōrua ko tō hamarara i te pūroro.
Puanga kai rau
Nō te taunga o te hā kawa ki tōna arero, ka tuwhatuwha i ngā kai.
Nōku tonu ēnei tōkena e mau nei au.
Kāore pea e tautokona mai ēnei whakaaro ōku.
He ipu konokono ngā ipu kawe wai.
Ki te matakerekere aku waewae i te takurua, he māngiongio te hua.
Nā te tou areare tēnā mahi, te hāupaupa.
Nōhea i tika ai tēnei mahi hē, e waiho nei te wahine hei tonotono mā te tangata, hei kaimahi i ngā mahi uaua mō te tangata?
Koia tēnei hanga e wairutu noa nei, aroha i mahuki ki te makau i te rangi
Ki te kore te ahotakakame, e kore e ora ngā rākau.
Ko te haruru o te patu o te aruhe, ka kī atu a Toi mā, 'Ehara ko Haumiaroa,' he aruhe a Haumiaroa
Ka mamae ana, ka hē ana te wairua, ka riro mā te whāwhārua a ia e whakarata.
Ka pokopoko te kaipuke i te whanga kia kore ai e taitaia e ngā ngaru nui o waho.
E whārikihia ana a raro i ngā rākau e te rau hūnonoi.
E hokomirimiri ana i tana kurī nāna nei rāua i ora ai.
Aurara kē ōu ringa ki konā ki te aha?
Me hautope ngā peka memenge o te rākau ārani.
Hone Heke. Ko ia tēnei ko tuahangata, ko kātuarehe
Ka rawe mā tēnei tangata te haere ki ēnei tū mahi, he kātuarehe hoki, he tangata kua kite i ngā tini huarahi o te ao
Ka nui te kino o te huarahi, he aupiki, he auheke
I te kaha marino o te wai ka koke noa ngā waka.
Rutu noa ana a Hare, he wheke nōna ki te tangata nāna i tuki tana waka.
Ka mawhera noa iho ngā pūtea a te hunga whai moni, ka nui rā hoki te moni mā te katoa
Ki te kore e kitea he kupu hāngai pū, whakamahia ko te kupu tata.
Mahia ngā mahi kei tamariki ana.
Kei roto katoa ngā kame a te kaipaowe i tana tueke.
Nā ana tuhinga e pā ana ki ngā tikanga Māori, ki ngā pakiwaitara, tae atu ki ngā ingoa wāhi, te take i tino mōhiotia whānuitia tōna ingoa
Kei roto i ngā tuhinga a Kāpene Kuki ētahi kōrero mō tana kitenga i ngā waka pahī i Tahiti
He koi ake aku niho i te naihi pūhoi nei.
Kāore i roa kua pihoi ngā tamariki, kua oreore, kua hiahia haere ki te tākaro.
I ngā poraenga te nuinga o ngā pā o te riu nei i ngā wā o mua, nā te teitei o ngā tahataha i pērā ai.
Tūperepere ana te tipu mai o te tūmatakuru i tō pāmu, e hoa!
Parohe kau ana ngā tipu nei i te kore wai.
Ko te wahine kei te hoahoa i tā rāua mārena, heoi anō tā te tāne, he tae atu.
Ka whiti te rā, ka haere rāua ki waho, ki te wāhi taumarumaru noho ai
Ka taumarumaru tonu te puna i ngā wā katoa. Ka makariri tonu te wai
Ko te ruahine ki te matapihi whakarongo ai ki te taua e tāwai mai rā ki a rāua ko te koroheke
Kua minamina auahi ngā pukapuka i te ahi, ūā ana nei.
Kia minamina puehu te ihu, kua tihetihe.
Purutiti ana ngā rori i te tini, i te mano e oma ana i a Parawhenua.
Māu e kōkuhu mai te ngira nei?
Me haere ngā akoranga o te kura engari me kōkuhu mai he āhuatanga Māori ki roto.
Kei te tokomaha haere te taka e whawhai ana kia hurihia te ture mō te hunga pāria e te mate kino kei te hiahia whakamate i a rātou anō.
Ka kīia tana teka he kōpeka i te mahi a ngā pirihimana.
Ka kai a Kae, ka rongo i te reka
Kia tae ki te kokonga o Huia me Tūī, ka whiti ki te matau.
E rārangi mai ana ngā pātuhi tohutau ki runga ake i ērā mō ngā pū.
Hei tā mai i tētahi kōrero, pēhia ngātahitia te pātuhi 'Whakataki' me te 'P'.
I whārikitia a roto i te whare ki te pora hei nōhanga mō te whānau.
He tamaiti pateko tēnā, he noho noa iho, he mātaki pouaka whakaata.
Kia ātea, kei whara koe!
He kokonga whare e kitea, he kokonga ngākau e kore e kitea.
Kei mua te tokotoko o te tangata matakene e whāwhā haere ana, e mōhio ai ia mēnā kei te wātea te ara, pēhea kē rānei.
Kei te turituri kau te hoihoi, kei te komekome kau mai nā ngā ngutu, kei te whakatanuku kau te korokoro, koua mate au, ī
I tangohia ngā kōhatu o te hāngī ki te koko.
Ko wai ka wareware ki te tau o tērā koroua ki te kōrero, ka hāmama te waha, ka haka, me tana tokotoko e piupiu ana i te takiwā.
Kua ipuipu te waha o te tamaiti rā.
Ko te wāhi tēnā e kai ai te kōkō ka nunui, nō konā ka kīia he turuhunga
Kāore e mutu tana ngaingai i tana pouri nui.
Ana! Ka kīia atu kia kaua e rawekehia te mea nā, auare ake.
Ka kukua te ringaringa, ka motokia ake ki tōna ihu; ka toto te ihu, ka pania ki te matau, ka whiua ki te moana; ana, rere tonu, rere tonu, ā, ka tae ki te tekoteko, mahue ake
Ko te wairuatoa tērā engari ko te waimarie i mau i a rātou ō rātou tīpuna e kōrero ana, e waiata ana ki te rīpene
Kua kōhangaweka ngā raupō i te hau
Karehe atu ana te paihau ki te rutu i te kaikawe i te pōro.
I te taparuru o te haere, ka tae tōmuri ki te hui.
Kāore te whutupōro e kōtakataka pērā i te poiwhana me te poitarawhiti.
Mā te kaituki hei whakarite te tere o te hoe.
I te ngōuruuru o ngā āporo, me tapatapahi rawa e whiwhi āporo ai te katoa.
He pērā te kaukau o tērā koroua ka kautū i te wai ka pōrutu haere, kia mātao ai tōna kiri.
Kua mākū katoa te whare kaukau i a tama pōrutu.
Ko ia taku manawa. Ki te hemo ia, ka hemo anō hoki ko au.
Ka oti te kaupapa o te whare, ka whakatūtūngia ngā anga mō ngā pakitara.
Aī, kei te tū tonu te koroua rākau rā! Pēnei au kua kore noa atu.
Kei te waiatatia tonutia taua waiata i te kāinga, engari me uaua ka rangona i wāhi kē.
He iti tangata e tupu, he iti toki, e iti tonu iho
Kei reira tonu ia e noho ana. E kore ia e neke.
Taku kōara te uira i te rangi ko te tohu o te mate nā
Ka rutua ngā reina kia tū ai te hōiho.
Ka hotu noa te moana
Kua haere rātou ki te kohi raupō hei paru mō te wharenui.
I haere atu te mīmiha ki uta ki te kimi kai hei oranga mōna, ka kī te puku ka moe, kātahi ka tukua iho tōna kiri hei ārai i tōna ihu, e mohio ana hoki te ika nei ko tōna wāhi tērā e tere ai tōna mate
Mārama te titiro ngā matatāhuna i roto o Tauranga
Moe ana te huia, ara ana te toroa ngā matatāhuna i waho Waihi
Ka haere atu a Taana ki te kōhimuhimu atu ki tōna taringa, 'Kāore koe i te Mema i nāianei.' Kātahi anō ia ka mōhio kua hinga ia
Kei te rangahau ia i te pānga o te waipiro ki te whanonga tangata.
Nā te titiro ki te whanonga o ngā kitakita ina whāngaia ki te wai o taua rākau, i kitea ai he rongoā mō taua mate.
Ko tētahi mea tino tika, he āta horohoroi i te tinana ki te wai pūmahana i ngā rā katoa
I kitea ētahi hapa i roto i ngā tātaitanga, koirā i rerekē ai te tapeke.
He hanga pīwai te mahi toi ka tāraia ki te kōhatu, engari anō te whakairo ka tāraia ki te tio.
Kāore e nui ngā hoa o te tangata kaiapa.
Ka apūtia ngā kararehe, ka kaumingomingo noa iho
Kua kaumingomingo katoa aku mahi kaute - he mahi nui tāu ki te āta whakatikatika.
Kia hāpai te rā, ka koero haere te hukapapa.
Ka tīmata te wē i roto i te ipurau ki te koropupū i te hoatutanga atu o tētahi paura mā.
Kua nope ngā ringa me ngā waewae i te kikī o ngā here.
Kurekure noa ana tāua ki tā tāua taniwha; he koa te tino tikanga o tēnā kupu
E karapotia ana te marae e te rākau māori - e kore koe e mōhio ko te tāone kei kō tata atu.
Kei te tīareare katoa ngā pouaka nā, porowhiua te katoa.
Ko te reo o Rarotonga te pūnga o tā tātou kupu mō te kōkōnati, arā o te 'niu'.
Ko te takahanga o ngā kupu o te Tiriti te pūnga o te matangurunguru o te iwi Māori i ngā tau whai i muri iho.
Kōnonohi ana te pouwaru ki tana hoa kua riro
E tuku atu anō ki te tuna hei omaki mō Maru
He tokomaha ngā tāngata i haere mai ki te whakarongo ki tā mātau pēne
Ahakoa pēhea tāna whakapatipati i a koe kia haere i tana taha, kaua e whakarongo.
I ngā pō, ka haria e ia tāna reo irirangi ki tana moenga kia pai ai tana whakarongo ake ki ngā kaituku waiata
Tērā he whānui ake te titiro a te tamaiti reorua ki te ao, tēnā i te tamaiti kotahi noa iho te reo.
He kura reorua.
Ka tūhura ngā ākonga i ngā tikanga rokiroki kai o nehe, ka whakatairite ki ō nāianei.
He parāone kē te tae o ngā ika o tērā roto.
Ka pātai te pouako nā wai i ūkui atu āna tuhituhi, noho kū ana te akomanga.
Kua tae atu a Tiki ki te āhua oneone i apoapohia rā e ia hei tangata
Kua tōrua te hau ki te tonga.
Me tūpato ki ngā tai tōrua o Te Moana-o-Raukawa.
I kawea kētia e ia tōna ingoa ko Ihungarupaea
I kawea kētia te huarahi kia kore ai e waipuke ina kaha te ua.
He pahi iti te waka aronui mō ngā tāngata hauā nei.
Tōiri ana te whare korikori i te hoihoi o ngā puoro.
Haria mai tō reti, kia pai ai tā tāua haere ki te panunu i te puke rā.
Ka mahia tērā atu pito o te kuru kia poroharore, kia pai ai te pehu i ngā kai.
Ko ngā wini katoa o ngā whare o te tāone, kapi tonu i te tāngata me te pōwhiriwhiri i ngā haki, me te umere hoki ngā waha
Pehopeho ana te ruru i te atapō, kōkō ana te tūī i te atatū.
Ka komoria te ihu o te waka ki te korokoro o te waha o Te Parata, ka rima tauare o taua waka ki roto ki te wai
Kaua e tāwhitiwhiti, me henga tōpuni tātou.
Me haere i te henga tōpuni.
Huakina te peita, ka tīkapekape kia hanumi katoa ai.
Ka mau te kōtiro e whānako moni ana, he hūnene te kai a te māmā.
Engari i whakatūria te kēti hei kohikohi moni i te katoa, kia ai he rawa hei whakapai i te rori, kia pai ai te haere a te katoa - te Pākehā me te Māori
Āu mahi, e te rehe!
He rehe ki te whatu kākahu.
Ina takohe te mahi, ka tika te mahinga mai. Ina mahia i runga i te pōāritarita, ka hē.
Kua mutu rā tana mahi, kua pai tana haere ki te hāereere i runga i te takohe.
Ki te kore e whewhera mai ngā waewae o te arawhata, ka tukoki, tērā tonu koe e hinga.
E kore e ea aku nama i te mahi mō te rua tēkau hāora noa iho i te wiki - me mahi ukiuki rawa e ea ai.
Kei te pīkau ia i ngā akoranga ukiuki i te whare wānanga, me te hari anō i ngā mahi tahitahi whare i ngā pō.
Tonoa ngā tamariki kia tohu mai i ngā rārangi tōtika me ngā piko i te pikitia nei.
Ko ngā kōuru o ēnei awa nō ngā maunga i kōrerotia nei
E tika ana anō kia āta mānawatia ngā rangatira kua tae mai nei ki tā tātou hui.
He oneone pāpaku, he rākau nepinepi.
E ta, me taha kau rā anō e pūpā ai te pukurua rā.
Me whakamau pōtae mārō hei tiaki i tō papa angaanga, mō te tūpono taka koe i te pahikara.
Heoi anō te mea nāna i ora ai te ngākau nā ā koutou reta e tuhi mai nei, e mea nei he mate hōnore te mate ki te pakanga
Ko ia te mātāmua o Niu Tīreni ki te hinga ki roto o te pakanga. He mate hōnore te mate ki roto o te whawhai
Ka haere tahi rāua ko tōna hoa ki te nehenehe ki te tapatapahi rākau
Tīkina atu ngā hū i waho rā, ka whakarārangi mai ki te kokonga nei.
Tēnā tīkina mai te mea nei.
Nā te tamaiti rawahanga rā i huna ana niho i a ia e moe ana.
He whakakai kei taku toke mauī e tautau ana.
Kua puanga noa iho te tangata, kua kore he kiko, he aha
Ko te ritenga tēnei o ngā hapū Māori ina tautohetohe ki te whenua — he whakaekeeke ki te whawhai, ā riro ana te papa i te hunga uekaha ki te pana atu i te hoariri
He tārai, mō te panehe te tukou, mō te toki nui he tārai
Kua paratinaku ngā tamariki pakeke ake i te taitapa o te papa tākaro.
Kia kaua te tamaiti kaurapa e tomo atu i te wai hōhonu, kei toremi.
Ka whakatika, ka mau ki te pakihiwi mauī
He pakihiwi tangata, e kore e mawhaki.
Kāore au i te pīrangi ki ngā taewa rahi, he reka kē atu ngā mea hauiti.
Tiua atu, tiua mai, kua hinga anō te tangata
Kei te wiri au, kei te wera i roto i a au, kei te ngātoro katoa i roto i a au
He miri moana, he patu rā i te pohe o te ākau kia mōwai ai, ē
Nā te ngahau o te kaiwhakaako i rata ai mātou ki ngā mahi pūtaiao.
E kītia ana, e waru marama matatia ana te kānga kōpiro. Ki a au nei, me patupatu rawa ki roto i te tāora kua oti hoki te muru mai, kia ngohengohe rawa, kātahi ka kōhua kia maoa. Na kua riringi he waiū ki runga, ka kōrori atu he huka ki roto, na kua reka ake i te pākū Pākehā
Nō te kitenga i ngā kanohi o te tangata whenua o te marae, ka oho te ngākau aroha, ka whai i muri ko te matamata rongo.
He hanga ōrite ēnei - e rua, e rua, he tapatoru, he ōrite anō te rahi.
Kia ngoikore haere te tinana, me kai, me whakatā rānei kia whai ngoi anō ai.
Ko te namunamuā o te tītī anahe i mahue iho ki te kōhua pūhā, heoi, ka nui tonu te reka.
Ka tukuna ngā hipi kia piki i ngā hū ki reira kai pātītī ai.
Mā te wahine e tapa te whana o te riri
Nō tana kōrerotanga atu kāore anō kia tuakina āna ika, kātahi a Rāpata ka whāki atu i tana hara
Nō te taenga o te ika rā ki uta, ka tuakina te puku
Ko runga ake puta noa ki tētahi pito ki tētahi pito, i whakatakototia ki te pēke parāoa, ki te pēke huka, ki te poaka tinana kua oti te tuaki
E koira ana te tangata rā ki a koe me tana kore e whakaae ki tō mahi.
Ka aranga i konā te rākau a Manaia, ko Kihia, ko Rakea, he ururangi, he tamatama-a-rangi
He kurī mahake, he pai mō te tangata noho tāone.
I whakamauru te tohunga i a Tangaroa kia iti noa iho ngā ngaru o te moana.
E oti ai he koke, ka werohia atu te tōtō o te kāretu ki te tātārau o te whārangi.
Kāhore he hōnore o te kapu ki te kore i wini, engari he hōnore tonu tō te wini ahakoa kore kapu
I tāwāhi ko mātou ngā Māori ka kīia e ngā tāngata whenua he tangata tahiti.
He kupu tahiti te kupu 'ture', i takea mai i te reo Hīperu.
Ka werohia ki ngā tapatapa, koia te pūmāhu, te moharuru o ngā kūhā
Kua āhua pōrewharewha noa i ngā kino i kite wheako ai ia i te pakanga.
Ka whiua ngā kara ki Te Whānau-a-Apanui, rāua ko Te Whakatōhea. Ka tapaina te ingoa a taua patu ko Te Whiu, mō te whiunga o ngā kara
E kore e mutu tā rātou whawhai ki te kaunihera.
Ka riri te kuia ki ngā tamariki haututū.
He moke taua tangata, e noho ana ko ia anake i tōna kāinga
Te rā e whanake ana i te huapae o te moana
Ka motu te kahaki ka taka te pīkaunga.
He wā e heke ai te roimata i te pōuri, he wā anō e heke ai i te makoakoa.
He epa noa iho te hū ki te tamariki; he pai noa ake te haere hū kore.
Nau mai, e tama, ki te taiao nei, kia whakangungua koe ki te kahikātoa, ki te tūmatakuru, ki te tara ongaonga
Kei te ora tonu te mea nā, inā e oreore mai nā te hiku.
Tēnei ka puta mai, i runga i ngā moana me ngā rehu o te tai
Pūhia e te hau ki runga o Pukekāhu, ka ngaro ia i te rehu tai
Ka aroha ana hautai. Kāore nei ōna pūweru pai?
Ko te taumaha mō ngā kai
E taukiri tonu ana te iwi i te matenga o tō rātou ariki.
Koirā tonu te āhua o te tangata mekemeke, he whakatāwāhi, me te whakaiti anō i te hoariri.
E ngā hoa, mēmea e hē ana me tere te whakahē
Kia āta tūmata i te ahi koi wera te whare
Kāore i roa ka pai haere ana mahaki i tana rongoā.
Mēnā he rangi pakakinakina āpōpō, ka haere tātou ki te awa, kaukau ai.
Ka puta mai i te wai, ka takoto, ka ope i te one ki te uhi i a ia kia mahana ai tana tinana.
Kua parā noa tēnā rākau.
He riri anō tā te tawa uho, he riri anō tā te tawa parā
Kātahi ka whaoria ki roto ki te ngaruru, ka karakiatia me te tangi anō
Ka rapu huarahi rāua e puta ai i Te Whanga-nui-a-Tara. Ka kākari tuatahi ko Whātaitai. Ka whītiki i a ia. Ka maranga te upoko ki runga. Kua pīoioi te whiore
Ki te whawhai tātau ki te mate kohi, me whakahou ngā mahara, me whītiki ki ngā whītiki a te iwi e toa ana ki te whawhai ki te kohi
Ka horo te pā, ka rere ngā mōrehu ki te ngahere.
Ka ea mai a Whānui
Ko te kawau te wāhanga o te tao ka puritia ki te ringaringa.
Haere, e Pene, māu e kōrero atu anei kia hoki mai a Hori ki te kāinga.
He hanga matariki ngā whetū ki te titiro atu, engari inā kē te rahi.
Tata tonu au ka pura i te hana o te rama i te whakaata.
Kia tino roa te kōhua i te kānga kopiro, kātahi anō ka maoa, ka tika hei kai.
Ko te hoa e noho koromāungaunga ana i muri, i te tere o te haere o tō rāua waka me te pīoioi anō.
Ka āhua hāpiapia te kiri i te kaukautanga ki te wai mātaitai.
Hākerekere ana a Hine i te hinganga i ngā whakamātautau.
Āta ringihia atu te turi ki te paura kāpia me te kōrorirori anō kia kore ai e pōkurukuru.
Kaua e hangaia tō whare ki te whenua pīpīwai, ka pirau noa iho.
Kāore te roimata hua noa i aku kamo, he aroha i mauki ki a Tumuhuia
Kua huritua tērā, kua kore e hiahia kite i te heihei e kōwiria ana te kakī.
I ngā pō kore kapua, kore hau o te takurua tērā te tīkona ai o te papa e te huka.
Mā Kahutia-te-rangi, te tangata i moea ki runga ki te takapau wharanui
Whakahinapō i ō mata
Tamaiti i ahuahua, ka ahuahu i āna ake ā tōna wā.
Nā te kore i āta kitea nā wai i tāhae, ko wai tātou ki te whakawā i ētahi?
Ka mahia ngā mahi a Ruhanui, a te kū, a te whai, a te pānonoko
Ka mea atu te whaea ki tana tamaiti kia marohi ia i te wā e werohia ana tōna ringa ki te ngira.
Kēkē kau ana te pārera
Ka tāia te moko o te tangata, ka tū te tohunga, ka karakia i te ātahu, kia pai mai ngā wāhine ki taua tangata
I taurakitia ngā kai kia menge rā anō, kia iti noa te wai o roto. Nā konei i kore ai e pirau.
He koromiko te wahie i taona ai te moa
Ka pākikitia te tāne kia kōrero, kore noa iho e kōrero
Kei te pākikitia mai au e taku tama mō te pūtakenga mai o tēnei mea, te pēpē.
Ka nui te pākiki, ka roa te haere.
Pōkia tā tātou umu
Kua puta te kupu a ētahi tohunga o te iwi Pākehā, e rua rau tau e tū mai nei ka pōkia te ao e te hukapapa
Ahakoa piro tonu taku hoa i te kaikuru, i toa tonu tō mātou tīma.
Ko te ono te marama pai hei whakatō kai i ēnei takiwā.
E kore te tai e kātata mai ki ngā taipū i ngā taitai ririki.
Tērā Matariki whakakau ana mai
Nō te kitenga i te Pākehā ka kīia e ngā mātua he tangata pora
E pau katoa ana i taua manu te ngūngū, ā me mātua mahi nui te tangata, ka hoki mai te hāwhe iti o ana kai ki a ia
Ka tukuna a Tamarau, ka hoki ia ki Waikaremoana, ka noho atu i reira tae noa ki te wā ka whāia mai a Te Kooti ki te mano whenua o Te Urewera
Na, ki te karakia, kaua e takoto i roto i te paraikete, kaua e whakawhirinaki, engari kia poupou te noho
Engari kāore e pai kia tītaha te tūnga atu o te waewae, engari kia poupou tonu
E matakawa ana au ki a ia i te mea he pākiwaha, he waha papā.
E rere ana te tokokawa i te roa o te omanga.
Kaua e hoki i te waewae tūtuki, engari hei te upoko pakaru rawa.
Ka hinga ki te whenua, wāhia ana; ka pakaru; ko Matahōrua tētahi para, ko Aotea tētahi
Ka noho ia ki te whakaharuru i tana waka hou, tē haruru, tē aha, mōhio tonu ia kua nukaia ia.
Tērā koia ngā uru whetū, hikitia hāpainga ake ki te tautara ki Ōhau rā
Mā te pāpā pea e āwhina, e whakamoe ana tamariki i ngā pō.
I mea ia kia hoatu he rongoā whakamoe i a ia kia kore ai ia e rongo i te mamae
E tūtakitaki ana ngā kapua o te rangi, kei runga Te Mangōroa e kōpae pū ana
Tēnā ko te toa mahi kai e kore e paheke
E kī ana kāhore rawa ngā Rūhia i tae rawa ki roto ki te tino o te pā o te Tāke, engari i waho kau nei e noho ana
Ko te tino o Taiāmai tēnei kāmaka
Ā i mea a Te Ōmana, kāhore a Te Mākarini i hoko whenua rāhui o te Māori. He tika anō tētahi wāhi o taua kupu, otiia, i kaiponuhia te tino o te kupu pono
Ko te tino o tēnei mahi, ko te whakaiti i ngā whāruaruatanga
Kīhai koe i kite i te whārona awatea
Me tohu ngā pua o te kamokamo nā hei whakatō ā te tau e tū mai nei.
Ka pāhuahua ngā hōia a Te Kāwana i ngā whare katoa o te iwi i te hinganga o te pā.
He tangata mātātoa i mua, engari i te hokinga mai i te pakanga, kua whakatairuhi noa.
Ka tōuwha te puku i te nui o te kai.
Ko te rārangi maunga o Tawatawhiti
Kei kō atu anō, kei te taha ki te Nōta he rārangi motu anō
I tohua ngā pāhihi kia āta pupuri i te poti i te wā ka heke i te korio.
E rua tekau tau kei waenga i te mātāmua me te kauaeraro.
Me he rau kahakaha e māwewe ana
Kāore au e mōhio ki a ia, engari ka tūtaki māua āpōpō, i te mea ko māua tahi ngā kaiwhakawā o te poi.
Ka whakaritea me hoki mai mātau ki taua wāhi anō tūtaki ai, mō te piki ki runga o te tima i te rua tekau rau hāora
I whakaae a Tāmihana kia tūtaki rāua ko te kāwana, engari nā te uruuru a ētahi o ngā rangatira Māori kia kaua e haere, kāhore rāua i tūtaki
E rima ngā tīma i roto i tēnei wāhanga, i mate i a mātau ngā mea e whā. Kua whakaritea ka tūtaki mātau ki ngā toa o te hauāuru, ki Te Wairoa
Ka heua ake, ara, he tangata!
I reira ngā koroheke o Taranaki e kōhumuhumu, e tūmatakuru ana ki te whakahīhī rawa o te autaia nei
Ka kongange tonu ngā punua i te whānautanga mai, engari kia kai i te waiū, ka kitea he kaha, taro ake, kua omaoma haere.
Ka roa te oke e takoto ana i te hōhipera, nā wai ā, kua ora anō.
Tata ngaro atu ana te karupango ina whakatea taua wahine.
Ehara i te taonga hau te kai e puritia nei e mātou, e Ngāti Toa
He mīhini horoi kākahu tā rātou hau ki te iwi kāinga.
I te kaha o te kai wātakirihi kua rite ngā tā ki ō te hipi.
Kei kīia, i āpurutia ki roto i tōna waha ana kōrero
Ka eke ki te hāputa o te riri, kua whati kē ngā whiore hume ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Hei te Iwa māua haere ai ki te hararei, i te mea kua taki hokihoki ngā ākonga ki te kura i tērā wā.
Me kore ake te pāwhakarua i kore ai e pau ngā whare noho tata i te ahi.
Ka mutu, ka heru ki te heru pūputu kia riro ake ai ngā kutu kua mate
I tae ia ki ngā kura nunui ki te rapu i te hōhonutanga o te mātauranga o te Pākehā. Ka hono ai i roto i a ia te ao hou me te ao tawhito, te ao Māori me te ao Pākehā
Nō tēnei whakatipuranga, kua Pākehā nei te āhua, ngā mahi, me ngā kahu
He tino mōmona te oneone o konei, he pai hei māra kai.
Ko tōna whare, he whare kōpae
Rikiriki ana i te ngaromanga o tana taonga, ka hia roa hoki e penapena ana i ana moni kia taea ai te hoko.
Arā noa atu te mahana o te whare ina uhia te papa ki te whāriki.
Anei ētahi o ngā pūmau o te reo Māori: he, te, ngā, tētahi, ēnei, tērā, aua, taku, tōna.
Pararē tonu te māngai o te wahine rā
Ka pararē ngā tāngata katoa ki te kata
Kātahi au ka pararē ki te tangi. Oma mai taku pāpā i runga i tana hōiho, ka mea mai, 'I whara koe? I whati ō wheua?'
Ka patua, ka mate a Hema; ko te wahine i rauorangia
Ka mate a Te Hauwaho, ka rauoratia a Tareahi
Hoatu, tuaratia tō teina
Ka haere ka mōmōhangatia te manu
I tōna matenga, ka haere ka kaingākautia āna mahi toi.
Kua haukū katoa ngā tūru i te tōmairangi.
He hanga ia e puta mai ana i roto i ngā ana o te ngākau o te whenua - ngā wahi e mākū ana, e haukū ana, e kore ana e pūhia e te hau, e kore ana e whitingia e te rā
Ki ētahi he mea tapa te rōpū hōia rua tekau mā waru Māori ko Te Hokowhitu-Toa-a-Tūmatauenga.
He mea whakapoto te ingoa o Tūmatauenga ki a Tūkariri, a Tūkaniwha, a Tūkaitaua, ko te tohu o te mau i ngā rākau patu tangata tōna otinga.

Ka heke tonu ō werawera ka tātā ana koe i te wahie pūtī.
He whana tautoko i haere atu i te taha o te tīma, hei reo umere mō rātou.
Kātahi anō ka whakakahukahu ake ngā kai o te māra nei
Ka whakakahukahu haere te kikiri, taihoa ka kukune.
E whā rawa ngā pou o te whare hei tokotoko ake i te tāhuhu.
Ko Tāne anake, nāna i tokotoko te rangi
Me pereti hakoko, kia kore ai e maringi te wairanu.
I te wā ka paopao āna hēki, mā ngā punua tonu rātau e kuhu, kāhore te matua e tiaki i a rātau
Otiia kāore he kupu e ahu ana ki te whakaatu ko wai a Te Motu, e kīia nei nāna tēnei oriori, ā, ko wai hoki a Rangitūmua mōna nei tēnei oriori
Ka tīhaehaetia mai ngā rau maroke o te tī kōuka.
Ka pau te ata ki te huripoki i te māra.
He kupenga papangarongaro.
Hāunga ia ngā Māori o Hāmoa, he panana noa hoki ā rātou na kai, he rāpaki noa te kākahu, he tīhokahoka noa ngā whare
Ka hangā e ia tētahi whare mōna, i hangā anō hoki e ia ētahi tīhokahoka mō ana kararehe
Ki te kore ngā mātua e tautoko i tēnei kaupapa, tērā tonu pea ka hinga.
I te matenga o tana hoa, ka riro mā ana hungarei a ia e tautoko, e awhi.
Tokorua noa iho ngā tāngata kāore i tautoko i te mōtini.
Ki te haka . . . ki te waiata . . . ki te tākaro . . . ki te pūkana . . . ki ngā mahi tinihanga a te Māori
Ka tīkina atu he tangata rongonui hei kōrero i ngā painga o te taonga, hei tinihanga i te kaihoko.
He harore rangitahi
He pai rangitahi
Ehara i te mea e kitea rangitahitia
Ko Kiri anake kei te haere.
Ko ngā rīwai anake ka raua atu ki te hāngi - me kōhua ngā kamokamo me ngā paukena.
Me heheu te tokorua e kākari mai rā.
Te āhua nei kua mau he kōhatu ki te hū o te hōiho, ina e totitoti haere rā.
He mate kai te tangata rā; i kitea ki ngā kanohi ka pokopokorua
E timotimo ana te manu i te āporo.
He kahutoto te kūmara i heria mai e Turi
Ngā utanga o runga, arā ngā ō mai a taua tangata i tōna haerenga mai i Hawaiki, he kūmara (taua kūmara he kahutoto, ā, e ngaki nei anō ngā uri)
Kīhai i kopa te marama kua kitea tōna hapū
Ki te iwi ka kopa ki te ana o Rangitotohu
He nohoanga kōporo - kei te kitea atu te wāhi i poroa ai, e uru pai ai ki taua kokonga rā.
Ka āraia e te ua, e te hau
Ko te whānako ia e whakatōkihi ana i waho, e kimi ara atu ana mōna ki roto i te whare.
Ka tīkarohia mai te puru o te tōmato rākau, ka ruiruia ki te huka, kātahi ka kainga.
Kia roa tonu e kōpirotia ana ngā kaka o te tipu, ka oti mai he puru e taea ana te takapapa hei pepa.
Ka pawhera i ngā pouaka kia kite ai ia he aha ngā kai o roto.
Me āta haere tō waka kia kore rawa te hangoro o te taura, kia tānekaha, takahi te waewae.
Kua takaānini taku māhunga i te tārere.
Me āhiki, e hika mā, kei mahue tātou i te pahi!
E pikari ana te koroua i te kaha mamae o tana tuara.
I ētahi iwi ko te pahapaha e tohu ana i tō āhuareka ki te kai
Ākuanei tō māmā hoki mai ai, nā reira kāti te tangitangi.
Kīhai koe i whakaaro kia mānu te wai i runga o Ngāmotu
Whakataona tā tātou umu
He tūmahi poro te kupu 'maremare', te 'tupu' me te 'iri'.
He wāhi anō kei te Kāwana Tiānara i roto i ngā mahi waihanga ture a te pāremata, arā, māna rawa e whakamana.
Ka taea e au te hanga kono māmā nei, engari kāore ōku take ki te hanga kete whakapaipai. E kore e taea e te kupu te whakaatu te nui o taku aroha mōu.
Me whakangāwari pea, kia taea ai e te tokomaha.
Ka hopo te ngākau o tēnei ihu hūpē ki te āta mahi tahi ki aua tohunga nui te mātauranga.
Kei te haere mai tētahi wahine ki tō mātou kura ki te kōrero ki a mātou mō ngā taonga puoro.
He rangi paihuarere, taro ake, kua kōruku.
He tino kai te roi nā te Māori o nehe; ināianei kua tahuri ki te rīwai, ki te parāoa.
Taea rawa ake te tuakiri ki te wāhi āio, ka toru ngā tū o Hipi, ka koroputaputa noa ōna i te kainga a te matā
Ko ngā taitamariki kua ākona e ngā Pākehā, i haere ki te ngarehe ki te kani papa
Te kauwhata o te atua; hoatu! Mairangatia ki te mairanga o te atua; kia ora ai tātou
I motu tana tōiti i a ia e tapahi ana i te mīti.
He mōhio ake te ngutu huia rā i taku rōia.
Kātahi ka tae ki ngā hūhi kua whakatakotoria ki te mānuka kia taea ai e te tangata te whiti ki tērā taha
Ka pāia te huaki
I ētahi wāhi kua komiti te whero me te kahurangi, e puta ai ko te poroporo.
Te komititanga o ngā wai
Ka tahuri mai ki te ngaki mate mō tōna whakairinga ki runga ki te whare
Mate atu he niho kai waiū, puta mai he niho tautini.
Kia ngahau tonu tō kauhau, kei warea te hunga whakarongo e te moe.
Ka tū te ngeru, ka tautoro i ana waewae o muri, kātahi ka puta ki waho.
Mō te uwheuwhe tāua haere ai ki te kohi pipi, kia kore ai ō tāua tarau e mākū.
Ka meinga rātou kia ngawhi i ngā whiu pākaha, me kore rātou e whakaae ki te mau i ngā kākahu hōia
E pākaha ana te mamae
I te hopukanga ka pākaha rawa te okeoke o te tangata rā
I ngā rā o mua, kotahi noa iho te matapihi me te tatau, i te apai o te whare, kāre kau ana tētahi i ngā taha.
Kua riro te taua ki te hura mōrehu
I noho atu a Māmā ki te mohimohi i a Hera i a ia e māuiui ana.
Nō te ata nei i haere ai a Te Hinahina, i hoe ai ki te titiwha kahawai
'E kui, tino tere koe ki te kawe wai mai.' 'Āe e moko, toitoi tonu taku haere'
Ka tīmata ki te ngangahu, me te whiu tika i tōna taiaha, me te hūpekepeke a ōna waewae. Ehara, kua heke haere i ngā turi, kua huri kua toitoi haere atu
Ka whakangete i tana kuia hōiho me te paku whakakipakipa anō, ehara, kua toitoi haere.
Kātahi ka hāmama ki te karanga, ki te whakahauhau i ana tāngata, ka rere ki mua hautū ai
Kāre au e pīrangi ki te mahi, kua pā mai te anohea i te kaha wera o te rā.
Horahia ō koutou moenga ki ngā rekereke o ngā poupou tūpuna. Waiho te kauhanganui kia wātea ana.
Ka rui koutou i te waru o ngā tau, ka kai anō i ngā hua pakoko
Inā hoki he tino kūare rawa ngā iwi Hauhau ki te pōtoi kererū hei puhipuhi mō tana tewhatewha
Me kore ake te rī i ora ai ngā māhuri nei; ki te kore, kua kainga noatia e te hau moana.
He teitei tonu te whare tūhoa o tō mātou whare karakia.
Nā te kōtiu i kore ai e toro te ahi ki te raki.
Ka pai te rangi ka hauhau, ka tihitihi te hau
He ngahau te tararī ki te hunga tamariki.
Kātahi anō a Manaia ka mōhio nāna anō taua tamaiti, nā, ka arohatia ia e Manaia
Kāore taku rangatira i aroha mai ki taku tono.
E tauhōkai ana a Apu kia tae tuatahi atu ia ki ngā taonga hoko kua whakahekea te utu.
Ko Mauri, ko Utu me Te Kaieke Tohorā ētahi o ngā kiriata Māori rongonui o roto i ngā tau.
He iti kahurangi
Taku hei kahurangi, e kore e maunu i taku kakī.
I hohoni kau te matā (i te kiri), kīhai i ngoto
He tangata purotu, engari mō te māikoiko - ka aroha kē!
Kurangaituku, ē! Ka kino te whenua, ka kore ā tāua taonga
Ko ā mātau pū, ko ngā mea pakupaku e huaina ana he pū hurihuri
Ko tōna ringaringa katau i runga i tōna uma, ā, i roto i tētahi o ōna ringa e mau ana te pū hurihuri, e ono ngā māngai o te pū, kotahi te māngai kāore he kai
Ko te kiri pukupuku me te rere o te hūpē ngā hoa haere o te takurua.
I runga i te kaupapa here hou a te kura, he kai tōtika anahe e hokona ana i tō rātou wharekai.
E hāpai ana te tari i te kaupapa here e kīia nei ko te Whakaōrite Whiwhinga Mahi.
Whakatorouka ana te moe i te matioke o ngā haurangi inapō.
Pītoritoriwaitia ana ōna kanohi i te titiro roa
Kua pītoritoriwai ngā karu i te makariri o te hau.
Ko te mākinokino o ngā taraiwa tētahi take e aituā ana ngā taraka i ō tātou huarahi.
Taringa noa iho ki te ngare a te hunga o rahaki
Kua matawaenga au, kua kore au e mōhio me tuku aku whenua Māori ki a wai ka mate ana au.
E tā, kotahi noa iho te tūru kua haria e koe ki waho, kua whakahotuhotu tonu koe.
Kei te wawata ngā tamariki, kei te whakaaro mō ngā aihikirīmi hei mitimiti mā rātou, mō ngā rare hei ngaungau
Tāna kau e mitimiti mai rā i tana kūao
Ka pata iho te ua
Titiro ki te iti o ngā takahi o te kōhungahunga rā.
Kāore ia e whakaae kia pānuitia ki te ao, i ōna whakahaere i ōna manuao i te moana, he wehi nōna kai mōhio te ao, ka tae hoki te mōhiotanga ki te hoariri
Kua whakahaua hoki kia hangaia 19 manuao tino kaha, e 8 manuao hēteri, 15 manuao o ētahi atu āhua
Ko ētahi kei ngā motu, he manuao rūri i te moana, whakataki i ngā toka, whakatātūtū i te hōhonu o te moana, me ērā atu tini mea
Kei te pai tonu ngā kōpura ahakoa kua kukupi.
Kei te aha te tai i konā - kei te timu, kei te pari rānei?
Te anga karaka, te anga kōura, koi kitea ki te marae
Me wāwāhi te anga o te nati kia taea ai te kiko reka o roto.
E kore ia e whakapuaki i ana whakaaro kei kataina ia - he tangata hūngoingoi hoki.
He aho rangitahi te kaumahaki, ko ngā aho tūturu, he tataki.
Kimihia he peka momore hei tokotoko māu.
Ka rotua te moana
Ina pā te hauāuru i Te Tai Poutini, ka kawea ake ngā pakepaketai ki ngā taipū rā anō.
Ka tohaina te nūpepa kia kore ai te tēpu e paruparu i ngā mahi waituhi a ngā tamariki.
I ērā wā he whai pōtae konumatā ngā nēra i whakamahia i te tuanui o te whare.
Ko ngā ponguru huka e tere haere ana i rō te wai
Ka whakatauhia me neke paku whakamua mai te kura ki Hīrangi ki te wā e āhua pūāhuru tonu ana
Ka tātaihia e ia ngā tūpuna mai i a Hoturoa.
He mea whawhati ngā tiakarete torutoru kia whiwhi tiakarete ai ngā tamariki katoa.
Torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata kua kite i tēnei manu, nā te mea torutoru noa iho ngā manu nei kei te toe
He momo kai te komeke ka mahia ki ngā hua pehupehu o te hīnau.
Kua tāoro āna mahi nanakia ki tawhiti.
Kaua e haria te kete tuangea, he nui rawa pea mō ō taonga torutoru noa.
Patua mai taku kupu
He paraheahea te tāne, ā, e rua rawa ngā mahi a te wahine kia ea ai ā rāua nama.
Tīhaea te pepa i te wāhi ngangengange.
Kotahi marama i muri mai i kitea tana tinana e mau mai ana i raro i te poro rākau
Ko te waipuke nui o te Māehe o 1904 hei kawe mai i ngā poro rākau ki te awa o Mangaaruhe, heke atu mā te awa o Te Wairoa, puta atu ki te moana
Kātahi ka tūtuki te poti ki te poro rākau, ka tahuri
Ka tuperu te ngutu i te kore o te māmā e whakaae ki tana hiahia.
Ko aku weruweru ka tarepa noa i raro
He kāhui whetū a Matariki me Māhutonga.
Me kore ake te pūtahui i matomato ai te tupu o ā tāua kūmara.
Te taenga atu ki te wāhi repo, tapoko tonu iho, he roa hoki nō te ua i tāpokopoko ai
Ko te pākorakora te hoa haere i ngā wāhi tāpokopoko o te pāmu.
He huarahi tāpokopoko te huarahi o te aroha pono
Ina mahia te tīhi, ka wehea atu te waikuruwhatu i te wāhi o te miraka kua tepe.
E pae ana te rākau i te huarahi.
Ka tae ki ngā wai toari o te roto.
Ka kitea ki ngā waewae e takoto ana, ahu tonu ki roto
I te ata pō tonu ka takoto ngā matua o te ope
Ka waiho i reira te punga o te waka, e takoto mai nei anō
He parera kotipu te hau nei, kāore i te ahu tūturu mai i te uru.
Ka aroha te tamaiti taringa pirau rā - kua pahī mai te ero, kua heke i tana kakī.
Ki te kore he kanokāriki o te rau rākau, kāore e taea e te rākau te huri i ngā hihi o te rā hei pūngao māna.
Kei tāmaoatia te mata o te rākau e te kai māoa
Kua parure au, kua kore e kaha ki te mahi, ki te oreore, ki te aha noa iho.
Kātahi ia ka peke ki runga kia kore ai te rākau e pā ki ōna waewae.
Nukuhia te kōhatu nā kia wātea ai te huarahi.
Ka tango te tangata rā i te kōwhatu hei kuru i a ia
He rawe kē ki a au te kaiwhakaari mōhū - e waiho ana mā te kanohi me te tinana e kawe ōna whakaaro.
E pohane tonu nei te ngākau ki te mātauranga
Rangona ai te pakepakē, te tīorooro me te tīkākā o tōna reo i ngā wāhi katoa e pūhia mai ana e te hau
Ka ākona e Hine ki te mahi kai moana. Ka tāia e ia he 'koemi' arā he tōrehe
Ko ngā mate ngaro, e kore e mana; ka tīkina a Whakatau, ea tonu ake aua mate
Ka mate hoki tā rātou uto, ka ea hoki tō rātou mate ngaro rā.
He mate ngaro te mate o Tūwhakararo; he maha ngā taua ngaki mate, kāore i mate mai tētahi tangata o te iwi o Manahua i ngā taua katoa e rapu utu ana
I te kaha o te porotiti, o te hurihuri o tēnā pōro, kore rawa i taea e taua tāhae te pupuri, taka tonu atu ki te raro
Rawe ana tērā te porotiti a te poi
I mau ngā nanakia e tuhi pāhau ana ki ngā whakaahua o ngā tāngata tōrangapū.
Ka tīrariraria ngā hua o te māra ki te katoa.
Na, taku kupu ki a koe, me mutu te mahi whakapehapeha ki te nui o tōu mōhiotanga
Pārūrūtia te hinu me te wairēmana, ka riringi atu ki ngā hua mata.
Ka pārūrūtia ngā kākano kia pahuhu mai ai ngā pāpapa.
Kia mau ki te toi hanga whare, arā ki te whakatupu tangata
Kia waru tekau ana whiwhinga mō te tau mō ana akoranga katoa, kua puta tana ihu.
Ko te pepa hei tuhinga mā te tangata i tōna ingoa, i tōna ingoa, me pine ki taua pitihana, ka tuku atu ai ki Pōrangahau
Kei te pātata te wā ka tae mai ētahi parekura nunui
E kore rawa Te Wananga nei e pānui i ngā kōrero o ana reta, ā kia tuhituhia mai rā anō e taua hunga ngā ingoa tūturu, i iriiria ai rātou e ō rātou mātua
Ko tōna pāpā tūturu ko Matairangi . . . ā, ko tōna māmā ake ko Te Ataihaea nō Ngāti Tūwharetoa
Ka mate a Tauteka ka tū ko ia hei rangatira tūturu mō Ngāti Te Aho
E tahu ana te kai, kīhai i roa ka maoa te kai
E rua hāora te mīti e tahu ana, kātahi anō ka māoa.
Ka inoihia atu kia ngatete, auare ake - he upoko mārō hoki.
Kia puku te rae o te tangata rā, kua tūtaki ngā tukemata.
Ko Te Kapua kāre i kōrero, ko te hiki noa iho o ōna tukemata
Tae noa ki te kāwai tapu o te Kīngi o Waikato i mōhiotia ai nā tōna ure tārewa i titia ai te kōtuku ki runga ki a Te Wherowhero Pōtatau
Ka topetopea te kahiwi ki ngā poro e taea ana te kuhu atu ki te ahi.
Ngau ana ki te tī, ki te tā, kāore tonu i tatū te noho.
E tuwhera ana ngā hāngī, e pae ana ngā rautao, ngā wahie, ngā kōwhatu
I reira hoki ngā pēke, ka utaina ki runga ki te kōneke i muri i te tarakihana
I te reringa o te hōiho me te kōneke, ka pangā katoa atu ā mātou kai ki runga i te kōneke
He kurī anō kei ētahi whenua, he tō haere tāna i te kōneke o tōna ariki i runga i te haupapa, me he hōiho e tō kāta nei
Taratutū ana ngā hōia o Te Hokowhitu-a-Tū i a rātau e haka ana, ānō he taniwha kua maunu i tōna rua.
Ehara rā pea, e tama, i konei, nō rāwāhi mai anō
Ka kōrangatia te kōmaru rahi ake kia tere ake ai te haere.
I ngā pikitia ngū o mua, ka riro mā te kori o te tinana me te kanohi e kawe te whakaaro.
I tētehi o ngā hui, ka whakawhiua rāua ki te haka ngutu momoho, me te mutunga mai o te whakamanioro i te tangata
Ka haere mai ngā tāngata ki te hākari, ka uea e rātou ngā kai o te hākari kia mate, kia hore atu
Mehemea ka patua taku tamaiti e tētahi iwi nui, ka uea e ahau taua iwi kia haere
I tiakina hoki e ia, ānō ko te whatupango o tōna kanohi
Waiho kia hau ana, hei tīrare taua, hai kawe kōrero
Kei hea te wāhi tānga wahie?
He whakawai tānga moko
He rango te kōpapa wai wera.
He hanga rango ngā kēnā kai.
Mō te mangō ururoa tēnei, ina mate mai ki uta, ka waiho puku tonu kia roa, ka kōhangohango
He rangatira ōku pūtake katoa i te taha ki taku matua, he ware i te taha ki tōku whaea.
Kua whakaūngia te ture e te Poa kia kaua e whai wāhi ngā mangumangu me ngā hāwhekaehe ki te pōti mō te kāwanatanga o Āwherika ki te Tonga
Ko te karangatanga hapū o Tohu ko Puketapu o Te Āti Awa
Ka kataina e te tini o Te Āti Hāpai taua tangata
Kāore anō i huru te rā, kua takahi te tira i te huarahi.
E koe! Ka kīia atu kia tūpato, ka tohe tonu koe.
E koe e koe! Koinā te hua o te kore e whakarongo.
He tītapu e whakarākei ana i te pōtae.
Tino tere rawa atu te huri o te pōtaka a Rikirangi.
E takahui mai ana ngā pūao, taihoa pea ka ua.
Kia tāroia te moana a Kupe ki Whāngārā, ko Matioro
Tihe mauri ora
Ka pairi taku poho i te rongonga kua tae te rewharewha kino nei ki Te Pāpaka-a-Māui.
Ka āta miria atu ana roimata ki tana ringa tonu.
Me kari rawa he waitahenga kia kore ai ngā taiapa nei e tāpokopoko noa.
Ko taku pāpā whakaangi tēnei i moe i taku whaea i te matenga o taku pāpā tupu.
Ka whakakopakopa ia i tana pēpē ki tōna uma ka menemene.
I tua tata atu o ngā huarākau ko tā mātau pātiki hei
Kia rua tau e tipu ana ngā karaihe o ngā pātiki nei, kia pakari rawa kaua he mea e tukua ki roto kai ai i ngā otaota o aua taiepa
E rere, e te kōtare, ki runga i te pūwharawhara, rūrū ai i ō parirau
E kama ana ngā tamariki ki te haere ki te awa, ina kua kuhu kē i ō rātou kaka kaukau.
Kia tūpato, e hine, i tō rakuraku pēnā mai i a au, kei raru koe i a tama ngarengare!
Kāre aku moni, nō te mea i pau katoa ki te whakaea i te nama mō te hiko.
He mea parai ngā tuna maiti, ka pāwharatia ngā mea nunui.
Eke, eke, eke hohoro; eke Tangaroa, eke panuku, hui ē, tāiki, ē!
Kāore tonu e tino eke te whakamāori, eke panuku nei
Ka riariakina te whakapakoko whakanui i a ia ki te puku tonu o te tāone.
He tau hua, e nui ana te kai.
Ka tere haere a ia, me te kaha o ōna parirau, ka tere ake tōna haere. Ka tīmata te ripiripi haere o Awarua i te wai, ka ara ake tōna upoko, ka puta ake tōna hiringa kaha ki ōna parirau
Ka hangā he tari, ā, ka hoatu, ka pōtaria ki tona upoko
Me auaha tonu te hinengaro o te tangata tito waiata.
Nā Tāmati Ngākaho i tārai ngā poupou mō Porourangi. Ka tāraia, ka waihangahangatia kia puta rawa te auaha, kātahi ka toroa kia pai ai te āta whakarākai, te whakapaipai
I puta ake ai ko Ngāuruhoe, te ngāwhā e hū rā i te tihi o te maunga
Me huawhenua hūpenupenu hei kai mārō tuatahi mā pēpē.
Mūrea pai te māra i te mīhini kai otaota.
Tangata matauaua, ka motu te manu i te ringa, engari tangata matawhāiti, ka tini ka rau.
Nō tō rātau mōhiotanga he hōia ērā, kātahi rātau ka puta mā muri o te pā
Ka puta te kiore ki roto
Ka whakahēngia te puta tika atu o ngā para i ngā kōrere ki te moana.
Ka whakatūria tana waka ki te kōruru o te rākau.
Tau mai ana ki te aroaro o te Ahorangi te pōwhiri a te rōpū nei, a NALI, kia haere atu ko ia hei kaikōrero matua ki te hunga rāmemene mai ki te hui ā-tau
Kaua e haere ki reira - ka tohetohe taua kaihoko kia whakaae rā anō koe ki te hoko i tētahi o ana taonga.
He aha te mate o te pātīhau, ki te kore ō hoa kōrero?
Ka tonoa he kaiwhakamaherehere whenua hei āwhina i tā rātou tono ki te Kaunihera.
Me kore ake te pāruru hei whakaruru i a rātou i te ua.
Me karahui ngā mea kia kotahi te putunga
Ko wai rā ngā wāhine e whakatairuhi ana i te huarahi
Tihoi ana te katakata a ngā wāhine rā - me hoko he puru mō aku taringa.
Kua pōauau katoa, kua kore i maumahara ki te aituā i whara ai ia.
Kua pango katoa te tuanui me ngā pakitara o te whare kaunga i te pawa o te ahi.
He mea tika kia kaua ngā kararehe e patua ana hei kai, e patua ki roto ki te taiawa o te marae, engari me patu ki ngā wāhi i waho atu o ngā marae
He rākau māmore, kāhore he manga, kāore he peka.
He māra kūmara nahanaha tēnei, arā, kei te tōtika ngā rārangi katoa.
Kāore he wāhi ki te tangata hūmārie i te riri, me horetātā tonu.
Haere koe ka wawao i ngā rorirori rā, kia noho kē tētahi, kia noho kē tētahi.
Ko ngā mea e here ana ka wetekia, ko ngā mea e ngangau ana ka waoa
Ka rori ngā kauae
Māna e pūtiki te ua o te pakanga, e tauwhiro mai rā te hiku o te taua
Nā te kume ā-papa, ko te taumaha e rongo nei tātou ina mahi tātou ki te hiki i tētahi mea.
Nā te kume ā-papa me te torohaki e pūmau ai te ara e huri ai te ao i te rā.
Ki te tika te whakahaere a te heamana i te hui, ka pai katoa te hui.
Ka pai te kōtaotao hauwai hei whakaora i te tangata hiamoe.
Mōhio rawa ake e tuwhera tonu ana te kēti, kua oma kē ngā hipi.
I te pō ka tahuna ngā ahi tuku ki te rangi, ānō he matakōkiri e rere ana
He tangata hūmārie i uruhitia e ngā āhuatanga o te wā kia pakanga
Mōkai taku taokete ui makihoi.
Kua whakauwhia au e ngā tāngata o reira
Kua roa kē ēnei tuhituhinga e takoto ana, ā, kātahi anō ka puta kia whitia e te rā
Tō kiri mirimiri ki te renga hōrū nō Parakauae
Ka ū te poti ki te tauranga i te wāpu, ka tāwhai au ki rahaki
Ka kauhoe anō a Hinemoa; otiia kāore ia i āta kite atu i Mokoia i te pōuri o te pō
Ko te utu mō te tau, kotahi pāuna. Otiia, ki te tukua mā te mēra, kotahi pāuna, e rua hereni me te hikipene mō te tau
Ko rātou ki te tara nui o te whare moe ai, ko te tangata whenua ki te tara iti
Hei konei ka tīmata ngā mihi ā-whare, mai i te tara iti, ā, huri noa ki te tara nui
Kua whakarewha i te kōnakonako o ngā rama.
Ki te kore te wai e pūngarungaru, ka kitea noatia te kōeaea e hou atu ana ki tō kupenga.
Ko taua whenua he repo katoa, eke ake ana ki runga ake i ōna pona te poharu, ka roa atu ia e haere ana ka kino atu hoki te poharu
I a ia hoki ngā karakia whakanoa i ngā taonga me ngā wāhi tapu
Mā te tangata e whakatapu tētahi wāhi, tētahi tikanga, tētahi mea rānei, ā, māna anō e whakanoa, arā, mā te reo
Kua ioio katoa aku kūhā he kore nōku e waia ki te eke hōiho.
Kīhai rawa i kitea te mata o Tamareia ki roto ki te haputa o te riri
Ahakoa kāore i whai wāhi ia i te haputa o te riri tōrangapū, oti atu ana i a ia te mahi nui ki te tiaki mai i te hauora o te iwi o Poronihia
Ka haere ake rātou ki te marae ki te whakareri i te wharenui, te mahi kai, te patu mīti, te tiki wahia
Ka rangā he honae hei pupuri i ana whakakai marihi.
Ka hoatu i te oranga mō rātou, ko te kete, ko te ahi, ko te taumata
E hiko ana te manu i te ata, ka whakatika māua, ka haere
Na, he hē tēnei mehemea ka tupu ake te ngākau tarahae, te mauāhara, hei tauwehe i ngā iwi e rua, i te Pākehā i te Māori
He ngao tū te takere o te waka kia kore ai te wai e piri ki reira, ka pōturi te haere.
Ko Tūrangapito anō te torotoro i mua o taua ope taua
Kua whiua ia e te ture, he kōhunu nōna i tōna hoa rangatira.
Ko te kūtai mātātoka nei i kitea i tawhiti noa atu i te moana.
Ka herea he tuaina ki ngā poihau a ngā tamariki.
Kātahi ka unuatia ngā waka ki tētahi taha, ki tētahi taha o te waka o Uenuku
Kaua e māharahara ki tā tātou manuhiri, he kaikama tonu ngā tūmau o te wharekai nei.
He ngaore te tupu o te māra
E kī ana tana pēke i te pūhā ngaore.
Mā te tātea o te tāne e whakatō te kākano o te wahine kia hapū ai ia.
I te tāpāraro ka anga te pere tohu hau ki te tonga.
Tāwhewheo ana tērā te haere mā te takutai, engari inā kē te rerehua.
Nā tana takaroa i whakaepaepa ngā whakahaere mō te rā.
Tēnā homai he wāhi paku o te keke nā, hei whakareka noa i taku waha.
I waho o te taha hauāuru o te whare, kei kō paku atu, e tipu ana ngā rākau piki e ono
Ka whetoki te manu ki uta, ka whetoki te manu ki tai
Kua karapa atu ki te kite pēhea nei te roa o te whakautu kua tuhia e tana hoa noho tata.
Hei a i a! Hei a i a! Titiro, tahuri, karapa ki muri, ki mua, ki te manaia, ki te whakarei o te waka nā. Hei a i a! Hei a i a!
E noho koe i runga i te ama, kei makere atu koe!
Ka tīpao ētahi ki te tiro whenua haere, ana ka ngaro.
Ko ngā hua o te tawa ka kohia, ka taopakatia ki te imu
Kāore i huri tō rātau motukā, engari i tukia atu te pito o te piriti, haere tika tonu atu ki roto i te awa, toremi katoa ngā tāngata o runga
I whakatūria he rōpū tūao hei āwhina i ngā whānau i kaha raru i te waipuke.
Puta noa i te wā e ora ana a ia, i mahi tūao ai a Mihi mā te iwi o tōna rohe
Pohepohe noa ngā kōtiro i ngā tama e whātero mai ana, e pūkana mai ana i te matapihi.
Ka tū te ngārahu o te Māori, ka whakatoatoa ngā tamariki, ka whakahīhī atu ki ngā Pākehā, ka kōrero tāwai ki ngā tikanga o te Kāwanatanga
Ko te tangata kūare kino, nāna nei i tuhituhi ki tana pene tēnei karanga whakatoatoa, e kōwhiuwhiu ana i te ahi o te whawhai kia mura nui
E kī ana kua oti ngā pā o tētahi o tētahi, kua pūhia ngā pū, engari he mea whakahī noa, he whakatoatoa kau, kāore hoki he tangata i mate, i tū rānei
Ka whakatūria e te hoariri he taiapa teitei kia kore ai ngā herehere e oma.
I whīrokiroki katoa ngā herehere i puritia ki taua puni herehere kino.
He mea whakapaipai tana māhunga ki te awe kōtuku.
Ko te kaupapa o tana kauwhau ki ngā ākonga ko ngā kīwaha Māori.
Ko te rite i ahau ko Māhutonga e rauna i te ao, ka maero au nei
Tēnā haramai, ka pūrongorongo i ngā āhuatanga katoa o tā koutou haere ki Haina.
Waiho māna tonu e pūrongorongo tana wikitōria.
Ka kōkiri katoa te ope ki te patu haere i ngā mano tini
Kua kerekerewai aku mati i te kino o te makariri.
Nō te takoto papatairite ka kīia he tuakahiwi; mehemea ka auheke, ka kīia he karahiwi
Kātahi ka tahuri ki te kai i ngā manga e tere ana i te wai, ka hāpukutia ki tōna waha
He kaiwawao whutupaoro anō hoki ia i Pōneke me Whanganui
I kī mai a Uapare i hē katoa te mahi a te kaiwawao, koinā rātou i mīere ai
He hanga merowhetau - mā te karu whakarahi rawa e kitea ai.
Ka whakahaua te pononga kia haere ki te tiki wai mōna.
Ka nui te wehi o te iwi ki te taniwha hautupua o te awa.
He haka kia titoia?
He pai ia ki te tito, ki te kōrero tene. Engari au, me āta tuhi rawa aku kōrero, ka pānui noa.
Kei aku manu taupunga, kei aku ariki e tau nei, tēnā koutou.
Nā te āwhā i pēnei rawa ai te rauraha o te pakepaketai ki uta.
Ko te toroa uta nāku i tautara ki te akerautangi; ko te toroa tai nāku i kapu mai i te huka o te tai
Ko te huka i te kōhua kai e tohu ana kua moī ngā kai.
Ka kite i te huka i te waha o tana kurī, ka mōhio kua paihanahia.
'Kei Rānana ia ināianei.' 'I reira ia,' te whakatika atu a tana hoa.
Koia i kore ai au e whakatika i tō pānui tuatahi, e kī ana koe mā ngā kaumātua noho i roto i ngā whare wānanga, e taki i nāianei
Whakatikangia te noho o ō mōhiti ki runga i tō ihu
I whakatikaina te ture, kia whai wāhi atu ai ngā wāhine.
Nāku i whakatika ngā wāhi i whakapono ai au e hē ana, engari kāore e kore he wāhi tonu kei te hapa.
Ko te rerenga o taua kawau ki runga amio ai
Tangi amio ana te karoro i tai rā
Whiwhi ana te kohake i tana penihana kaumātua, kotahi atu ki te hoko kai māna.
Ka whiua te pēke rīwai ki tana tuarā, ka tākawetia atu ki te waka.
Ka meatia he mōhiti ki te ihu o te poaka kia kore ai ia e kūtoro haere.
Ka kite au i te tangata e puta mai ana, ka aweke noa au ki tahaki kia hemo ake taua tangata
Ka ao pōuri, ka ao pōtango
Nā te makariri i pango katoa ai ngā rau o te kamokamo.
Nā taua pōrangi rātou i eneene kia whiuwhiu pātara ki runga i te papa tākaro.
Te whakatikanga o Tangotango, tū ana i runga i te tekoteko o te whare
Nāku a Wiremu i tautapa kia tū hei tiamana.
Ka tautapaina e Ngāti Porou ko Mōkena hei whakatūranga mō rātau
He ruarua ngā manu ka tangi i te ata pūao, taro ake, kua korihi ngā manu huhua noa.
Ka tae mai ia ki te ngutuawa o Wharekahika, ko ngā wāhine rā e kohi pipi ana
He hanga tiriwhana te 'boomerang'.
E kōrerotia ana ngā pūtea pēke a te marae, kātahi ka kaipohau te koroua mō te whawhai i Karipori.
Arā e haupū mai rā ngā rīwai hei kōmaka māu.
Ko te komiti te rōpū nāna i mōrohirohi kia hangaia he wharekura hou.
Me pokepoke rawa i te tuatahi ki te wai mātao, kia iti te wai, kaua te wai mātaitai, te wai mārō rānei, ā muri iho ka whakaranu atu ki te nuinga o te wai
Tae atu ki te parapara maunu, pokepokea iho ki ngā toto
I toto tana ihu, ā, ka puru, ka whenguwhengu, he tepe te raru.
Ka tino raru te tangata mēnā ka noho mai he tepe ki tētahi o ana iaia kawe toto.
Kia mākū te hāmoamoa, ka noho mākū tonu mō tētahi wā roa tonu.
Kāore he waka i tū ki te hoko i ana paramu, i paneke te katoa.
Ka whakakuikui i te waewae o tana tuahine ki te rākau, ka pōhēhē te tuahine he pūngāwerewere, tīwē ana te waha.
Ngā hēki nei, ka huri haere hei tuna, mai i te hēki kara pēnei i te karāhe, tae noa ki te wā e tae ai ki ngā māngai o ngā awa, kāhi anō ka rite ki ngā punua tuna e mōhio nei tātou
Kua mātaotao te mauri
Ka mātaotao te aroha i ahau.
Ka roa koe e ngaro ana i tō whenua tipu, ka kore rānei koe e hokihoki tonu, kua mātaotao tō ahi i reira.
E turu mai ana te miraka i te piere i te pounamu nei.
Maina te ahi kia mahana, tahuna te ahi kia mura
Nāna te hukarere i whakakorakora ānō he pungarehu
E piki ana anō i tana pikitanga ki Māheahea, ka hē te manawa
Ko taua upoko mārō tonu kei te whakauaua, kei te tinaku i te hui.
Ki te toi o te tangata i rauhītia ai e Iomatua i Te Honoiwairua
Taku tamaiti, ē, i puta mai rā koe i te toi kai Hawaiki
He toi tupu, he toi ora, he toi i ahua mai i Hawaiki
Ka mahi te tamaiti rā ki te whakawhiti i te ngaeki, tapoko kau ana ngā waewae, ngaro atu ana ngā kamupūtu.
Me porowhiu te kapu nei i te mea kua riwha te niao.
Kua mate rā au i te mae, i te hūhi - me haere pea ki te whakatā.
Ko te hurahura te rōpū tuatahi i haere ki te tirotiro i te puni hoariri.
Ka tapatapahia ngā pongaponga o te māhunga; ka tapahi, ka mutu, ka haere mai ki kō mai pūkana ai
Kātahi tērā ka huri mai ki te pūkana mai ki ōna hoa, mō te nui o te rāpeti i kitea e ia, huri rawa ake te tangata nei kua mate katoa i tētahi o rātau
Hei te patunga kaua e huia katoatia te witi, engari me wehe kē ngā mea pai me ngā mea kino, me pēke kē tētahi, me pēke kē tētahi
He hanga ahurua te tapawhā. Ki te titiro atu, he hanga ahurua anō te whārangi pepa.
He ahurua te porohita papatahi, engari he ahutoru kē te poi.
E warea ana ngā āpiha ki te tinei i te ahi, paheno tonu atu ngā mauhere.
Ka puea tō mate ki reira nā
Kia āta whakamokamoka atu, kei oho ngā pārera
I ngā wā i wātea ake ia, pārekareka rawa atu ki a ia te whakamokamoka tia, te pupuhi pārera me te whakangau poaka
Kua tangetange ngā kai, taihoa ka poho kore te iwi.
Ko te kupu 'taea' me te kupu 'warea' ētahi tauira pai o tēnei mea, te tūmahi hāngū.
Kua toka au i konei, kei konei hoki aku hoa me ngā mea katoa e taunga ana au.
I uru mai te hoariri mā te mokowā o te takitaki.
He hui tāku ki te tākuta kia tirohia taku tuakoko.
Kei te hetiheti ia i ngā otaota - kei nui rawa ka raru ngā pōioio rīwai.
He nui ngā tāngata i emi mai; i reira katoa a Whanganui, mai i te hukinga ki te ngutuawa
Ka haumiria a muri o tana taringa ki te huruhuru manu kia ngōko ai ia.
He aha koe i kaiapo ai i aku taonga? Kei te rahi anō āu!
Kua matemate te nuinga, kua poko.
Anei rā te whakamārama i mōhio ai te Māori mō ngā pō, mō ngā rā tika mō te tou kūmara
Me kai koutou ināianei kia kore ai koutou e matekai ā te ahiahipō.
Me te pāhau te pōhekaheka e tupu ana i runga i te keke.
Ārohi noa ai ngā torotoro i te puni hoariri, ka kite i te wāhi ngoikore hei tomonga atu.
Ka kōrero ia ki ōna tāngata kia haere ki te tauranga o ngā waka, ki reira whanga mai ai i a rāua
Kātahi ka hoe rātou, ka tae ki ngā tauranga i tau ai ngā waka i mua
Ka haere a Muriwai ki te kawe i te māwe o tō rātou waka
He tino rerekē tētahi i tētahi, he ihupiro te tuakana, he mūrere, he hīanga te teina.
He tōtara ngā kurupae o raro i te papa o te whare.
Nāu i whakatūkawikawi mai i a tātau, i mahue ai ētehi o ngā mea
E kore e taea e rāua te whakakorekore, i mau hoki rāua e mahimahi ana.
Arā ētahi e kaha whakakorekore ana i te takenga mai o te tangata i te makimaki.
He umu tangata te tuhi nei
Kōrerotia kia awe te weri
Kia weria ki roto ki ngā taringa
Mā te hāmama rawa pea e weri ai ō tohutohu ki ō rātou taringa.
Nā wai i tuku te ahi kia mate?
He tino taonga te tapa i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa, he papanga ka mahia mai ki te hiako o te aute, he mea āta pehu kia angiangi.
Pehua te mīti kia angiangi ai, kia ngohe ai.
Ka tonoa e Te Karehe te rotari o roto i te aruhe, kia hoatu māna
Ko te popoki he kai tapu mō te tūātanga tamariki mō te hahunga tūpāpaku hoki
Tāia mai te pūwāhi (2,6) ki te kauwhata.
He moumou tāima aua hui, ka wareware atu ngā take nui ki te taha, ka āta tirohia kētia ko ngā takunga.
He takunga pārae (arā he maramara kai i kohia i te pārae)
Whakatikaina tō rūma moe - kaua e mākoko.
Kei ngā hope te wai i a rātou e kau atu ana ki rahaki o te awa.
Kei te mata tonu ngā rōpere kuratea - ko ngā mea kura kē ngā mea reka.
Natua he peita mā ki te peita kura ki te hiahia koe kia kuratea
He tangata whai rawa ia, engari kāore e mutu tana kōhaehae i ngā taonga a tana hoa tata.
Nā te tereina ia i mau mai ki Kirikiriroa.
Kei te raranga kete rāua.
Ko tana pie, kia whiwhi ana tamariki i ngā mea kāore i wātea ki a ia i tōna ake ohinga.
Kāore e tino pai ō tauira - me kimi ētahi atu.
I te Rātapu tuawhā o te marama, ka haere ki te karakia, i ētahi atu Rātapu, ka toro i tana whānau.
Ko te pōkeka e haria nei e Te Arawa, he rite ki te pātere
Ka tae ki te wāhi o te raina tereina e tūtata ki tō mātau puni, kua hekeheke mātau
He whare ngaro tērā - he tipuna huatea rā hoki, arā kāore āna tamariki ake.
Ka rakurakuhia, ka puta te tarawai, ka toto, ka pirau
Ka titiro ki tana waewae e toto ana, ka tīhaea mai he wāhi o tana hāte hei takai.
Tokotoru rātou kei tō rātou whare, he rōpā katoa.
Ko te oringa tō tewhataiaha
Ka tapepe i te pari tahataha, ka mate.
Kaua e whakaputaia mai anō e konā te mumuhau, me te pūrorohū e tahuri ai anō ngā waka
Whakatakotoria te hua hei whai atu mā te toki.
Ko te mate o te wātakirihi kōpīpī, ka kaha tonu te runā i te kōhuatanga.
Kātahi te kome pai mō te tinana ko te huawhenua.
Arā te mea pai hei whakamahea ake i te kōhukihuki, ko te haere ki te hararei.
Kua kōhukihuki katoa i te mea kua hē katoa ngā whakaritenga, e rua rā noa iho e toe ana i mua i te mārenatanga.
Me kōnumi ngā kākahu kia kore ai e kopakopa katoa.
Kia whakangaoko koe i te kauae o taku ngeru, tērā te nguru ai i te manawareka.
Ka noho ka kimi i tētahi tikanga e mate ai i a ia te hanga kiore nei. Ka puta tōna whakaaro kia tīkina he ngeru
Kei a ia mō te kapekapetau - ka pau te hāora e pahupahu ana i te waea, kāore noa iho he kiko o ngā kōrero.
Inā kē te nui o tō rātou whare, e ono rawa ngā rūma moe.
Ka titiro whakatau atu ki te wahine e haere mai ana, ka mahara ake nō hea.
Kei te titiro whakatau mai ki a ia, ki ngā tohu o te rangatira, o te toa, e mau atu ana i runga i a ia
He kāpara miti hinu, kāore e roa ka wheko.
Kua haere ngā wāhine ki te muru pūhā pororua.
I neherā, kāore he haka tātakimōrī
Ka nui taku hae ki ngā waiata o ēnei rā - he pāpaku ngā kupu, he koretake anō te rangi.
E hae ana au ki tērā kai anuanu.
Ki te werohia e te waeroa te tūroro, na ka ngongo i te toto o te tūroro ki roto i a ia, ka noho te mate ki roto i taua waeroa
He kawakawa kē tēnei riu nō tētahi awa whānui tonu i ngā rā o mua.
He āhua roa tonu ngā toromoka kei te kauae o te āhuruhuru.
Ko au tonu e kī ana he tohu rangatira te ringa raweke ki te mahi, ā, ko te mangere he tohu tūtūā
Ka whakamahia he kupenga hei rore i te kurī matakakā.
Anei ētahi pūmuri o te reo Māori: kau, noa, rawa, tonu, anō, hoki, pea, anake, nei, ake, mai.
Kōutuutua he wai ki roto i te kāraha nui rā.
Tukupū ana te rangi
Nā reira anō ka whakatumatuma; te tohetohe ki te whakatuma, 'Nā wai hoki koe i kī, a hei tango i tōku kāinga?'
Kāti tō whakatumatuma, me whakarongo mai koe ināia tonu nei!
Aua atu, kua tahuri tonu mai ōna tino mutunga kē mai nei o te kore mōhio ki konā whakatumatuma mai ai, kī mai ai ki te hunga nō rātou ake nei te reo, ā, i whāngaia mai koia te reo tuatahi, anei kē, arā kē
Ko te koroahu e tohu ana i ngā waiariki.
E whakatekateka ana ngā tamariki i te papa tākaro.
Ka wāwāhia te kerengeo kia ngawhere ai.
Ko Tīoreore rāua ko Tīkatakata
I muri i te waipuke, ka neke te kūaha o te awa ki te tonga.
Kia tika te whakairi i ngā kākahu nā kia kore ai e kūwhewhe.
Tahuri noa ake te wahine rā: auē! he tangata e tū mai ana i muri i a ia
Me ka totoro atu te ringaringa, ka tahuri ka ngau
Ko te ruahine ki te matapihi whakarongo ai ki te taua e tāwai mai ra ki a rāua; ko te koroheke, ko Ngātoro, i te tungaroa
Na, ka mutu tā rātou tāwai ki a ia, ka tīhorea atu i runga i a ia te kākahu rā
Kua hiemi katoa rātou ki tātahi ki te kohi tuatua.
Rokohanga mai ko ngā pūpū e kahora ana i runga i te paru tāhuna
He makariri katoa a roto nei, nā te mea i wareware a Hēmi ki te tahu i te ahi.
Tirohia te rā e heke ana i te paihau ki tōna rua.
Ko rātau tokowhā kei te haere, mā runga i te waka o Hine.
Mōhio tonu ia ka ruaki ia, kua pupū hoki te parapara i tōna waha.
Kīhai ia i tawhitawhi, i whakaaroaro rānei, kia aha rānei
Kei te kōrero tonutia te rēinga a tō mātou tupuna i tana waka ki te kapo atu i ngā taura o te ihu o te kaipuke Pākehā.
Ko wai rā hei piki tūranga mō tēnei kaumātua kua riro?
He whenua manapori a Aotearoa. E kōwhiria ana e te iwi nui tonu ngā māngai kāwanatanga ia toru tau.
Te Rata Porena: I haere atu koe i ahau. Te Ngākau: Inahea? Te Rata Porena: I te wā i haere atu ai koe i runga i tō whakaaro ake
E wherawhera ana i ngā whārangi o te moheni ki te tirotiro i ngā pikitia.
Ko te rongoā tēnā mō te harehare ki te hipi
Me takai rawa ngā waewae me ngā ringa kia kore ai e rakuraku i ana harehare.
He motuhake anō ngā papatono mō te patopato kōrero, mō ngā mahi kaute, me te tātari raraunga.
Ka rongo ngā tāngata i te rorotu, ka tuku ai te ngaru o te moana.
Ko Tāne te atua o te wao nui.
Ko Hine-te-iwaiwa te atua o te Whare Pora.
Whakahokia ai te ika tuatahi hei whakarata i te atua o te moana, i a Tangaroa.
Ka tangi te karaka, ka mōhio a Hinarera kua pōwhenua, oma atu ana, me te makere anō o tana hū.
Ka oti te poreku ka tau ki runga i te kaupapa
Nā tana pāpā a ia i ako ki ngā kōrero o tua whakarere.
Hiamo ana ā rātou pū kia kore ai e mākū i te awa.
Kia mate koe ka hinga tō tinana, engari ka ora tonu tō ngongirua.
Me mau pūtu anō mō tēnā mahi, hei tiaki i ngā waewae.
He rawe kē ngā pūtu pīataata o kuia - kei ngā pona rā anō e haere ana.
Ko tōku tinana ka tangatanga; kei ōku waewae anake te mamae
E rere rā te ao uru, tauhōkai ana i te hei.
I te āhua tonu o tana reo i te waea ka mōhio au kua tata ia te tangi.
Inā hoki he reo manu māna e whakaatu te takiwā o te kai, he reo manu māna e whakaatu te putanga mai o te raumati, o te hōtoke hoki
Ngā karakia o ētahi hapū, ko Naenaemoko, te karakia o ētahi hapū, ko Mangungu
Tēnei tō mauri ko Tiki Kaitangata, e tū ai koe ki te kawe a riri, nā!
Ko te rite i ahau ko Māhutonga e rauna i te ao
Ko te taipū anga e pae nei e tohu ana he wāhi pai tēnei mō te mahi mātaitai.
I kōmanawa noa ake te hiahia i roto i a ia ki te hoki ki te kura.
Ko te tamaiti matapiko anō tēnei e kai huna nei, kāore e hoatu rare ki ana hoa.
Ki te Māori ko te tino tangata ko te tangata tawhiti, ā, ko te tangata tino weriweri ko te hākere, ko te matapiko
Kia tūpato ki te kōhatu pānekeneke i a koe ka whakawhiti i te awa.
Kei te akaaka tērā whenua i ngā riri taua nui.
Kei te akaaka ngā rangi tūhāhā
Kua pau haere te wai ngārahu o te pūreretā, kua horetea ngā tānga.
Māna e whakarewa te ika whetū riki
He aha te take māu e whakaero tō koutou waka
Ehara, tahutahu ana te kai nei, te raukura o te manu ka kitea ki reira, te mā, te pango, te whero, te aha
Ka whakatika a Hatupatu, ka pioi i ana kirikiri upoko, ko taua upoko i tōna ringa ko Karika
Ka pai te wai wera hei whakanā i te tinana ngenge.
I taka iho a ia i tōna hōiho ka whati tōna pūkaka.
Nō te tatanga atu ki te kāinga, ka apū te kurī
Kōhā mai ana te uira ki runga o Pukeora.
Tōna hinganga ki raro me ngā manga, ana, takoto ana ki te whenua; anana, mā te huhu, mā te popo, mā te hanehane
Ki te hiahia ako koe i tōu ake reo, e hoki ki tōu ake pūtoi.
He kupu māori tonu, kāore i rehurehu, kāore rānei i arero rua.
Me kōrero māori atu au, kia āta mōhio ai koe ki taua whenua
Arā a Ahitereiria, kei te uru-mā-raki o Aotearoa.
Ko te haupitonga, he hau pupuhi mai i te tonga-mā-rāwhiti.
Ehara i te hanga ahau ka kanukanu taku puku ki te riri
Ka mate, ka tuakina ngā puku ka taona ki te hāngi ka kainga — ko te matū, i waiho ki rō tahā hei kīnaki taro mā rātou
E mahi ana ia i te pokapū rangahau o te whare wānanga.
Kei te pokapū whakamōhio ngā kōrero katoa mō ngā mahi pārekareka o te rohe.
Kei te rīriri anō rāua, ko te noho roa a te tāne ki te pāparakāuta te kaupapa.
Tekau mā ono tau nei te pakeke o Rūmātiki i te matenga atu o tana koroua, ka riro nei ia nā tana whaea kēkē, nā Huia Tuatini i whakatipu mai
Ina hukapapatia te whenua ā te pō nei, ka mate katoa ngā pihinga.
Ko ahau ka noho ki te tiaki i ngā wāhine, i ngā tamariki ina haere koutou
Kia maroke ngā hue ka karure ai.
Ka tīmata pea te hohoni a ngā ēkara i tā rātou tūpāpaku!
He māmā ake ki ētahi te horomi i te rongoā kūtere, tēnā i te kai pire.
Ka whati te kakau o te toki nei
Ko tōku whakaaro tonu, whakapono hoki, nā Te Atua au i manaaki, nā te mātauranga i hoatu e ia ki aku rata tokorua i pai ai tā rāua hono i ngā poroiwi o aku waewae i whati nei
Kaua e raweke i te ahi kei wera
He tōhi wera taku parakuīhi, he kore nōku e kaha ki te moumou kai.
Ka kōmukumukua atu te pani whero i ana matikara.
Āwhea ara ai te marama?
Mate atu he tētē kura, ara ake he tētē kura
Ka waiwai ki te tangai hīnau, ā, ka maka ki te paruparu kia mangu ai
He rāngai maomao ka taka i tua o Nukutaurua, e kore a muri e hokia.
Ka āta kurua ngā kākano kia hungahunga rawa, kia paura te āhua.
Ka tāia te pūrongo hei tohatoha ki te hui.
Kua tāia te waitohu o te kamupene ki ngā tīhāte me ērā atu o ā rātou taonga hoko.
Manana ana ngā rewha o te tāhae rā ki tana hoa.
Tipia atu ngā tarutaru ka ngaki ai i te māra
Ka tipia atu e te tākuta te kautona e tipu ana i tana turi.
Ka whakamahia tana naihi pūkoro hei tipi i tana āporo.
Ka kī atu a Tame ki a Ngāheu kia whāngaia he matā ki tana pū
Ka whāngaihia atu tana moni ki te mīhini, he aha te aha.
Me whāngai ko ngā paihau - ko rāua kē ngā mea tere ki te oma.
Ka whāngaia atu ngā matau ki te kōura
Ka tae mai te ope, ka rokohanga mai tā tāua wahine e whatu ana i te kākahu, kāore e whakahingaia te turuturu, he aroākapa tēnā, he aituā mō taua wahine
Mehemea ka tahuri ahau ki te whatu kākahu i te pō, he tātai mate, he aroākapa
Tēnā whakarērea atu ngā mea hauarea nā, ka haere ai ki te kohikohi mea papai.
He mea whakatū ngā pānui tōrangapū mō te pōtitanga ki ngā wāhi mārakerake, kia tere kitea ai e te mātinitini.
Kia marangai, kua kī ngā hū o te whenua nei i te wai.
E meinga ana kua heke te toto, kua hihinga te tangata
Kua marū katoa ngā paramu i te rere a te kōpaka i te pō rā.
Tūtata tonu ki te hāwhe inihi te honu
Ka tupu te whakaaro i a Tāwhirimātea kia tahuri mai ia ki te whawhai ki ōna tuākana mō te wehewehenga i ō rātou mātua, tā te mea kāore ia i whakaae kia wehea rāua
He toenga kai koe nāku.
Kua kapuranga te ata, taihoa ka whātaretare mai a Tamanuiterā.
Pākinakina ana te rā, pāroherohe ana te tangata.
E whiuwhiu ana te whiore o te kurī i te harikoa.
Ko te kai e āta tupu ana ki reira, he raihi. Ko ngā māra mō te raihi kei ngā repo, kei ngā wāhi mākūkū
Ka huki kei waho te ata ura, te ata mea
I whakawhirinaki tonu ia ki tana hunga ohu i te mahi, tae atu hoki ki āna tamariki
Ko te Atua tōku kāmaka, ka whakawhirinaki ahau ki a ia
Toru tekau ngā tau e kōkiri ana a T. T. Rāwhiti i te kaupapa mana motuhake a te iwi Māori, me te whakaū anō i a rātou kia kaua e whakawhirinaki ki tētehi atu
E toru ngā wehikē, kua kōkeke haere a koroua.
He mea waruwaru ngā papa ki te hōanga matarehu kia mānihi ai.
E whīoioi ana rāua i ā rāua hoari tētahi ki tētahi.
E taumaha ana ngā rārā o te rākau i te maha o ngā hua.
Kua oti te tango mai o ngā utauta me ngā mīhini mō tēnei teihana
Tēnā whakahokia atu ngā utauta taka kai ki ngā hautō me ngā kāpata e tika ana.
Ko te pai o tā mātou poti, ko ia tonu ki te hopu kiore, ki te hopu rāpeti hei kai māna.
E rua ngā kiore i mau i te tāwhiti hao.
Ka kotahi atu te meke ki te kauae o te waha papā, e tama kei raro e putu ana.
He kai tāwhara, kua menemene ngā pāpāringa, he kai kawa, kua kōwakawaka te rae.
I ētahi mahi toi tawhito, e taka ana te upoko o Te Karaiti i te āwheo.
He aha i tāhawahawatia e koe ngā kai?
Kua hora kē te tēpu, kua noho mātau ki te kai
Tūtū katoa ngā perehina o te tangata rā ki te riri
Whakairia ngā paipa ki ngā peru o te whare hei kawe i te wai o te tuanui.
Ka tāia te moko o te tangata, ka tū te tohunga, ka karakia i te ātahu, kia pai mai ngā wāhine ki taua tangata
Ko te rākau manumanuā te tino kāinga o te wētā.
I a māua i Ōtautahi ka haere mai taku hūngoi ki te tiaki i ana mokopuna.
Kīhai i tātata te ritenga o tā te kaiwhakamāori i whakamāori ai ki ā te Mema Māori i kōrero ai
Kāore ngā wūru o ētahi whenua e tātata ki te nui o ā tātou paere e tuku ai ki tāwāhi
Purutia ēnā kōrero, ka whāngai atu ki āu ake ā tōna wā.
Kua mamae aku tāreperepe i te eke hōiho.
Kua ngawhewhe tōku kākahu
Ka utaina tana pēke pata witi ki tana pokowhiwhi, ka haere ki te ruirui.
Kaua e kaitorohi i te whāereere me ana punua.
Ko tō uta aruhe he paranui tētahi, he pāwhati tētahi, he puahou tētahi
He pari horehore - kāore e tipuria ana e te paku aha.
Pakakē ana te kohikohi peka mō tā rātou ahi. Kāore i roa kua kā, kei runga hoki te parai, me ngā tōtiti e hihī mai ana
Kua mutu te āwhā, e whiti ana te rā, kānapanapa mai ana te moana
Ko tō reira kōura ehara i te mea keri ki te whenua . . . ; ka kitea e te tangata e kānapanapa ake ana i ngā taha o ngā awa
Waihoki e koe i ngā kākahu hiraka, i ngā koti huru, e koe e rere rā i runga i te motokā kānapanapa
I haere mai mā te mānia o Kaingaroa
Nāna au i whakangaeke ki te māripi.
Kāore he rerenga kētanga o taku kupu, kia rongo mai koe ko te tikanga anō tēnei o āu kupu i waihotia iho rā e koe
He aha te rerenga kētanga o te kawa i te tikanga?
Te putanga mai ki waho, haere atu ana, kāore he turupou
Ka koemi te tamaiti i te auautanga a te kurī.
Taukahore! Ngā mea nei, te pine!
Taukahore te ngaoko o te tuiau!
Ka uru atu te wai ki te tipu mā te kiri pōareare o ngā pakiaka.
Me mau hāte whai kakī roa koe kia kore ai tō mōua e tīkākā.
He roa tonu e haere ana te tereina. Ka tae ki tēnā teihana, kua tuku ētahi
Hei te waru i te ata te pahi ka wehe atu i te teihana, ka tae ki Whakatāne ā te tekau karaka.
Ka noho anō rātou ki te taute ko tēhea te tono whaikiko ake.
Kātahi ka kōpana ake te hinengaro ki te kai
E kōtītiti ana te tokorua rā i te tāone - ko wai ka mōhio āhea hoki mai ai.
Ka rua rā e tahitahi ana, e horoi ana i ngā parakaingaki o taua whare.
Kei te ota tonu te pītiti, waiho kia maoa.
Hei ngā pō ka haere a Hine ki Tokatā ki uta, ki te tiki wai mō rāua i te wai i Taranaki, he wai motu
Ko te torohī e pana ana i ngā mea kino ki waho
Kei te tika anō te kohimu kua rongo nei au mō kōrua ko Tame?
Kōrua kōrua ko te honu, he akitō.
Kia tutuki i ahau te akoranga whānui mō te rorohiko, kātahi au ka ako i ngā mahi whakairoiro rorohiko.
He kōrero whānui noa i puta, kāore i āta kōrerotia ngā mahi i mahia.
E tanuku ana te korokoro i te wehi
He pai nō te āhua o ngā wāhine, tanuku kau atu te korokoro
Hāunga ia te tanuku o te hūare, ina kite atu i ētahi e inu ana
Kua whātītipahia e te kakara o tuawahine.
He āhuaatua tō kore e mihi ki ō pakeke.
Me tohu mai ngā ākonga e hia ngā irahiko o tēnā momo ngota, o tēnā momo ngota.
Ka hinga te rākau paiaka pakiranga i te hau pūkeri nui.
He tautahi a Roimata; koia te manawa o tana whaea.
'Nā te Atua tēnei mō mātou, ehara mā te tangata tauhou, ehara mā tauiwi hei rahurahu tō mātou whenua tapu.' Wheke tonu atu a Kerei
Ina āta mirimiria te atuapīkoikoi, ka āhua mārō, pērā tonu i te ure.
Kei te tautohetohe tonu ngā hapū e rua - e kore e kotahi ngā whakaaro.
E taututetute ana ngā manu i te pae.
Kua taupiripiri ngā kuia, ko tētahi e whakawhirinaki ana ki tētahi.
Kei whea rā tō tapuwae nui e horo i te riri?
Kia whāranua te kikorangi me te kōwhai, ka puta ko te kārearea.
Me hāparangi tonu - kia rongo ai te taringa hoi rā i a koe.
Nā Huata mā i mahi mai ngā tukutuku.
E rau rangatira mā, tēnā koutou katoa.
Ko wai mā ērā?
Ko Mea mā kei te horoi i ngā wharepaku. Ki a tātou te wharepuni.
Ka pēhea rā ngā whakaaro o rātou mā ki tēnei mahi a tātou?
He wara noa iho tēnei, e kore au e aro atu.
Rokohanga e tētahi wahine he taniwha i roto i tana rua. Na, ko te ingoa o taua taniwha, ko Te Whakaruaki.
Me kuru te mākaka kia hemo ai te kākoa, kātahi anō ka kai.
Rorotu ana ngā kanohi i te moe
E whatā ake ana e te ngako o taua ngārara nei
I haere ia ki te rata kia tirohia te ira e mangeo ana i tana pāpāringa.
Ao ake te rā ka heru anō, kātahi anō ka tikitikia, ka pania ki te hinu
I tōku haerenga i te taha o te ākau i whānau au i tētahi tamaiti āku, ā takaia ana ki roto ki tōku tikitiki, ā whiua ana e ahau ki roto ki te hukahuka o te tai
Kotahi te kupu a te kawau pū, kua tahuri te iwi ki te whakatinana.
Kua roa haere ngā piere o te toka nui rā.
Kua rongo rā koe i te pakipaki mō te Mea o te tāone nei?
I muri iho ka heke te wahine nōna nei te whare ki te kīhini, ā, mihi ana ki te kuki mō te āhua pai ake o ngā kai e tunua ana e ia
He kaitautoko a Tāmihana i ngā mahi a te Kīngi ki te aukati i ngā mahi hoko a te Māori i ō rātou whenua ki te Pākehā
He ringa mākohakoha, he parakūkā.
E pako ana i te oneone kia māmā ai te tupu o ngā kūmara.
Nā te ture Pākehā te whenua nei i kokoti.
Waiho ana mā te pārō o te ringa e koko wai hei inu māna.
Ka tutū te puehu
Tutū ana te heihei
Nāwai rā, ā, ka tutū te huka o te waha
E kore hoki e kitea he tapuwae, inā hoki, he waewae rākau kē ōna, he matakapua.
Kia rokiroki te hinu o te rama kua noho anō tātou ki te pō uriuri.
He mahi pōrewarewa te whānako i tērā whakapakoko rongonui mō te kore noa iho te take.
Tē āta whāki iho taku pana ki a au, kia mōhio roto he tangata kei waho
He pēnei me te hū hōiho whero te hanga o ngā autō i taku akomanga.
Kua piri katoa atu ngā mea rino ki te autō.
E raru ana au i ngā tohutohu whakakā i te mīhini nei. Tē haruru, tē aha.
Kua raru au, i te mea kua mōhio taku rangatira ko au te mea i hari kōrero ki te ao pāpāho mō ngā mahi rerekē i tō mātou tari.
Me tiriwā kē te taewa - kaua e onokia kia tāruru rawa tētahi ki tētahi.
Kua nanihi noa atu te haere a Titore
Wherawherahia te kauhanga nui, te kauhanga roa a Marama
Whakamau te titiro ki te apaapa tapu, ki te kauhanga nui kia haematatia
Ka pūrēhua te kāpura
Ka mātaki a ia i te ahi e pūrēhua ana, ka tau te whakaaro ki roto i a ia, 'Ahu mai ai tēnei mea te ahi i hea?'
Kia koipi te whāriki mō te uwhiuwhi, kia kore ai e pāhekeheke.
He taetaeata, e kore e roa, ka paki
I te mea ko te koroua o Hine te mātāmua o tana whānau, ka noho tuakana a Hine ki ērā atu o ngā mokopuna wahine.
Me mātua kōrero ki te tangata nōna te tāepa, māna e whakaae tō hōiho kia tukua ki roto i te tāepa, kātahi ka pai ki te tuku ki roto
I te tīwekaweka o te raranga mai, ka puritia hei kete mahi mātaitai māna.
Tīrama tīrama ngā whetū.
I konā ka hā ia, kei kore te hunga whakarongo e pai mai ki ana whakaaro.
Ka kī ngā tamāhine, 'Rākei i a kōrua'
Me te manomano tāngata hoki e hīkoikoi haere ana, e omaoma haere ana, e tākotokoto haere ana, e pāinaina rā ana, e nohonoho noa ana rānei i ngā tahataha
Te taenga ki te waha o te ana, ka puta mai te manomano pekapeka.
Ka whakakoekoengia e te tungāne kia ngawī rawa te waha.
Me pahore ngā tuarā o ngā tia ka tika!
Ehara hoki koe i te mea hara mai noa, he mea rāhiri mārire nā ngā tāngata o Heretaunga nei hei taonga mōna
E tapahia ana ngā whiore me ngā pūtawa o ngā kūao hipi.
Ki ētahi he hanga anuanu te huhu takaokeoke, ki ētahi, he tino kai.
Te ingoa o te puna, ko Ōringi, e koropupū ake ana i te whenua
Kotahi te poti me te mōkihi kei te ngaro tonu, kotahi te wahine kei runga o te mōkihi
Kīhai i mahue tā rātou mōkihi e ngā mangō o te moana, noho tonu aua mangō i te taha porotakataka haere ai, e whanga ana ki ā rātou tāngata
Me tuwhanga te haere o ngā waka, kei tukituki tētahi ki tētahi.
Kia tuwhanga tonu te kauwae runga me te kauwae raro, kia kitea ai e te rata ngā niho o muri.
Ko ngā paru tangata, kaua e waiho rauroha noa iho
Tērā te uira kapo taratahi ana
Ka whakahauhau te kuia kia whakatikaina te marae, taihoa ka tae ake te manuhiri.
Tae atu ana ia ki mua ra anō o te riri arā ki roto ki ngā awa keri haere ai, ki te whakahauhau haere i a rātou
I muri o Ōturu, ka tōriwha haere te marama ā tae rawa ki te kōhititanga.
I pūhia tana poaka tāriana i te waerenga iti i te tāwhatitanga o te hiwi.
Te repetahuri, ki tētahi reo he rapatahuri, he pērā anō i te tokoraurepe
E kaikainga ana te tahatika e te au nui o ngā waka e whakawhiti ana i Te Moana-o-Raukawa.
Kōngenengene ana ngā putiputi i te kore wai o roto i te ipu.
Puta ana ngā kupu whakamiha a te hunga i māngari ki te whai wāhi atu ki tēnei pō whakahirahira
Ka kainamu ki te ata, ka tata ki te awatea
Haere ki te horoi i ō ringaringa, kua kainamu ki te hapa.
Me mutu tō hakirara i a ia, inā ki te taka kōrua ki te mekemeke, ka mīere ko koe.
Ka tau mai te rangiroro ki a au i ngā rama kōnakonako o te papa kanikani.
Ka whakakīia te karaehe kia pūhakehake tonu, kia maringi atu ai te hukahuka o runga ake i te pia.
Ka pā ohorere te pāhoahoa ki a ia, ka hinga.
Ka tango ki te pū wīwī, ka rere iho taua wahine nei ki roto ki te kōruarua
Kei te tokouru o ngā Kuki Airani a Niue.
Ka tau ana te kohu, kua tūrehu te maunga, ka hiki ana te kohu, ānana, ngangahu ana.
He aha koe e taiaroa nā i a ia? He pai katoa ana kōrero mōu!
Ka motuhia mai ngā pewa, kātahi ka paopaoa te kiko o te pāua kia āhua ngohe ake.
Kāore e akoako i a ia te wāhi mingi o te rākau.
Ka tū tana ringa i te pānga atu ki te hua tiotio.
Kaua e waiho ō koutou koti kia putu noa iho i te tupehau.
Kia tere! Kei te marara te hoariri. Whakangahorotia!
Ko tō rāua whakaahua tēnā i te whārangi tuatahi o te herora, e haurangi ana.
Hei whakareka mō tō kiri
E kore e tika te rere a te pere kōiheihe.
Ko te tau o te wai ko te kōpua i raro iho o te tāheke
Hōkio manu rā e huhū i te rangi
Ko te rerena o ngā puku o te iwi rā te tohu kāore he painga o tā rātou i kai ai.
Kīhai hoki te tangata wau i aro ki ngā whakatūpato.
Ka whiua te ora, he kore nōna i aro tika atu ki te tono a tana rangatira.
E ori haere ana te kurī, e hamu haere ana i ngā parapara o te rorerore.
Ka ū mai aua tupua ki uta, ka mataku atu mātou ngā wāhine me ngā tamariki, a ka oma mātou ki te tahora
Kua riro katoa ō tātou whenua, kua kī katoa ngā whenua nei i te tauhou, i te tupua
A tiaia koe te manu o tawhiti, te manu a te tupua
Mō te waka taua anake te rā whara; i mangungutia
Kia kaua e renarena te kōhua, kei maringi te hupa i te taraiwatanga atu.
E ai ki ngā kōrero a Tā Hēmi Hēnare, he maha rawa ngā mahi kua oti, hei waiho noa iho
He tino nui te mīharo o ā rātou kōrero engari ko ngā kōrero i tino kaha te maunga i a au ko ā Tā Āpirana Ngata
Te rātā e hīwerawera mai nei
Nā ngā whakahaere a te tohunga kua mama te wāhi i takoto ai te tūpāpaku.
E kore e taea ki te kore koutou e hihiko mai ki te āwhina
Ko Taranaki maunga ia purata ana ōna mata i a Tamanuiterā
Mauri mahi, mauri ora; mauri noho, mauri mate
He mea tono e ia kia haria mai i Tūākau te takere o te waka taua tawhito nei, o Te Winika, ki Tūrangawaewae
